name: bean
interpret: n.豆，蚕豆，豆科植物
example: 单词 bean 的例句||||I've never heard a bean pie. 我从没听过豆子馅饼。||||What's the bean named? 这种豆子叫什么名字？

name: balloon
interpret: n.气球
example: 单词 balloon 的例句||||The balloon rose up slowly in the sky. 气球冉冉升上天空。||||This is a hot air balloon. 这是一个热气球。

name: flag
interpret: n.旗帜，标志(记)，特征(位)
example: 单词 flag 的例句||||The flag is red and yellow. 这旗子红黄相间。||||The flag is waving in the wind. 旗号正在风中飘荡。

name: fan
interpret: n.风扇，迷，狂热者；vt.煽，煽动，刺激；vi. 成扇形散开；飘动
example: 单词 fan 的例句||||Are you a football fan? 你是足球迷吗？||||Jack is a baseball fan. 杰克是个棒球迷。

name: queen
interpret: n.女王，皇后；（纸牌、国际象棋中的）王后
example: 单词 queen 的例句||||She sounds like a queen! 她听起来像是一个王后! ||||The evil queen is very angry. 邪恶的皇后非常生气。

name: globe
interpret: n.地球；地球仪；球体；世界
example: 单词 globe 的例句||||The globe is rolling round all the time. 地球一直在转动。||||We use a globe in our geography class. 我们在地理课上使用地球仪。

name: jar
interpret: n.罐子；坛子；瓶子
example: 单词 jar 的例句||||I need to open this jar. 我得打开这个罐子。||||Brian puts water into the jar. 布赖恩把水灌到罐子里。

name: sailor
interpret: n.水手，水兵，海员，船夫
example: 单词 sailor 的例句||||He has become a sailor. 他已成为一名海员。||||She wears a sailor hat. 她戴着顶水手帽。

name: hammer
interpret: n.锤，榔头；vi.锤击，敲打；vt. 锤击；锤打
example: 单词 hammer 的例句||||Please pass me the hammer. 请把榔头递给我。||||Please hold this hammer for a moment. 请帮我拿一会儿锤子。

name: opener
interpret: n.开的人；开局人；开启用的工具
example: 单词 opener 的例句||||I bought a bottle opener yesterday. 我昨天买了个开瓶器。||||Can I borrow your can opener? 我可以借用你的开罐器吗？

name: belt
interpret: n.带子，皮带，腰带；vt.系腰带，抽打；vi. 猛击
example: 单词 belt 的例句||||You should put on your seat belt. 你应该系好安全带。||||I want a black belt. 我想要一条黑色腰带。

name: quilt
interpret: n.棉被；vt.制成棉被，摘录；vi.缝被子
example: 单词 quilt 的例句||||It's a blue quilt. 这是一条蓝色的被子。||||Put hands into the quilt. 把手放进被子里。

name: bow
interpret: n.弓，船头，鞠躬；vi.鞠躬，弯腰；vt. 鞠躬；弯腰
example: 单词 bow 的例句||||There's a flag on the bow of his boat. 在他的船头有一面旗子。||||We bow to the teacher. 我们向老师鞠个躬。

name: oversell
interpret: vi.售出(货物等)过多；过分吹嘘vt. 销售过多
example: 单词 oversell 的例句||||Stay focused and don’t try to oversell your capabilities. 保持专注而不要尝试过份吹嘘你的能力。||||It would be foolish to oversell the powers of science. 过分夸大科学的威力是愚蠢的。

name: clap
interpret: vt.& vi.拍手，鼓掌； 轻轻拍打某人；拍翅膀；n.鼓掌，拍手； 拍手声； 噼拍声；vi.鼓掌，拍手； 啪地关上
example: 单词 clap 的例句||||Let's give him a big clap. 我们给他用力鼓掌。||||She gives him a clap on the back. 她在他的背上拍了一下。

name: mask
interpret: n.屏蔽，面具，假面具，掩饰，石膏面像；vt.戴面具，掩饰，使模糊；vi.化装，戴面具，掩饰
example: 单词 mask 的例句||||Who is wearing the mask? 谁戴着面具呢？||||Why are you wearing a mask? 你为什么要戴面具？

name: dot
interpret: n.小点，小圆点；vt.加上小点，散布于，点缀
example: 单词 dot 的例句||||The plane was just a dot in the sky. 飞机当时只是天空中的一个小点。||||Flowers dot about our school. 我们学校里到处点缀着鲜花。

name: toothpick
interpret: n.牙签
example: 单词 toothpick 的例句||||Would you bring me a toothpick? 能给我拿根牙签吗？||||Do you often use a toothpick? 你是否常常用牙签？

name: roof
interpret: n.屋顶；vt.给...覆以屋顶，覆盖
example: 单词 roof 的例句||||A cat is on the roof. 一只小猫在屋顶上。||||Move back! The roof is falling! 往后退，屋顶要塌了！

name: smooth
interpret: adj.平滑的，平坦的，平稳的，顾忱；vt.弄平，使平滑；消除，排除，克服；vi. 变平静；变平滑
example: 单词 smooth 的例句||||Life is not always smooth. 生活的路不总是平坦的。||||He picked up some smooth stones. 他捡了一些光滑的石子。

name: per
interpret: prep.每，每一，根据，按照；由，经，以，靠
example: 单词 per 的例句||||These apples cost 40 pence per pound. 这些苹果每磅40便士。||||The truck was traveling under fifty miles per hour. 那辆卡车以每小时不到五十英里的速度行驶着。

name: pipe
interpret: n.管，导管，输送管，管状器官，声带，烟斗，笛，管乐器vt.以管输送
example: 单词 pipe 的例句||||The pipe has been stopped up already. 管子已完全堵住了。||||The pipe carries water. 这管子是送水用的。

name: pump
interpret: n.抽水机，打气筒；v.抽水，打气，盘问
example: 单词 pump 的例句||||Shall I stop the pump? 我可以停泵吗？||||He has a bicycle pump. 他有一个自行车打气筒。

name: pollute
interpret: vt.污染，败坏，弄脏
example: 单词 pollute 的例句||||Factories are no longer allowed to pollute the air with black smoke. 不再允许工厂的黑烟污染空气了。||||She thinks these books pollute the minds of children. 她认为这些书腐蚀儿童的心灵。

name: tap
interpret: n.轻打，水龙头，电话窃听；vt.从...放出液体，自...某人处获取，在...上装窃听器，轻拍；vi.轻拍
example: 单词 tap 的例句||||I can't turn off the tap. 我无法关上水龙头。||||The tooth hurts when I tap it. 我轻敲时牙齿会痛。

name: survive
interpret: vt.幸免于；从…中生还；vi.幸存
example: 单词 survive 的例句||||I didn't know whether I could survive. 我不知道我能否幸存下来。||||I cannot survive without you. 没有你我不能幸存。

name: seaweed
interpret: n.海草，海藻
example: 单词 seaweed 的例句||||The seaweed is too thick here for us to swim. 这里的海草太密，我们不能游泳。||||When she is near the seaweed, the big fish appears suddenly. 当她接近海草时，大鱼突然出现。

name: programme
interpret: n.节目；项目(美program)
example: 单词 programme 的例句||||Does Betty like that programme? 贝蒂喜欢那个节目吗？|||| The programme is interesting. 但是这个节目很好看。

name: sincerely
interpret: adv.真诚地；诚恳地
example: 单词 sincerely 的例句||||I sincerely hope you'll come with us. 我真诚希望你和我们一起去。||||I sincerely hope that you will be well soon. 我真诚希望你很快就会康复。

name: stream
interpret: n.流，水流，人潮；vt.使流出，流动；vi. 流；涌进；飘扬
example: 单词 stream 的例句||||A stream of people was going into the cinema. 一股人流走进影院。||||A stream of cold air flowed into the warm room. 一股寒气流进了温暖的房间。

name: sum
interpret: n.总数，和，金额，全部，概略，顶点；vt.总计，概括；vi. 合计；[数]并，并集
example: 单词 sum 的例句||||She was fined the sum of $100. 她被罚款金额一百美元。||||Ten thousand dollars is a large sum. 一万美元是一大笔钱。

name: secretary
interpret: n.秘书，部长，大臣，书记
example: 单词 secretary 的例句||||I want to check with my secretary before I sign the papers. 在签署这些文件前, 我要与我的秘书商议。||||She rang the bell for her secretary. 她按铃叫她的秘书。

name: staff
interpret: n.全体人员，同事；棍棒，杆，拐杖，支柱，权杖；vt.为…配备人员
example: 单词 staff 的例句||||We need more staff in the office. 我们办公室需要更多的工作人员。||||The hotel staff were very friendly. 这家旅馆的工作人员非常友好。

name: waterfall
interpret: n.瀑布
example: 单词 waterfall 的例句||||Let's have our picnic by the waterfall. 咱们在瀑布旁野餐吧！||||Climbing such a small waterfall was a piece of cake. 爬这个小瀑布小意思啦。

name: outdoors
interpret: adv.在户外，在野外
example: 单词 outdoors 的例句||||I like to practice yoga outdoors. 我喜欢在户外练习瑜伽。||||The boys are playing outdoors. 男孩们在户外玩。

name: tailor
interpret: n.裁缝师，成衣匠；vt.缝制，做裁缝，使...适应；vi.做裁缝
example: 单词 tailor 的例句||||I want to go to the tailor's. 我想到裁缝店去一趟。||||He's a well-known tailor. 他是个有名的裁缝。

name: shall
interpret: v.aux.（主要用于第一人称）将
example: 单词 shall 的例句||||I shall always love you. 我将永远爱你。||||Which club shall we join? 我们要参加哪个社团？

name: ahead
interpret: adv.在前，向前，提前，在前面
example: 单词 ahead 的例句||||We have to go ahead to find a garage. 我们得到前边找个修车厂。||||Youth looks ahead and age backward. 青年人向前看，老年人向后看。

name: bamboo
interpret: n.竹；竹子；adj.用竹子制的
example: 单词 bamboo 的例句||||She sometimes uses a bamboo as a stick. 她有时用竹竿当手杖。||||People use bamboo to build houses. 人们用竹子建造房屋。

name: lantern
interpret: n.灯笼，提灯，航标灯；vt.装上提灯
example: 单词 lantern 的例句||||This is a Chinese lantern. 这是中国的灯笼。||||The lantern hanging overhead swung in the wind. 吊在高处的灯在风中摇动。

name: communication
interpret: n.交流；通讯；通信
example: 单词 communication 的例句||||English is a tool for communication. 英语是交流之工具。||||Language is an instrument for communication. 语言是交际的手段。

name: community
interpret: n.公社，团体，社会，（政治）共同体，共有，一致，共同体，（生物）群落
example: 单词 community 的例句||||I work in the community school. 我在社区学校工作。||||There is a bakery in our community. 我们小区有一个面包房。

name: mailbox
interpret: n.邮筒；邮箱
example: 单词 mailbox 的例句||||You can put the newspaper into the mailbox. 你可以把报纸放进邮箱里。||||Please drop these letters in the nearest mailbox. 请把这些信投入最近的邮箱。

name: disk
interpret: n.磁盘，磁碟片
example: 单词 disk 的例句||||The disk may be full. 这张磁碟可能满了。||||You could put the disk on the front desk. 你可以把磁盘放在前台。

name: entertainment
interpret: n.娱乐，乐趣，快乐，招待；娱乐业
example: 单词 entertainment 的例句||||The city offers many forms of entertainment. 这个城市提供各种娱乐。||||Playing card is an entertainment. 打牌是一种娱乐。

name: oil
interpret: n.油，油画颜料；vt.涂油，溶化，vi. 融化；加燃油
example: 单词 oil 的例句||||China is rich in oil resources. 中国的石油资源丰富。||||It might need some oil. 它大概需要一些油。

name: talkative
interpret: adj.喜欢讲话的，健谈的，多嘴的
example: 单词 talkative 的例句||||Ben is the most talkative boy in our class. 本是我们班最健谈的男孩。||||She's a lively, talkative person. 她是个活泼爱说话的人。

name: comedy
interpret: n.喜剧，趣事，趣闻
example: 单词 comedy 的例句||||We are going to see a comedy. 我们要去看一部喜剧。||||That comedy was so funny. 那出喜剧很好笑。

name: schedule
interpret: n.时间表，进度表，计划表，议事日程；vt.预定，编制目录，为某事安排时间
example: 单词 schedule 的例句||||The schedule of tomorrow is Paris. 明天的日程是巴黎。||||This task is behind schedule. 该任务进度落后了。

name: candy
interpret: n.糖果；vt.用糖煮，使结晶为砂糖；vi.结晶为砂糖
example: 单词 candy 的例句||||I'd like a box of candy. 我想要一盒糖果。||||What shall I buy at the candy shop? 我该买什么在水果糖店里？

name: centimeter
interpret: n.厘米[=centimetre]
example: 单词 centimeter 的例句||||A rat can easily go through a three-centimeter hole. 一只鼠能容易地去过一个3厘米的洞。||||The dust under the sofa is a centimeter thick! 沙发底下的灰尘有1厘米那么厚！

name: Danish
interpret: n.丹麦语；adj.丹麦的；丹麦人的；丹麦语的
example: 单词 Danish 的例句||||Few people know Danish in our school. 在我们学校很少人懂丹麦语。||||Welcome to the 1st Danish week in Guangzhou! 首届广州丹麦文化周欢迎您！

name: war
interpret: n.战争；vi.作战
example: 单词 war 的例句||||We ended the Korean war. 我们结束了朝鲜战争。||||The war made many people lose their house and home. 战争使许多人无家可归。

name: champion
interpret: n.冠军，拥护者，战士；vt.保卫，拥护；adj.优胜的
example: 单词 champion 的例句||||The champion is running in lane five. 冠军跑在第五跑道上。||||She has won the title of the world's champion. 她获得了世界冠军的称号。

name: continent
interpret: n.大陆，洲，(the Continent)欧洲大陆
example: 单词 continent 的例句||||Africa is the second largest continent in the world. 非洲是世界第二大洲。||||Asia is the biggest continent. 亚洲是第一大洲。

name: pill
interpret: n.药丸，弹丸，屈辱；vt.将…做成药丸，形成丸状，使服药丸；挫败
example: 单词 pill 的例句||||The child could not get the pill down. 孩子吞不下药片。||||The pill is coated with sugar. 这药丸包了糖衣。

name: president
interpret: n.总统；总裁；校长；院长；会(社)长；主席
example: 单词 president 的例句||||They selected him to be president. 他们选举他为总裁。||||The president's speech lacked sincerity. 校长的演讲缺乏诚意。

name: professor
interpret: n.教授，公开表示信仰的人
example: 单词 professor 的例句||||He is famous as a professor. 他作为教授享有盛名。||||I happen to know that professor. 我正好认识那位教授。

name: ton
interpret: n.吨，货物体积，容积单位
example: 单词 ton 的例句||||Yesterday I bought a ton of coal. 昨天我买了一吨煤。||||This car can carry a load of 1 ton. 这辆汽车载重一吨。

name: attend
interpret: vt.参加，注意，照料；vi.专心，留意，待命
example: 单词 attend 的例句||||Tomorrow I shall attend a meeting. 明天我将参加会议。||||I think I can attend. 我想我能出席。

name: seal
interpret: n.印章，封条，海豹；v.盖印，封闭，猎海豹
example: 单词 seal 的例句||||The seal can swim in the water. 海豹可以在水中游。||||The seal of god is truth. 上帝的印章就是真理。

name: goal
interpret: n.目标，目的；球门；终点；得分
example: 单词 goal 的例句||||I shot the ball into the goal. 我把球踢进球门。||||That was his best goal. 那是他最好的一次得分。

name: instrument
interpret: n.乐器，工具，仪器，器械
example: 单词 instrument 的例句||||Can you play any instrument? 你能演奏什么乐器吗？||||Can she carry this instrument? 她能搬走这仪器吗？

name: shadow
interpret: n.阴影，荫，影子，影像，阴暗，预兆，少许，隐蔽处，庇护；vt.遮蔽，使朦胧，预示
example: 单词 shadow 的例句||||Every light has its shadow. 是灯都有影。|||| The trees throw a shadow on the grass. 树木在草地上投下了阴影。

name: musical
interpret: adj.音乐的，爱好音乐的；悦耳的；有音乐才能的
example: 单词 musical 的例句||||He is a musical child. 他是一个爱好音乐的孩子。||||The piece of bamboo makes a musical sound. 这块竹片能发出悦耳的声音。

name: castle
interpret: n.城堡，象棋中的车；vt.置于城堡中，筑城堡防御
example: 单词 castle 的例句||||We had to give up the castle. 我们不得不放弃这座城堡了。||||He took a photograph of the castle. 他拍了一张这个城堡的照片。

name: string
interpret: n.细绳，线，字符串，索，带子；一串，一行，一列；v.缚，扎，穿，串起，排成一列
example: 单词 string 的例句||||It's a piece of string. 这是一根绳子。||||I need a ball of string. 我需要一团线。

name: wheel
interpret: n.轮子，周期；vt.旋转，装以车轮，转动；vi. 旋转；突然转变方向；盘旋飞行
example: 单词 wheel 的例句||||The wheel must be breaking. 一定是轮子断了。||||Nobody could roll back the wheel of history. 没有人能倒转历史的车轮。

name: giant
interpret: adj.庞大的，巨大的；n.巨人，大力士，巨大的怪物
example: 单词 giant 的例句||||The whale is the giant of the sea. 鲸鱼是海洋中的巨人。||||It is a giant egg. 它是一只巨大的蛋。

name: millimetre
interpret: n.毫米，千分之一米
example: 单词 millimetre 的例句||||One millimetre to the left. 往左一毫米。||||It continued to lean by about 1 millimetre every year. 它一直都在以每年1毫米的速度倾斜。

name: rat
interpret: n.鼠，卑鄙的人，变节者；vi.背叛，捕鼠；vt.弄蓬松，告发
example: 单词 rat 的例句||||The rat is hated by many people. 老鼠被很多人憎恶。||||He stopped up the rat holes. 他塞住了那些老鼠洞。

name: yoghurt
interpret: n.酸乳酪
example: 单词 yoghurt 的例句||||Our bodies need some milk, cheese and yoghurt. 我们的身体需要一些牛奶，乳酪和酸牛奶。||||I only had a strawberry yoghurt for breakfast. 我早餐只吃一个草莓酸奶。

name: forecast
interpret: n./vt.预测；预报
example: 单词 forecast 的例句||||Heavy rain has been forecast for tomorrow. 天气预报明天有大雨。||||I never listen to the weather forecast. 我从来不听气象预报。

name: cycle
interpret: n.周期，循环，自行车；vi.循环，轮转，骑自行车；vt.使循环
example: 单词 cycle 的例句||||The seasons of the year make a cycle. 一年四季构成一个循环。||||Do you cycle to work everyday? 你每天骑自行车上班吗？

name: centimetre
interpret: (美centimeter)n.公分，厘米
example: 单词 centimetre 的例句||||The length of this pencil is 17 centimetres. 这铅笔17厘米长。||||One centimetre is equal to 10 millimetres. 一厘米等于10毫米。

name: kilogramme
interpret: n.(=kilogram)千克；公斤
example: 单词 kilogramme 的例句||||She sells her eggs for 12 yuan every kilogramme. 她的鸡蛋以每公斤12元的价格出售。||||Apple costs five dollars a kilogramme. 苹果每千克5美元。

name: kindergarten
interpret: n.幼儿园 adj.幼儿园的；启蒙阶段的
example: 单词 kindergarten 的例句||||What did you do at kindergarten today? 你今天在幼儿园做了什么？||||Who was your best friend in kindergarten? 在幼儿园谁是你最好的朋友？

name: section
interpret: n.部分，章节，地段；断面，剖面；部门，科；阶层，界；vt.把…分成段
example: 单词 section 的例句||||There is one section of very long road to leave. 有一段很长的路要走。||||How many people work in your section? 你部门有多少人？

name: steak
interpret: n.牛排，鱼排，肉排
example: 单词 steak 的例句||||How would you like your steak? 您喜欢牛排怎么做法？||||I'll try a steak sandwich. 我想尝尝牛排三明治。

name: minibus
interpret: n.小型公共汽车（只坐四人）
example: 单词 minibus 的例句||||Do not leave your seat until the minibus has stopped. 待小巴停稳后，才可离开座位。||||Some children go to school in a minibus. 有些孩子乘坐小型公共汽车去上学。

name: carton
interpret: n.纸盒，牛奶盒，糖果盒
example: 单词 carton 的例句||||Do you have carton boxes for pineapples? 你们有装菠萝的纸箱吗？||||We packed the books in a large carton. 我们把书装进一个大纸板箱中。

name: cafe
interpret: n.小餐馆；咖啡厅
example: 单词 cafe 的例句||||I always go to the cafe to have a rest. 我总是去那家咖啡馆休息。||||Is there a cafe near by? 请问附近有没有咖啡店？

name: slice
interpret: n.薄的切片，一部份；vt.切成薄片，分配；vi.切开；割破
example: 单词 slice 的例句||||Give me a slice of bread please. 请给我一片面包。||||Don't slice the meat so thick. 别把肉切得这么厚。

name: mixture
interpret: n.（不可数）混合；混合物，混合剂
example: 单词 mixture 的例句||||Air is a mixture of gases. 空气是各种气体的混合物。||||White is a mixture of all the colours. 白色是由一切颜色混合而成的。

name: ham
interpret: n.火腿，大腿，笨拙的演员；adj.过火的，做作的；v.演得过火
example: 单词 ham 的例句||||Please give me a can of ham. 请给我一罐火腿。||||The ham is very good today. 今天的火腿很好。

name: needle
interpret: n.针；vt.用针缝，激怒，嘲弄；vi.缝纫
example: 单词 needle 的例句||||The nurse is holding a needle. 护士拿着一支针。||||We sew with needle and thread. 我们用针和线缝东西。

name: compass
interpret: n.指南针，罗盘；圆规；范围，界限
example: 单词 compass 的例句||||Take your map and compass with you. 带上你的地图和指南针。||||Do you have the compass? 你有那个罗盘吗？

name: tin
interpret: n.[化]锡， 马口铁， 罐vt.涂锡于adj.锡制的
example: 单词 tin 的例句||||He bought a tin of pork. 他买了一听猪肉罐头。||||I need another tin of paint. 我还需要一罐油漆。

name: diet
interpret: n.饮食，节食，议会vt.照规定饮食vi. 忌食
example: 单词 diet 的例句||||Are you on a diet again? 你又在节食了吗？||||You need a balanced diet. 你需要均衡的饮食。

name: sandal
interpret: n.凉鞋，草鞋，檀香木；vt.穿以便鞋
example: 单词 sandal 的例句||||Can you fix my broken sandal? 我凉鞋坏了，你能给修修吗？||||Never stand behide women with high-heels, especially when you were with your sandal. 永远都不要站在穿高跟鞋女人的身后，尤其是当你穿凉鞋的时候。

name: relative
interpret: adj.相对的，比较的；n.亲戚，亲属
example: 单词 relative 的例句||||I have no relative or friend here. 我在此没有亲戚朋友。||||He is a relative of mine. 他是我的一个亲戚。

name: decoration
interpret: n.装饰，装饰品；装饰，装璜；勋章，奖章
example: 单词 decoration 的例句||||I liked the beautiful decoration in the shopwindows. 我喜欢橱窗里美丽的装饰品。||||The vase is just for decoration. 那个花瓶只是为了装饰。

name: sew
interpret: vi.缝纫；vt.缝制，缝补
example: 单词 sew 的例句||||Would you sew up this hole in my coat? 把我上衣上的这个洞缝补一下好吗？||||Button holes are very hard to sew. 要缝钮扣洞非常难。

name: feather
interpret: n.羽毛；翎毛；羽状物
example: 单词 feather 的例句||||She is as light as a feather. 她轻得象羽毛。||||It has a black feather. 它有一身黑色的羽毛。

name: length
interpret: n.长度，长；期间，一段；程度，范围
example: 单词 length 的例句||||We need a length of pipe. 我们需要一节管子。||||The length of this pencil is 17 centimetres. 这铅笔17厘米长。

name: harbour
interpret: n.（=harbor）海港
example: 单词 harbour 的例句||||A ship appeared near the harbour. 一只船出现在港口附近。||||The harbour was full of all kinds of ships. 港口泊满了各式各样的船。

name: pin
interpret: n.大头针，针，别针，钉，栓，销子，插头，管脚，琐碎物；vt.将…用针别住，钉住
example: 单词 pin 的例句||||The balloon will pop if you put a pin in it. 如果扎进一颗大头钉，气球就会突然爆开。||||Please give me a safety pin. 请给我一个安全别针。

name: barbecue
interpret: n.（户外的）烤肉；vt.烤肉，烧烤
example: 单词 barbecue 的例句||||The barbecue starts at around six. 烧烤大约六点钟开始。||||Can you make the best barbecue sauce in America? 你能做出美国最好的烧烤酱油吗？

name: boot
interpret: n.长靴，踢，解雇，效用；vt.穿靴，踢，解雇，有用
example: 单词 boot 的例句||||The outline of Italy suggests a boot. 意大利的轮廓像只长筒靴。||||He got the boot for coming late. 他因迟到而被解雇。

name: frightening
interpret: adj.令人恐惧的
example: 单词 frightening 的例句||||The task looks frightening. 看来这任务很吓人。||||I think it's frightening rather than exciting. 刺激什么呀，我觉得太吓人了。

name: narrow
interpret: n.狭窄部份，海峡，隘路；adj.狭窄的，精密的，有限的；v.变窄，使...狭窄
example: 单词 narrow 的例句||||The bridge is too narrow for two cars to pass. 这桥太窄，不能并排通过两辆车。||||The captain sailed his ship through the narrow channel. 船长驾驶他的船穿过了狭窄的航道。

name: raw
interpret: adj.生的，未煮过的，未加工的
example: 单词 raw 的例句||||I don't like raw meat. 我不喜欢生的肉。||||Can you eat raw fish? 你能吃生鱼片吗？

name: breathe
interpret: vi.呼吸；vt.轻声说，流露感情，注入
example: 单词 breathe 的例句||||We have to breathe in and out so many times a minute. 我们每分钟都得呼吸那么多次。||||How does a fish breathe under water? 鱼在水里怎么呼吸？

name: cave
interpret: n.洞穴；窑洞
example: 单词 cave 的例句||||Where's the entrance to the cave? 这个洞穴的入口在哪里？||||A great cave opened out before them. 一个大洞穴展现在他们面前。

name: broken
interpret: adj.坏掉的，患病的，被制服的，断掉的；vbl.break的过去分词
example: 单词 broken 的例句||||He is mending a broken cup. 他在修补破杯子。||||Something was broken in my engine. 我的发动机里有个东西损坏了。

name: cigarette
interpret: n.香烟，纸烟，烟卷
example: 单词 cigarette 的例句||||Help yourself to a cigarette. 请随便用香烟吧。||||Please put that cigarette out. 请把烟灭掉。

name: district
interpret: n.区，地区，行政区；vt.区，区域，地区
example: 单词 district 的例句||||This district has three factories. 这个地区有三个工厂。||||Take me to the shopping district. 载我到购物区。

name: dust
interpret: n.灰尘，尘埃，粉末，花粉，土，骚乱vt.拂去灰尘，撒，弄成粉末vi. 拂去灰尘
example: 单词 dust 的例句||||She swept the dust out. 她把灰尘扫出去。|||| A lot of dust had blown in. 吹进来许多灰尘。

name: diamond
interpret: n.钻石，像钻石的物质，菱形，纸牌的方块，棒球内场；vt.用钻石装饰
example: 单词 diamond 的例句||||Did you see the diamond pin she got for Christmas? 你看到她为圣诞节买的钻石饰针了吗？||||The ring has a diamond in it. 戒指上镶着一块钻石。

name: businesswoman
interpret: n.商人（女）；女企业家
example: 单词 businesswoman 的例句||||I don't really think of myself as a businesswoman. 我并没有真的认为自己是商界女性。||||She is a successful businesswoman. 她是一位很成功的女企业家。

name: board
interpret: n.董事会；木板；甲板；膳食；vi.寄宿；vt.上（飞机、车、船等）；用板盖上；给提供膳宿；
example: 单词 board 的例句||||We'd better board the train now. 我们最好现在上火车。||||Passengers should board the train now. 旅客现在应该上火车了。

name: electricity
interpret: n.电；电学
example: 单词 electricity 的例句||||This room is lighted by electricity. 这个房间用电照明。||||We use electricity to run machines. 我们使用电力来运行机器。

name: gently
interpret: adv.轻轻的；温和的
example: 单词 gently 的例句||||I should knock at the door gently. 我应该轻轻地敲门。||||Push your chair in gently. 轻轻把椅子推进去。

name: granddaughter
interpret: n.孙女，外孙女
example: 单词 granddaughter 的例句||||You're a wonderful granddaughter. 真是个好孙女。||||His granddaughter works in medicine. 他的孙女是医学行业的。

name: handkerchief
interpret: n.手帕，头巾，围巾
example: 单词 handkerchief 的例句||||Please remember to bring your handkerchief tomorrow. 记住明天把手绢带来。||||I bring a handkerchief everyday. 我每天都带手绢。

name: heavily
interpret: adv.猛烈地；大量地；厉害地
example: 单词 heavily 的例句||||They fined him heavily. 他们重罚了他。||||It snowed heavily last night. 昨夜的雪下得很大。

name: hardworking
interpret: adj.努力工作的
example: 单词 hardworking 的例句||||He found her a hardworking girl. 他发现她是一个努力工作的女孩。||||He is also very hardworking. 他学习也非常刻苦。

name: nephew
interpret: n.侄子，外甥
example: 单词 nephew 的例句||||Which boy is your nephew? 哪个男孩是你侄子？||||My nephew was born in America. 我侄子出生在美国。

name: niece
interpret: n.侄女，外甥女
example: 单词 niece 的例句||||You're my niece's idol. 你是我侄女的偶像。||||Your niece knows we're coming. 你侄女知道我们要来。

name: object
interpret: n.物，物体，目标，宾语；vi.反对；vt. 提出…作为反对的理由
example: 单词 object 的例句||||Now he had no object in life. 现在他没有生活的目标。||||I object strongly to the idea. 我坚决反对这种主张。

name: handwriting
interpret: n.书法
example: 单词 handwriting 的例句||||All of us like Tom's handwriting. 我们都喜欢汤姆的字迹。||||Your handwriting is really beautiful. 你的书法真漂亮。

name: monitor
interpret: n. 班长；显示屏；[计]显示器；vt. 监控；记录；测定；vi. 监视
example: 单词 monitor 的例句||||Because computers will monitor their lives. 因为电脑监控他们的生活。||||He is our monitor. 他是我们的班长。

name: boxing
interpret: n.拳击（运动）
example: 单词 boxing 的例句||||They are watching a boxing match. 他们在观看拳击比赛。||||Boxing is a dangerous sport. 拳击是一项危险运动。

name: outing
interpret: n.郊游，远足；adj.远足适用的
example: 单词 outing 的例句||||I'll go on an outing with some friends. 我与朋友去郊游。||||Thank you for the wonderful outing. 感谢你们组织的郊游。

name: mutton
interpret: n.羊肉；羊；娼妓
example: 单词 mutton 的例句||||People like to have mutton in winter. 冬天人们喜欢吃羊肉。||||Let me give you a little mutton. 让我给你一点羊肉。

name: eggplant
interpret: n.茄子
example: 单词 eggplant 的例句||||He likes to eat eggplant. 他喜欢吃茄子。||||Eggplant is good to health. 茄子有益于健康。

name: active
interpret: adj.活跃的，积极的
example: 单词 active 的例句||||I'll become more active. 我要变得更加积极。||||She is the most active member in our group. 她绝对是我们组最活跃的成员。

name: tasty
interpret: adj.好吃的，可口的
example: 单词 tasty 的例句||||What a tasty pie! 多好吃的派啊！||||This fish is very tasty. 这种鱼很好吃。

name: salty
interpret: adj.咸的；含盐的
example: 单词 salty 的例句||||Salty food makes one thirsty. 咸的食物令人口渴。||||Do you know tears are salty? 你知道泪水是咸的吗？

name: curtain
interpret: n.帐，幕，窗帘，门帘，幕布；vt.装帘子于，遮掉
example: 单词 curtain 的例句||||Please let down the curtain. 请把窗帘放下来。||||When does the curtain rise? 幕布什么时间升起呢？

name: path
interpret: n.路线，轨道，路程，小路，小径；abbr.(=pathological)；
example: 单词 path 的例句||||A path lies through the woods. 一条小路穿过树林。||||She walked along the path. 她沿着小路走去。

name: armchair
interpret: n.扶手椅；adj.脱离实际的；安逸的
example: 单词 armchair 的例句||||He sat in the armchair reading a newspaper. 他坐在扶手椅里读报。||||This armchair is made of bamboo. 这个扶手椅是用竹子做成的。

name: ox
interpret: n.牛；公牛
example: 单词 ox 的例句||||He drove the ox hard. 他使劲地赶牛。||||He is as strong as an ox. 他体壮如牛。

name: monster
interpret: n.怪物；巨人，巨兽；残忍的人；adj.巨大的，庞大的
example: 单词 monster 的例句||||The whale is a monster! 这头鲸鱼是个怪物！||||The monster hears a noise. 那个妖怪听见了噪音。

name: goldfish
interpret: n.金鱼
example: 单词 goldfish 的例句||||The goldfish swam round and round in their tiny bowls. 金鱼在小小的鱼缸里一圈圈地游来游去。||||Maybe you should get a small pet, like goldfish. 也许你应该养一只像金鱼那样的小宠物。

name: clinic
interpret: n.诊所；临床讲课；特殊病例的分析讨论课
example: 单词 clinic 的例句||||You'd better go and see your doctor. Let me help you to the clinic. 你最好去看医生，我来帮你去诊所。||||The doctor went into the clinic and began to work. 医生走进诊所，开始看病。

name: jogging
interpret: n.(运动的)慢跑
example: 单词 jogging 的例句||||Every morning he likes jogging. 每天早晨他都喜欢慢跑。||||How often do you go jogging? 你多久慢跑一次？

name: sidewalk
interpret: n.人行道；（=pavement）（英）
example: 单词 sidewalk 的例句||||I happened to meet him on the sidewalk. 我碰巧在人行道上碰到他。||||I found a wallet on the sidewalk. 我在人行道上发现一个钱包。

name: bakery
interpret: n.面包房，面包店；烘烤食品（面包、糕点等的总称）
example: 单词 bakery 的例句||||I bought a cake from the bakery. 我在面包店买了个蛋糕。||||There's a bakery near our house. 在我家附近有一个面包店。

name: Disneyland
interpret: n.迪斯尼乐园
example: 单词 Disneyland 的例句||||Excuse me, is this the right way to Disneyland? 劳驾，这是去迪斯尼乐园的路吗？||||Can you tell me something about Disneyland? 请您给我讲迪斯尼乐园的情况好吗？

name: nest
interpret: n.巢，窝，休息所，隐匿处；vi.筑巢，找鸟巢；vt.为…设窝，使套入
example: 单词 nest 的例句||||The home is a warm nest. 家是一个温暖的巢。||||This is an old nest. 这是一个旧的鸟窝。

name: ambulance
interpret: n.救护车
example: 单词 ambulance 的例句||||Do we need an ambulance? 我们要辆救护车吗？||||Could you call an ambulance? 你可以叫辆救护车吗？

name: block
interpret: n.街区；vt.阻塞；adj. 成批的，大块的；交通堵塞的
example: 单词 block 的例句||||We lived on the same block. 我们住在同一街区。||||We walked round the block. 我们绕着这个街区散步。

name: branch
interpret: n.分支，树枝；vt/vi.分支，分岔
example: 单词 branch 的例句||||The bird settles on a branch. 鸟儿栖息在枝上。||||The olive branch stands for peace. 橄榄枝象征着和平。

name: dive
interpret: n.跳入，潜入 vi.下潜，跳水
example: 单词 dive 的例句||||Could you show me how to dive? 你教我跳水好吗？||||She made a beautiful dive. 她作了一次漂亮的跳水。

name: engine
interpret: n.引擎，发动机，机车，机械；vt.安装发动机于
example: 单词 engine 的例句||||The engine started up suddenly. 发动机突然发动起来了。||||The engine will not fire. 这发动机发动不起来。

name: sharp
interpret: adj.刺耳的，锋利的，急剧的；adv.[时刻]正，准；夏普(财富500强公司之一，总部所在地日本，主要经营电子电气)
example: 单词 sharp 的例句||||This knife isn't sharp. 这把餐刀不锋利。||||Dogs have sharp sense of smell. 狗有敏锐的嗅觉。

name: flour
interpret: n.面粉，粉；粉状物质
example: 单词 flour 的例句||||We make flour into bread. 我们用面粉做出面包。||||The rats have eaten holes in those bags of flour. 大老鼠把那些面粉袋嗑出了窟窿。

name: corn
interpret: n.玉米，小麦，谷物
example: 单词 corn 的例句||||The corn was grown in America. 这个玉米是在美国种植的。||||Was the camel carrying corn? 那头骆驼驮的是谷物吗？

name: pond
interpret: n.池塘；vt.堵河成湖；vi.形成池塘
example: 单词 pond 的例句||||Tom walked around the pond. 汤姆绕着池子走。||||The pond was iced over. 池子给冰封起来了。

name: trunk
interpret: n.树干，躯干，(汽车后部)行李箱；象鼻
example: 单词 trunk 的例句||||Put them in the small trunk. 把它们装进箱子。||||Parts of the trunk can regrow. 部分树干可以再生。

name: bench
interpret: n.长凳，工作台
example: 单词 bench 的例句||||There's a bench under the tree. 树下有一条长凳。||||In good weather, l ook for a quiet park bench. 在好天气时，找一条安静的公园长凳。

name: thunder
interpret: n.雷电，雷声；vt.打雷，大声喊出；vi.打雷；怒喝
example: 单词 thunder 的例句||||Did you hear the thunder in the night? 你晚上听见打雷了吗？||||The thunder scared the children. 雷声吓着了孩子。

name: sail
interpret: n.帆，乘船航行；vt.乘船航行，浮游，启航；vi.驾船航行
example: 单词 sail 的例句||||Ships can sail round the world. 轮船能做环球航行。||||Ships can sail on the sea. 轮船能在海上航行。

name: temple
interpret: n.庙宇，寺院；太阳穴
example: 单词 temple 的例句||||There is a temple on the hill. 山上有座庙。||||You will see a temple. 你会看到一座寺庙。

name: tongue
interpret: n.舌头，语言，说话方式
example: 单词 tongue 的例句||||I can hardly move my tongue. 我舌头不太能动。||||The doctor looked at her tongue. 医生诊看了她的舌头。

name: bake
interpret: vt.烤，烘，焙；vi 烘面包；被烤干；受热
example: 单词 bake 的例句||||I will bake a delicious cake for her. 我将为她烤制美味的蛋糕。||||The bread will not bake if the fire is too small. 如果火太小，面包就烤不成。

name: nod
interpret: n.点头，打盹，摆动；vi.点头，打盹；vt. 点头；点头表示
example: 单词 nod 的例句||||The kids smile and nod. 孩子们微笑着点头。||||At last she began to nod. 最后, 她开始打瞌睡了。

name: invitation
interpret: n.请帖；邀请
example: 单词 invitation 的例句||||Thank you for your invitation. 谢谢你的邀请。||||You didn't send me an invitation! 你没送我请帖!

name: jungle
interpret: n.丛林，密林；原始林
example: 单词 jungle 的例句||||The lion is the king of the jungle. 狮子是丛林之王。||||Wild animals live in the jungle. 野生动物们生活在丛林中。

name: guard
interpret: n.守卫者，警戒；vt.保卫，看守，当心；vi.警惕
example: 单词 guard 的例句||||A guard was placed at the door. 门口设了一个警卫。||||The guard stopped him from going through the gate. 警卫不让他通过大门。

name: master
interpret: n.(男)主人，雇主；能手，名家，大师；[M-]硕士；v.精通，掌握
example: 单词 master 的例句||||He is studying for a master's degree at Dalian University. 他正在大连大学攻读硕士学位。||||English is not easy to master. 英语不易掌握。

name: comfort
interpret: n.安慰，舒适，安慰者；vt.安慰，使（痛苦等）缓和
example: 单词 comfort 的例句||||The child turned to its mother for comfort. 那孩子向母亲寻求安慰。||||She lives there in comfort. 她舒适地生活在那里。

name: absent
interpret: adj.缺席的，缺少的；vt.使缺席；prep.没有
example: 单词 absent 的例句||||I was absent last week. 我上星期缺席了。||||Some students are absent today. 今天有些学生缺席了。

name: hillside
interpret: n.(小山)山腰；山坡
example: 单词 hillside 的例句||||Rocks and stones rolled down the hillside. 石块沿山坡滚下。||||The still water of the lake mirrored the hillside. 平静的湖水映出山坡。

name: ripe
interpret: adj.熟的，成熟的，时机成熟的；成年的，年高的
example: 单词 ripe 的例句||||This kind of fruit grow ripe in spring. 这种水果在春季成熟。||||None of the apples are ripe. 这些苹果都没熟。

name: expert
interpret: n.专家，能手；adj.熟练的，有经验的；专门的，内行的
example: 单词 expert 的例句||||She is an expert in training animals. 她是驯兽专家。||||What is a foreign expert card? 什么是外国专家证？

name: gardener
interpret: n.园丁，花匠，园艺家
example: 单词 gardener 的例句||||After the old gardener died, the garden grew wild. 老园丁死后，花园就慢慢荒芜了。||||I'll have the gardener plant some trees. 我要让园丁种些树。

name: wedding
interpret: n.婚礼，结婚，结婚仪式，结合
example: 单词 wedding 的例句||||I have to attend a wedding. 我必须去参加婚礼。||||Their wedding was very quiet. 他们的婚礼很平淡。

name: weed
interpret: n.杂草，野草；vi.除草；vt.除…的草，剔除
example: 单词 weed 的例句||||They pulled up the weed by the root. 他们把野草连根拔起。||||Please help me to weed the garden. 请帮我清除园里的草。

name: blame
interpret: vt.责备，责怪，把…归咎于；n.过错，责任
example: 单词 blame 的例句||||Why don't you blame me? 为什么你不责怪我？||||You have only yourself to blame. 你只能怪你自己。

name: punish
interpret: vt.惩罚，处罚；vi.惩罚
example: 单词 punish 的例句||||Don't punish the boy for no good reason. 不要莫明其妙地惩罚孩子。||||How do your parents punish you? 你的父母如何处罚你？

name: relationship
interpret: n.关系，联系；家属关系，亲属关系
example: 单词 relationship 的例句||||Is there any relationship between them? 它们之间有联系吗?||||Robert has a friendly relationship with his customers. 罗伯特和他的客户之间关系处得很好。

name: climate
interpret: n.气候，民意状况，社会趋势，风土
example: 单词 climate 的例句||||Some plants will not seed in a cold climate. 有些植物在寒冷的气候条件下不能结果实。||||They have decided to remove to a warm climate. 他们已决定搬到一个气候温暖的地方居住。

name: quarrel
interpret: n.吵架，反目，怨言；vi.吵架，争论，挑剔
example: 单词 quarrel 的例句||||He fell into a quarrel with his classmate. 他和同学吵了起来。||||What brought the quarrel about? 争吵是怎么引起的？

name: schoolgirl
interpret: n.(中小学的)女生
example: 单词 schoolgirl 的例句||||This schoolgirl likes to do some needlework. 这个女学生喜欢做针线活。||||I was a twelve-year-old schoolgirl. 我当时是一个十二岁的女学生。

name: fault
interpret: n.过错；缺点；故障；毛病；vt.挑剔；vi.弄错
example: 单词 fault 的例句||||It's not our fault. 这不是我方过错。||||I cannot pass over his fault. 我不能宽恕他的过失。

name: goat
interpret: n.山羊，替罪羊；坏人，色鬼
example: 单词 goat 的例句||||A goat is different from a sheep. 山羊与绵羊不一样。||||They have goats and sell goat's milk. 他们养山羊，卖羊奶。

name: canteen
interpret: n.军中福利社，临时流动餐馆，小卖部
example: 单词 canteen 的例句||||John eats in the canteen. 约翰在食堂吃午饭. ||||When is the canteen closing? 这家餐厅什么时候结束营业？

name: statue
interpret: n.塑像；雕像
example: 单词 statue 的例句||||Whose statue is that over there? 那边的雕像是谁？||||He had molded a statue. 他已塑了一尊塑像。

name: earthquake
interpret: n.地震
example: 单词 earthquake 的例句||||The earthquake is a disaster! 地震是一种灾难！||||After the earthquake only a few houses were left standing. 地震过后只有几幢房屋还立着。

name: brand
interpret: n.商标，烙印，污名；vt.打上烙印，铭记；玷污
example: 单词 brand 的例句||||This is a very good brand of tea. 这种牌子的茶叶很好。||||What brand would you like? 您要什么牌子的？

name: ash
interpret: n.灰，灰烬
example: 单词 ash 的例句||||Some ash fell into my cup. 一些灰掉进我的杯子里了。||||The fire reduced the house to a mass of ash. 大火把房子烧成了灰烬。

name: shopkeeper
interpret: n.店主，零售商人
example: 单词 shopkeeper 的例句||||Tom's father is a shopkeeper. 汤姆的父亲是店主。||||The man in gray pants is the shopkeeper. 那穿灰色长裤的男人是店老板。

name: tax
interpret: n.税，重负；vt.课以税，使...负重荷，斥责
example: 单词 tax 的例句||||How much tax do they take out of your monthly pay? 他们从你的月薪中抽出多少税？||||The government has laid on a new tax. 政府已征收新税。

name: fare
interpret: n.费用，食物；vi.进展，进步，经营
example: 单词 fare 的例句||||How much is the fare to the airport? 到机场的车费是多少？||||How do you like the school fare? 你认为学校伙食怎么样？

name: port
interpret: n.港口，埠，舱门，避风港；左舷；炮眼，枪眼；举止，意义；vt.左转舵
example: 单词 port 的例句||||The ship sailed into port. 那艘船驶进了港口。||||The new port has been opened to foreign ships. 新建的港口已向外轮开放。

name: commander
interpret: n.司令官，指挥官
example: 单词 commander 的例句||||Your commander is a fool. 你的指挥官是个傻瓜。||||The commander was recalled from the frontline. 司令员从前线被召回。

name: independence
interpret: n.独立，自主；足够维持生活的收入；vt.为做索引；vi.做索引
example: 单词 independence 的例句||||Our people thirst for independence. 我们的人民渴望独立。||||These plans encourage the elderly to retain their independence. 这些计划鼓励老年人保持自立。

name: announcement
interpret: n.宣告；公告；告示
example: 单词 announcement 的例句||||This is a security announcement. 这是一个安全公告。||||I have an announcement to make. 我要宣布一件事。

name: recognize
interpret: vt.认出，认可，承认，公认，识别，赏识；vi.承认，具结
example: 单词 recognize 的例句||||How will I recognize you? 我怎样才能认出你？||||I want to recognize Mr. Green. 我想要认识格林先生。

name: bore
interpret: n.令人讨厌的人，怒潮，枪膛，孔；vt.使烦扰；钻孔；vi.钻孔
example: 单词 bore 的例句||||Will it bore you to hear that story again? 再听一遍那个故事会使你厌烦吗？||||He used a drill to bore a hole in the door. 他用钻在门上钻孔。

name: electrical
interpret: adj.电的，有关电的
example: 单词 electrical 的例句||||We can transmute water power into electrical power. 我们能将水力变成电力。||||He told his children to stay away from dangerous electrical things. 他叫他的孩子们不要接近危险的电器。

name: chip
interpret: n.食物等的薄片；晶片，芯片，碎片；vt.削，切，削成碎片，使摔倒，凿；vi. 碎裂
example: 单词 chip 的例句||||There's a chip in this cup. 这个杯子里有一个碎片。||||The chip is the most valuable part in the computer. 芯片是计算机中最贵重的部分。

name: grasp
interpret: n.把握，抓紧，抓，柄，控制，理解；vt.抓住，紧握，领会；vi.抓
example: 单词 grasp 的例句||||Don't want to grasp my hand! 不要抓我的手啊！||||I can't grasp this maths question. 我不理解这道数学题。

name: cash
interpret: n.现金，现款；vt.兑换现款，付现款
example: 单词 cash 的例句||||Could you cash these chips? 可以兑现这些筹码吗？||||I never carry much cash with me. 我从不多带现款。

name: tendency
interpret: n.倾向，趋势；脾性，癖好
example: 单词 tendency 的例句||||His health shows a tendency to improve. 他的健康有改善的趋向。||||Prices show a tendency to increase. 物价呈现上升的趋势。

name: fireworks
interpret: n.烟火（firework的复数形式）
example: 单词 fireworks 的例句||||Children enjoy the fireworks display. 孩子们喜爱看烟火。||||Kids like to set off fireworks. 孩子们爱放烟花。

name: tide
interpret: n.海潮，潮汐
example: 单词 tide 的例句||||The bright moon over the sea rises with the tide. 海上明月共潮生。||||They were cut off by the tide. 他们被潮水所阻隔。

name: curious
interpret: adj.好奇的，求知的，古怪的
example: 单词 curious 的例句||||I heard a curious sound in the room. 我在房间里听到奇怪的声音。||||He puts forward so many curious questions. 他提出这么多稀奇古怪的问题。

name: bend
interpret: n.弯；拐角；屈服；vt.（bent，bent）使弯曲，使屈服；vi.弯身；弯腰
example: 单词 bend 的例句||||Can we bend the ruler? 我们可以把尺子弄弯吗？||||Nobody could bend me to his will. 谁也不能使我屈从他的意志。

name: fasten
interpret: vt.拴紧，使固定，系，强加于；vi.固定，系紧，抓紧
example: 单词 fasten 的例句||||Do you fasten the safety belt when you drive? 你开车时系安全带吗？||||Fasten the horse to the tree. 把马拴在树上。

name: neat
interpret: adj.整洁的，爱整洁的，利索的，简洁的
example: 单词 neat 的例句||||She always kept her room neat. 她总是保持房间整洁。||||Keep your exercise-books neat and clean. 练习本要保持整洁干净。

name: microwave
interpret: n.微波，微波炉
example: 单词 microwave 的例句||||Microwave is a time-saving cooker. 微波炉是一种节约时间的厨具。||||She put the soup in the microwave. 她把汤放进微波炉里。

name: sink
interpret: n.接收端，沟渠，污水槽；vi.下沉，消沉，陷于；vt.使下沉；挖掘；使低落
example: 单词 sink 的例句||||During the journey, their boat began to sink. 途中他们的小船开始下沉。||||Wood does not sink in water. 木头在水中不会沉没。

name: stove
interpret: n.炉；窑；温室，干燥室；vt.以火炉烤；vbl.stave的过去式和过去分词
example: 单词 stove 的例句||||He cooks his meal with a gas stove. 他用煤气炉做饭。||||The stove is smoking badly. 那炉子烟冒得很厉害。

name: chart
interpret: n.图表，图解，海图；vt.制成图表
example: 单词 chart 的例句||||The chart shows an up trend of meat prices. 图表显示肉价呈上升趋势。||||He copied the chart from a book. 他从一本书上复印了那个图表。

name: seek
interpret: vt.寻求，寻找，探索，追求，搜索，请求；vi.寻找，搜索
example: 单词 seek 的例句||||Don't be afraid to seek help. 不要害怕去寻求帮助。||||He went to seek his lawyer's advice. 他去请教律师。

name: ad
interpret: abbr.(advertisement的缩写)广告；n.(缩)广告
example: 单词 ad 的例句||||That ad really makes me angry. 那广告真叫我发火。||||We put an ad in the paper. 我们在报纸上刊登了一则广告。

name: pine
interpret: n.松树；vi.消瘦，憔悴，渴望 ；（unix操作系统下的一种信件处理程序）
example: 单词 pine 的例句||||There are many pine trees in the park. 公园里有许多松树。||||Which of these trees are pine trees? 这些树中哪些是松树？

name: revision
interpret: n.修订版，校订，修正，修订本
example: 单词 revision 的例句||||The students are being kept at school for a revision. 老师把学生留在学校订正作业。||||I have got the revision of his dictionary. 我得到了他编的词典的修订本。

name: washing
interpret: n.洗，洗涤，洗衣，洗脸，洗澡，冲洗，冲刷
example: 单词 washing 的例句||||A washing machine is run by a small electric motor. 洗衣机由一台小电动机驱动。||||She hung the washing on the line to dry. 她把洗好的衣服晾在绳子上。

name: strike
interpret: vt./vi.(struck；struck/striken)击打；打动
example: 单词 strike 的例句||||The whip is not used to strike him. 鞭子不是用来打他的。||||She found a chance to strike at Cage. 她找到一个打击凯奇的机会。

name: platform
interpret: n.平台，月台，讲台，坛
example: 单词 platform 的例句||||Which platform do I go? 我该上哪个站台？||||Your train is waiting at Platform 5. 你要坐的那列火车在第五号站台。

name: indeed
interpret: adv.真正地，实际上；确实，实在；当然，固然；甚至；真的
example: 单词 indeed 的例句||||I thank you very much indeed for this interview. 我十分感谢您这次接见。||||I didn't mind. Indeed, I was pleased. 我不在意，甚至还很高兴。

name: seaside
interpret: adj.海边(的)，海滨(的)；n.海边
example: 单词 seaside 的例句||||Let's go to the seaside and take a walk. 我们去海边走走吧。||||I lived in the seaside all the summer. 整个夏天我都住在海边。

name: comb
interpret: n.头梳，鸡冠；vt.梳头发，梳毛；vi.（浪）涌起
example: 单词 comb 的例句||||Don't forget to comb your hair before you go out. 不要忘记临出门梳梳头。||||We use a comb to tidy our hair. 我们用梳子来梳理头发。

name: crow
interpret: n.鸦；乌鸦
example: 单词 crow 的例句||||Oh! The crow has a piece of meat. It looks great. 哦！乌鸦有一块肉。看起来不错呀。||||His hair was as dark as a crow's wing. 他的头发象乌鸦翅膀一样乌黑。

name: swallow
interpret: n.燕子；vt.吞下，咽下，忍受；vi.咽口水
example: 单词 swallow 的例句||||She likes to watch the swallow flying. 她喜欢看燕子飞。||||It's hard to swallow. 这真是难以下咽。

name: hunter
interpret: n.猎人；搜索者
example: 单词 hunter 的例句||||He's a real hunter. 他是个真正的猎手。||||He is a patient hunter. 他是一个耐心的猎手。

name: journey
interpret: n.旅行，旅程；路程
example: 单词 journey 的例句||||She will give up this journey. 她将放弃这次旅行。||||The journey home was great fun. 回家的旅程非常有趣。

name: coast
interpret: n.海岸，海滨，滑坡；vt.沿海岸而行；vi.下滑
example: 单词 coast 的例句||||They're holidaying on the west coast. 他们正在西海岸度假。||||There are thousands of villages on the coast. 在沿海有上千座村庄。

name: typical
interpret: adj.典型的，象征的，有代表性的
example: 单词 typical 的例句||||This is typical Chinese English. 这是典型的中式英语。||||It is a typical Persian garden. 这是个典型的波斯式花园。

name: self
interpret: n.自己，自我，本性，本质，私心，本人；vt.使近亲繁殖
example: 单词 self 的例句||||Everybody should do good self work. 每人必须做好自己的工作。||||By doing that he showed his true self. 他那样做显示了他的本性。

name: luggage
interpret: n.行李，行装
example: 单词 luggage 的例句||||Have you packed your luggage? 你打包行李了吗？||||Will you please keep an eye on my luggage? 劳驾帮我看一下行李。

name: typist
interpret: n.打字员
example: 单词 typist 的例句||||Place the girl as a typist. 让这个女孩做打字员吧。||||She worked as a typist in a law firm. 她在一家律师事务所当打字员。

name: thread
interpret: n.线，纤维；思路，线索；vt.穿线于，穿过；成线；vi.通过；穿透过
example: 单词 thread 的例句||||I've lost the thread of the story. 我丢失了此故事的线索。||||The needle-eye is too small to hold the thread. 针眼太小线穿不进去。

name: employ
interpret: vt.雇用，用，使用；n.雇用
example: 单词 employ 的例句||||How many worker do you employ at your factory? 你们厂雇用多少工人？||||We only employ female workers. 我们只雇用女工。

name: float
interpret: vi.浮动，飘动，散播，摇摆，动摇；n.漂流物，浮舟，漂浮，浮萍，彩车
example: 单词 float 的例句||||Oil will float on water. 油总是浮在水面上。||||When you're tired of swimming just float for a while. 你游累了就漂浮一会儿。

name: mystery
interpret: n.神秘，奥秘，秘密，玄妙，不可思议的事
example: 单词 mystery 的例句||||He often tells stories full of mystery. 他常讲些充满神秘色彩的故事。||||The mystery was never solved. 这个奥秘始终未得到解释。

name: wire
interpret: n.电线，电报，电信，铁丝网，金属丝；vt.用金属丝卷起，拍电报；vi. 打电报
example: 单词 wire 的例句||||They will wire the new house for electricity. 他们将给新房屋安装电线。||||Be careful, this wire is live. 当心，这根电线有电。

name: tip
interpret: n.顶，尖端，梢，末端；倾斜；垃圾场；小费；轻击；指点；秘密消息；vt.装顶端；使倾斜，使翻倒，泄露；告诫；暗示；给...小费，轻击；vi.倾斜，翻倒，倾覆，踮脚走，给小费
example: 单词 tip 的例句||||She nearly forgot to give him a tip for his service. 她几乎忘记给他的服务付小费。||||I have his name on the tip of my tongue. 我几乎想起他的名字。

name: beg
interpret: vt.乞求，乞讨；恳求，请求；vi. 乞讨；请求
example: 单词 beg 的例句||||He has to beg on the street to survive. 他为了生存，不得不在街头乞讨。||||I beg you to pay attention. 我请你们注意听课。

name: somehow
interpret: adv.以某种方式，不知怎么搞地
example: 单词 somehow 的例句||||Somehow, I never got the chance to learn. 不知怎么的，我从来都没有学的机会。||||But somehow, he got out. He's alive. 可不知怎么的，他还活着出来了。

name: author
interpret: n.作者，创造者；vt.创造，写作
example: 单词 author 的例句||||She is a very famous author in America. 在美国她是一位大名鼎鼎的作家。||||The author of this popular novel is blind. 这本畅销小说的著作人是位盲人。

name: bomb
interpret: n.炸弹，爆炸，爆炸性事件；vt.投弹于，轰炸；vi.轰炸，投弹；失败
example: 单词 bomb 的例句||||It is an atomic bomb. 这是一个原子弹。||||The bomb blew the windows out. 炸弹炸毁了窗户。

name: swear
interpret: vt.发誓，宣誓，咒骂，使宣誓；vi. 发誓，诅咒；n.诅咒，誓言
example: 单词 swear 的例句||||I swear I'll break you. 我发誓要搞垮你。||||I swear it's true! 我起誓这是真的！

name: fond
interpret: adj.喜爱的，多情的，喜欢的
example: 单词 fond 的例句||||Volleyball is a sport of which I am very fond. 排球是我很喜欢的运动。||||I was fond of playing on the beach when I was young. 小的时候, 我喜欢在河滩上玩耍。

name: variety
interpret: n.（不可数）多种多样，各种不同的；（可数）种类
example: 单词 variety 的例句||||The variety of goods in this shop is rich. 这家商店货物品种丰富。||||This variety of dog is very useful for hunting. 这种狗对狩猎很有用。

name: background
interpret: n.背景，后台，不重要或不引人注目的地方或位置
example: 单词 background 的例句||||With your background, you should walk in to that job. 有你这样的背景，你会轻而易举地获得那份工作。||||They will check into his background. 他们将调查他的背景。

name: fellow
interpret: n.人，家伙；伙伴，同事；对等者，对手；一对中之一，配对物；adj.同伴的，同事的
example: 单词 fellow 的例句||||I can't stand that fellow. 我不能容忍那家伙。||||Who's that old fellow? 那个老家伙是谁？

name: circus
interpret: n.马戏团，马戏，竞技场
example: 单词 circus 的例句||||The children were all eyes at the circus. 孩子们目不转睛地观看马戏表演。||||Can we go to the circus? 我们可以去看马戏吗？

name: stupid
interpret: adj.愚蠢的，笨拙的，麻木的，无趣味的；n.傻瓜
example: 单词 stupid 的例句||||The boy is too stupid. 那个男孩太笨了。||||He must be really stupid. 那他一定很傻。

name: bottom
interpret: n.底部;屁股，臀部；adj.底部的
example: 单词 bottom 的例句||||The bottom of the cup is broken. 这杯子的底破了。||||She hit the child's bottom. 她打孩子的屁股。

name: neighbourhood
interpret: (美neighborhood) n.四邻；邻近地区
example: 单词 neighbourhood 的例句||||Our neighbourhood police are very friendly. 我们邻近的警察非常友善。||||She is a good aunt to all the children in the neighbourhood. 她是街坊上所有孩子的好阿姨。

name: beautifully
interpret: adv.极好地；优美地
example: 单词 beautifully 的例句||||You play the piano beautifully. 你钢琴弹得真漂亮。||||He struck the ball beautifully. 他这个球打得极漂亮。

name: extra
interpret: adj.额外的，外加的；特大的
example: 单词 extra 的例句||||We do not ask for extra pay. 我们不要求额外报酬。||||You have to pay extra for breakfast. 早餐你要另外付费。

name: collection
interpret: n.收藏品；收集物；募捐；文集，数集，（商品的）系列
example: 单词 collection 的例句||||He has a large collection of stamps. 他有大量的邮票收藏。||||I have a large collection of CDs. 我采集了许多唱片。

name: value
interpret: n.价值，价格，有用性，重要性；[pl.]价值观念，标准
example: 单词 value 的例句||||This lesson adds to the value of the book. 这一课增加了这本书的价值。||||People do not know the value of health till they lose it. 人们直到失去健康，才知道健康的可贵。

name: measure
interpret: n.尺寸；措施；vt.测量；测度
example: 单词 measure 的例句||||Measure the body temperature before work each day. 员工每天开始工作前要量度体温。||||We measure the temperature with a thermometer. 我们用温度计测量温度。

name: tale
interpret: n.故事，谎言，谣言，陈述，叙述
example: 单词 tale 的例句||||This tale is taken from real life. 这个故事取材于现实生活。||||This is a folk tale. 这是一个民间传说。

name: roller
interpret: n.滚筒，滚轴；海岸的巨浪
example: 单词 roller 的例句||||A steam roller is used in making and repairing roads. 蒸汽压路机用来修筑道路。||||Why do we like roller coasters? 为什么我们喜欢过山车？

name: declare
interpret: vt.断言，宣称；宣布，宣告，声明；申报；vi. 声明，表明
example: 单词 declare 的例句||||The people declare against the war. 人民宣布反对这场战争。||||I declare this meeting open. 本人宣布本次会议开始。

name: cloth
interpret: n.布；植物；衣料
example: 单词 cloth 的例句||||This kind of cloth washes very well. 这种布料很好洗涤。||||We make cotton into cloth. 我们把棉花织成布。

name: Roman
interpret: adj.罗马的，罗马人的；罗马帝国的
example: 单词 Roman 的例句||||The Roman world is falling. 罗马人的天下在土崩瓦解。||||There was a house in this field in Roman times. 古罗马时期这块地里有一座房子。

name: explore
interpret: vt./vi.勘探，探测；探究，探索
example: 单词 explore 的例句||||We've come to this country, let's explore! 我们已经来到这个国家, 让我们好好探访一番吧！||||The began to explore the desert areas. 他们开始探测沙漠地区。

name: disappear
interpret: vi.消失，不见了
example: 单词 disappear 的例句||||How can people suddenly disappear? 为何人会突然消失？||||The snow will soon disappear when the warm weather comes. 天气变暖时，雪很快就会融化。

name: rescue
interpret: n.援救，解救，营救；vt.援救，救出，营救
example: 单词 rescue 的例句||||The rescue party had arrived. 营救队已经来了。||||I know he will rescue me. 我知道他将会援救我。

name: discovery
interpret: n.发现，发觉；被发现的事物；发明
example: 单词 discovery 的例句||||I congratulate you on your great discovery. 我祝贺你的伟大发现。||||It is a discovery that made medical history. 这是载入医学史册的重大发现。

name: thirst
interpret: n.口渴，渴望；vi.口渴，渴望
example: 单词 thirst 的例句||||They lost their way in the desert and died of thirst. 他们在沙漠中迷路了渴死了。||He had a great thirst for knowledge. 他渴求知识。

name: software
interpret: n.软件，程序设计
example: 单词 software 的例句||||He bought a new software package. 他买了一个新的软件包。||||I wish I knew how the software is installed. 我真希望我知道这个软件是如何安装的。

name: basic
interpret: adj.基本的；n.基本；要素
example: 单词 basic 的例句||||The family is the basic unit of society. 家庭是构成社会的基本单位。||||These rules of playing basketball are basic. 这些篮球规则是基本的。

name: seed
interpret: n.种子，萌芽，原由，根据，子孙，精液；vt.播种，结实，成熟，去...籽；vi.结实，播种
example: 单词 seed 的例句||||The seed must be covered with soil. 种子必须用土壤盖住。||||Farmers put seed in the ground. 农民往地里下种。

name: beauty
interpret: n.美；美景；美好的人或事物
example: 单词 beauty 的例句||||We enjoyed the beauty of nature. 我们欣赏大自然的美。||||She was famous for her beauty. 她以美丽而出名。

name: magic
interpret: adj.有魔力的；n.魔法
example: 单词 magic 的例句||||He is very good at performing magic. 他很会表演魔术。||||That was a truly magic moment. 那真是不可思议的一刻。

name: sense
interpret: n.侦测，感应，感觉，感官，意识，观念，情理，知觉，理智；vt.感觉，觉察，了解
example: 单词 sense 的例句||||He has a strong sense of humor. 他很有幽默感。||||He has a sense that somone is standing behind him. 他有一种有人站在他后面的那种感觉。

name: construct
interpret: vt.构造，建造，想出，作图；n.构成物
example: 单词 construct 的例句||||Construct sentences from your notes. 用笔记的内容来构造句子。||||Every citizen has the duty to construct his country. 每个公民都有建设祖国的责任。

name: mummy
interpret: n.木乃伊；妈咪(儿语)
example: 单词 mummy 的例句||||I'm going to be a mummy this Halloween. 这次的万圣节我要扮成木乃伊。||||Let mummy get some rest now. 让妈妈歇会吧。

name: bat
interpret: n.蝙蝠，球棒；[计算机]DOS文件名:批文件
example: 单词 bat 的例句||||Why the bat comes out only at night? 为什么蝙蝠只在夜间出来？||||Your prints are on the bat. 球棒上有你的指纹。

name: neighbour
interpret: n.邻居；邻近的人(或物)，邻国
example: 单词 neighbour 的例句||||I know nothing about my new neighbour. 我对我的新邻居全无所闻。||||How do you get on with your neighbour? 你与你的邻居相处得怎么样？

name: printer
interpret: n.打印机；印刷工人
example: 单词 printer 的例句||||It is not easy being a printer. 当个印刷业者并不容易。||||He has been a printer all his life. 他做了一辈子印刷工。

name: pour
interpret: n.流出，倾泻，骤雨；vt.倒，倾泻，蜂涌而来vi.倾泻；涌流；斟茶
example: 单词 pour 的例句||||This teapot doesn't pour well. 这个茶壶不好倒。||||Shall I pour you some tea? 我给你斟点茶好吗？

name: naughty
interpret: adj.顽皮的；淘气的
example: 单词 naughty 的例句||||Because you have a naughty daughter! 因为你有个淘气女儿！||||The naughty boy was asking for trouble. 那个调皮的男孩是自找麻烦。

name: mess
interpret: vt.将…弄糟，混乱，妨碍，使紊乱；n.食堂，伙食，用膳，一份食品，混乱，乱七八糟，困境
example: 单词 mess 的例句||||Don't mess up my homework. 不要弄乱我的家庭作业。||||You'll mess up my hair. 你会把我的头发弄乱.

name: thumb
interpret: n.拇指；vt.示意要求搭车，用拇指翻页翻阅；vi.翻页
example: 单词 thumb 的例句||||This glove has a hole in the thumb. 这只手套的大拇指处有个洞。||||The little boy was sucking his thumb. 小男孩儿吮着拇指。

name: camping
interpret: n.野营，露营，帐幕生活
example: 单词 camping 的例句||||When are you going camping again? 你什么时候再去露营？||||My class went camping last summer. 去年夏天我们班去露营了。

name: cooker
interpret: n.炊具(锅、炉灶、烤炉等)
example: 单词 cooker 的例句||||Clean the area round the cooker. 把炊具周围弄干净。||||He fitted my new cooker. 他为我安装新炊具。

name: teapot
interpret: n.茶壶
example: 单词 teapot 的例句||||This kind of teapot is very expensive. 这种茶壶相当贵。||||The boy broke the teapot. 这男孩把茶壶打破了。

name: Mexican
interpret: n.墨西哥人，墨西哥的
example: 单词 Mexican 的例句||||Is there a mexican restaurant around here? 这附近有墨西哥餐馆吗？||||Aw, I don't like Mexican food. 噢，我不喜欢墨西哥菜。

name: Mexico
interpret: n.墨西哥
example: 单词 Mexico 的例句||||They took me to Mexico. 他们把我带到墨西哥。||||Mexico is a beautiful country. 墨西哥是个美丽的国家。

name: shampoo
interpret: n.洗发精；洗发香波
example: 单词 shampoo 的例句||||I like to use shampoo to wash my hair. 我喜欢用洗发水洗头发。||||Do you have shampoo here? 你有洗发膏吗？

name: creature
interpret: n.生物；动物
example: 单词 creature 的例句||||Man is a sociable creature. 人是社会性的动物。||||Snail is a small plant-eating creature with a soft body. 蜗牛是一种软体食草动物。

name: avoid
interpret: vi.避免；vt.避免，逃避
example: 单词 avoid 的例句||||You can avoid all kinds of trouble by letting well alone. 随遇而安就能避免种种麻烦。|||| I wanted to avoid a meeting with her. 我想避免与她会面。

name: arrest
interpret: vt.逮捕，拘留，吸引；n.逮捕，拘留
example: 单词 arrest 的例句||||I don't want to arrest him. 我不想逮捕他。||||The police arrived to arrest him. 警察赶来逮捕了他。

name: refer
interpret: vi.谈到，提到，涉及，有关
example: 单词 refer 的例句||||He did not refer to the report from Australia. 他没有提到澳大利亚传来的消息。||||Don't refer to the matter again. 不要再提这件事了。

name: bargain
interpret: n.买卖合同，成交条件，交易；廉价货，便宜货；vi.议价，成交
example: 单词 bargain 的例句||||In some shops you have to bargain. 在一些商店中买东西要讲价。||||These shoes are a bargain. Smith is closing them out. 这些鞋子是廉价商品，史密斯正在削价出售。

name: congratulate
interpret: vt.(on，upon)祝贺，向…道喜
example: 单词 congratulate 的例句||||I congratulate you with all my heart. 我衷心祝贺你。||||Let me congratulate you on having passed the examination. 我祝贺你考试通过。

name: gather
interpret: vt.使聚集，使聚拢；采集，搜集，收；渐增，积聚，恢复；推测；vi.聚集，聚拢；增加
example: 单词 gather 的例句||||He likes to gather stamps in his spare time. 他业余时间喜欢收集邮票。||||I gather information from the internet. 我从互联网搜集资料。

name: disappoint
interpret: vt.使失望，使受挫折
example: 单词 disappoint 的例句||||We don't want to disappoint our loved ones. 我们不想辜负我们爱的人。||||I'm sorry to disappoint your hope. 对不起，我使你失望了。

name: darling
interpret: n.心爱的人，亲爱的人
example: 单词 darling 的例句||||My darling! How sweet of you to come! 亲爱的！你来到这里多让人高兴啊！||||She's a little darling! 她是小宝贝！

name: sigh
interpret: n.叹息；vi.叹息，渴望；vt.叹息着说
example: 单词 sigh 的例句||||He gave a deep sigh. 他深深地叹了一口气。||||He slowly sat on the seat with a sigh. 他叹了一口气，慢慢地坐到位子上。

name: relief
interpret: n.减轻，解除，救济，安慰，调剂，浮雕，换班，地势的起伏
example: 单词 relief 的例句||||He gets tax relief because he supports his old mother. 他因赡养年迈的母亲而得以减税。||||She sighed with relief when she heard the good news. 听到这个好消息时，她宽慰地舒了口气。

name: pudding
interpret: n.布丁
example: 单词 pudding 的例句||||They served apple pudding for dessert. 他们端上了苹果布丁作为甜食。||||I'm still hungry, can I have some more pudding? 我还饿，我可以再要些布丁吗？

name: tire
interpret: n.轮胎，金属圈；vt.使疲倦，厌烦；vi.疲劳
example: 单词 tire 的例句||||I never tire of listening to music. 我对音乐百听不厌。||||The tire blew out on my way to work. 在我开车上班的路上车胎爆裂了。

name: rid
interpret: vt.摆脱，除掉，克服，干掉，消灭；使摆脱，使去掉
example: 单词 rid 的例句||||She is rid of fever. 她不发烧了。||||Try to get rid of your nasty cold. 想法除去你那讨厌的感冒。

name: bark
interpret: n.（狗）等吠声，狗叫声，树皮；vt.狗叫
example: 单词 bark 的例句||||The old bark dropped away. 老树皮剥落下来。||||Dogs always know who's bad and will naturally bark at them. 狗永远知道谁是坏人，而且一定会对他们吠叫。

name: exist
interpret: vi.存在，生存，生活，继续存在
example: 单词 exist 的例句||||Perfect things do not exist. 完美无缺的东西是没有的。||||Does life exist on Mars? 火星上有生命存在吗？

name: surface
interpret: n.表面，平面；adj.表面的，肤浅的；vt.使...成平面，被露出来，在表面工作；vi 浮出水面
example: 单词 surface 的例句||||A gentle wind disturbed the surface of the water. 微风拂动水面。||||The surface of the water is as smooth as a mirror. 水平如镜。

name: contain
interpret: vt.包含，包括，容纳；遏制，抑制，克制；vi.含有；自制
example: 单词 contain 的例句||||He couldn't contain himself for joy. 他高兴得几乎不能控制住自己。||||The hall can contain two hundred people. 大厅可以容纳200人。

name: apologize
interpret: vi.道歉，谢罪；vt.道歉，谢罪，辩白
example: 单词 apologize 的例句||||You must apologize to her for having kept her waiting. 让她等了这么久，你应该为此向她表示歉意。||||I must apologize for calling so late. 我真是抱歉这么晚了才打电话给你。

name: petrol
interpret: n.（英）汽油（[美]gasoline）
example: 单词 petrol 的例句||||After a long journey, we got to a petrol station at last. 一场长途跋涉后，我们终于赶到了加油站。||||Nowadays petrol costs too much. 如今的汽油太贵了。

name: tank
interpret: n.大容器，大水槽，箱，柜，罐，池塘，储水池；坦克；vt.储于槽中
example: 单词 tank 的例句||||There is still some gasoline left in the tank. 油箱里还剩下一些汽油。||||Fill the tank with water. 把水槽灌满水。

name: pressure
interpret: n.压力，压迫，压强；vt.迫使，使增压，密封
example: 单词 pressure 的例句||||He changed his mind under the pressure from others. 他在别人的逼迫之下改变了主意。||||This type of sheet steel could stand high pressure. 这种薄钢板能抗高压。

name: silver
interpret: adj.银色的，银的；n.银，银币，银器；vt.镀银，变成银白色
example: 单词 silver 的例句||||I like taking a walk under the silver moon. 我喜欢在银色的月光下散步。||||The family must come together for the parents' silver wedding. 全家必须聚会庆祝父母的银婚。

name: quantity
interpret: n.量，数量，许多，大量
example: 单词 quantity 的例句||||Quality is more important than quantity. 质量比数量更重要。||||The price depends on quantity. 价格依数量而定。

name: industry
interpret: n.工业；行业；产业
example: 单词 industry 的例句||||Britain has lost her leadership in the shipbuilding industry. 英国已丧失在造船业的领导地位。||||The city has developed into a center of industry. 这座城市已经发展成为一个工业中心。

name: damp
interpret: n.湿气；adj.潮湿的
example: 单词 damp 的例句||||It's damp and cold, I think it's going to rain. 空气又冷又潮，我看是要下雨了。||||If you put on damp clothes, you will probably catch cold. 穿湿衣服，你会着凉的。

name: familiar
interpret: adj.熟悉的，常见的，亲密的；n.熟友，常客
example: 单词 familiar 的例句||||I've only just come here. I'm still not familiar with the work. 我刚到这里，工作很生。||||The man seemed familiar, but I could not quite place him. 这人很面熟，但是我记不清在哪儿见过他。

name: outer
interpret: adj.外部的；外面的
example: 单词 outer 的例句||||The outer door was wide open but the inner one was locked. 外面的门大开着而里面的门锁着。||||The outer walls of the house were made of brick. 这座房子的外墙是砖的。

name: condition
interpret: n.条件，状况，情况，地位；vt.调节，制约，以…为条件
example: 单词 condition 的例句||||The house is in a good condition. 房子条件良好。||||His condition has more or less improved. 他的情况多少有些改善。

name: spread
interpret: n.传播，散布，伸展；adj.扩延的，伸展的；vt.展开，铺开；传播，推广；伸出；涂，敷
example: 单词 spread 的例句||||The news spread very widely. 这消息传播得很广。||||She spread a cloth on the table. 她用一块布铺在餐桌上。

name: beneath
interpret: prep.在…下面；adv.在下面，在下方
example: 单词 beneath 的例句||||Let's have a rest beneath the tree. 让我们在树下休息。||||What is beneath your feet? 你们脚底下是什么？

name: detail
interpret: n.细节，详情；vt.详述，详细说明
example: 单词 detail 的例句||||They worked hard for every detail. 他们为每个细节煞费苦心。||||Let me give you more detail. 让我来详细说明。

name: simply
interpret: ad.仅仅,只是；简单地；朴素地；完全，简直
example: 单词 simply 的例句||||The cake is made quite simply. 这蛋糕做起来很简单。||||The teacher explained the text simply. 老师简单地解释了一下课文。

name: production
interpret: n.生产，产品，产量，作品，成果
example: 单词 production 的例句||||Production goes up faster this month. 这个月产量上升更快。||||A famous actress is to play in our next production. 一位著名女演员将在我们下一个剧本中扮演角色。

name: escape
interpret: vi.逃跑，逃避；逃过..的注意；逸出；n.逃跑
example: 单词 escape 的例句||||We had to break the door out to escape from the fire. 我们不得不把门砸开以逃避火灾。||||He didn't allow any word to escape his lips. 他守口如瓶。

name: cheque
interpret: n.支票，空白支票 [美]check；总收入
example: 单词 cheque 的例句||||I have no cash with me, may I pay by cheque? 我没有带现金，可以付支票吗？||||Figure the total and I'll pay it with a cheque. 请把总数算出来，我用支票支付。

name: greet
interpret: vt.问候，向…致意；迎接，欢迎；使受到，给予；被觉察，呈现在面前
example: 单词 greet 的例句||||The child is shy and doesn't like to greet people. 这孩子腼腆，不爱叫人。||||She rose to greet her guests. 她起身迎接客人。

name: immediately
interpret: ad.立即地，即刻地；直接地，紧密地
example: 单词 immediately 的例句||||I'll change it immediately for you. 我立刻给您换。||||I immediately become happy again. 我立马就变的高兴起来了。

name: doubt
interpret: n.怀疑，疑惑；vt.怀疑，不信；vi.不确定，不能肯定或怀疑
example: 单词 doubt 的例句||||I never doubt his ability. 我从不怀疑他的能力。||||There was little doubt in my mind. 我心里几乎没有疑问。

name: broadcast
interpret: n.广播，播音；vt.播撒（种子），广播；（无线电或电视）；vi. 广播；播送，播放
example: 单词 broadcast 的例句||||The speech will be broadcast nationwide. 这次讲话将在全国广播。||||That news was broadcast this morning. 那消息是今早广播的。

name: operation
interpret: n.操作，运转；经营，业务；作用，效力；手术；运算
example: 单词 operation 的例句||||Her mother began operation of a small grocery. 她母亲开始经营一家小杂货店。||||Your operation was very successful. 你的手术非常成功。

name: apply
interpret: vt.应用，申请；涂；vt.使专心从事；vi.申请；有关联
example: 单词 apply 的例句||||I want to apply for the job. 我想申请这项工作。||||You may apply in person or by letter. 你亲自或通信申请均可。

name: network
interpret: n.网络；网状物；广播网；电视网
example: 单词 network 的例句||||They have built the national network. 他们建成了全国性的网络。||||They are developing marketing network. 他们正在发展销售网络。

name: advertisement
interpret: n.广告，启事，广告宣传
example: 单词 advertisement 的例句||||Please post up this advertisement for our concert in your shop window. 请把这张我们音乐会的海报贴在贵店窗户上。||||I wish to insert an advertisement in your newspaper. 我想在贵报上登一则广告。

name: sample
interpret: n.标本，样品，例子；vt.取样，采样，抽取...的样品，试验的一部分，尝试
example: 单词 sample 的例句||||She made us sample her cooking. 她让我们品尝她做的饭菜。||||Show me a sample, please. 请拿一个样品给我看看。

name: balance
interpret: n.秤，天平，平衡，[商]收支差额，结余，余额；资产平稳表；vi.平衡，称，权衡，对比，结算；vt.称，权衡，比较，使平衡，结算，抵消
example: 单词 balance 的例句||||You must learn to keep your balance in skating. 在溜冰时你得学会保持平衡。||||I found it hard to keep my balance on the icy path. 我觉得在冰滑小道上走路要保持身体平衡是相当困难的。

name: recover
interpret: vi./vt.痊愈；恢复；重新获得
example: 单词 recover 的例句||||What magic drug have you taken to recover so quickly? 你吃了什么神奇的药恢复的如此之快？||||Don't worry. The patient will soon recover. 你别愁，病人很快会好的。

name: argument
interpret: n.辩论，争论，论据，理由
example: 单词 argument 的例句||||Whatever your argument, I shall hold to my decision. 不论你如何争辩，我将坚持我的决定。||||When the argument started I wanted to dive in. 争论开始时，我也想加入。

name: elect
interpret: n.当选人，被选的人，上帝的选民；adj.被选的，选出的；vt.选举，选择；vi.作选择
example: 单词 elect 的例句||||Americans elect a President every four years. 美国人民每4年选一次总统。||||We decided that we should elect a new sales manager. 我们决定我们应该选举一位新的业务经理。

name: household
interpret: n.家庭，家族，王室；adj.家庭的，家族的，家属的
example: 单词 household 的例句||||I grew up as part of a large household. 我生长在一个大家庭。||||He was the head of a household. 他是户主.

name: sort
interpret: vi.排序，挑选，分拣；vt. 将…分类；将…排序；挑选出某物；n.种类，类别，性质，程度
example: 单词 sort 的例句||||She was a strange sort of person. 她这个人有些古怪。||||I don't much care for that sort of man. 我不太喜欢那种人。

name: impress
interpret: vt.使感动；使印象深刻；n.印象，特征，印记，压痕，强征
example: 单词 impress 的例句||||Time has left its impress upon him. 岁月在他身上留下了印记。||||The sights of the city never fail to impress foreign tourists. 外国游客无一不对该市留有深刻印象。

name: landscape
interpret: n.风景；山水画；地形；前景
example: 单词 landscape 的例句||||The landscape of the Great Wall is like a dragon. 长城的全景像一条龙。||||From the hill he looked down on the peaceful landscape. 他站在山上眺望下面的宁静景色。

name: mysterious
interpret: adj.神秘的，难解的，不可思议的
example: 单词 mysterious 的例句||||He was a mysterious person. 他是个神秘人物。||||He was very mysterious in his manner. 他的行为举止十分神秘。

name: average
interpret: n.平均数，平均水平；adj.一般的，通常的，平均的；vt.取平均值，达到平均水平；vi.平均为；呈中间色
example: 单词 average 的例句||||He spends on an average two hours a day on reading. 他平均每天用两小时读书。||||The average flow of the river is 200 cubic metres per second. 这条河平均流量为每秒二百立方米。

name: bother
interpret: vt.烦扰，迷惑；vi.烦恼，操心；n.麻烦，纠纷，讨厌的人
example: 单词 bother 的例句||||Don't bother about getting dinner for me. 不用麻烦给我做饭了。||||You needn't bother to lock the door. 你不用费心去锁门。

name: wander
interpret: vi.漫步，徘徊；迷路，迷失方向；偏离正题，胡扯
example: 单词 wander 的例句||||It was unsafe to wander there. 在那边闲逛是不安全的。||||Don't let your mind wander while working. 工作时思想不能开小差。

name: bare
interpret: adj.赤裸裸的，无遮蔽的；空的，无设备的；稀少的，仅有的，勉强的；vt.露出，暴露
example: 单词 bare 的例句||||The boy likes to walk on the sand with bare feet. 这男孩喜欢赤足在沙滩上走。||||She got shocked when she touched the bare wire. 她摸了裸线，遭电击了。

name: suspect
interpret: n.嫌疑犯；adj.令人怀疑的，不可信的；vt.&vi.怀疑，猜想
example: 单词 suspect 的例句||||The police suspect him of having taken the money. 警察怀疑钱是他偷的。||||I suspect him to know everything about that. 我猜想那件事他全都知道了。

name: ordinary
interpret: adj.平常的，普通的；n.常事，常例，普通的人
example: 单词 ordinary 的例句||||Her new house is certainly out of the ordinary. 她的新居真是不同凡响。||||That is quite an ordinary event. 那是极平常的一件事。

name: courage
interpret: n.勇气，胆识，气概
example: 单词 courage 的例句||||I wouldn't lose courage even if I should fail ten times. 即使要失败十次，我也绝不灰心。||||He has the courage to speak out what he thinks right. 他敢于说出他认为正确的东西。

name: layer
interpret: adj.层，层次
example: 单词 layer 的例句||||These seeds must be covered with a layer of earth. 这些种子必须盖上一层泥土。||||The branches are weighed down by a heavy layer of snow. 树枝都被厚雪压弯了。

name: vote
interpret: vt./vi.投票；选举；投票决定；n.投票，选票，表决，选举权，得票数
example: 单词 vote 的例句||||The chairman asked us to vote on the plan. 主席要我们对计划进行表决。||||They vote to choose a president. 他们投票选举总统。

name: firm
interpret: n.公司，商号；adj.坚定的，坚强的，牢固的，结实的，坚硬的，坚挺的，严格的
example: 单词 firm 的例句||||He has stepped up into the management of the firm. 他已升入公司的管理部门。||||She is a firm believer in Chinese traditional medicine. 她是中药坚定的拥护者。

name: persuade
interpret: vt.说服，劝说，说服；vi.说服；被说服；adj.空闲的，有闲的
example: 单词 persuade 的例句||||Can you persuade him out of his foolish plans? 你能说服他放弃他那愚蠢的计划吗？||||It's easy to persuade him if you go the right method. 只要你的方法得当，说服他并不难。

name: remind
interpret: vt.提醒，使想起；使发生联想
example: 单词 remind 的例句||||These notes will remind you how to present your ideas. 这些笔记可以帮你记起怎样讲清楚你的意思。||||May I remind you that time will soon be up? 我可以提醒你时间快到了吗？

name: treasure
interpret: n.宝物，财富；vt.珍爱，重视，密藏
example: 单词 treasure 的例句||||They went to the island to hunt the buried treasure. 他们到岛上去寻找埋藏的宝物。||||I certainly treasure the friendship between us very much. 我当然非常珍视我们之间的友谊。

name: ceremony
interpret: n.典礼，仪式
example: 单词 ceremony 的例句||||She promised to attend the ceremony. 她答应出席这次仪式。||||The mayor will perform the opening ceremony. 市长将主持开幕式。

name: bride
interpret: n.新娘
example: 单词 bride 的例句||||The bride is wearing a wedding dress made of lace. 新娘穿一件蕾丝婚纱。||||We drank a toast to the bride and bridegroom. 我们向新娘新郎敬酒。

name: remark
interpret: n.注释，备注，评论，注意；vt.评论，注意，谈及；vi.评论，谈论
example: 单词 remark 的例句||||He got angry with me because of my remark. 他由于我讲的话而生我的气。||||That remark does not refer to her. 那句话不是说她的。

name: concern
interpret: vt.（使）担忧；涉及；关系到；n.担心；关注；（利害）关系
example: 单词 concern 的例句||||It's very kind of you to show so much concern for us. 谢谢您对我们这么关心。||||Our losses are beginning to concern me. 我们的损失使我担心起来。

name: tear
interpret: n.泪滴，眼泪；撕，扯，裂缝；激怒；飞奔；vi.流泪；撕破；赶快，飞奔
example: 单词 tear 的例句||||Why did you tear the letter away from her hand? 你为何要从她手中夺走那封信？||||He could not tear himself from that spot. 他舍不得离开那个地点。

name: scientific
interpret: adj.科学的；符合科学规律的，精确的
example: 单词 scientific 的例句||||Most students in our class go in for scientific activities. 我们班上大多数学生参加各项科学活动。||||Look at the matter purely from the scientific point of view. 用科学眼光看待事物。

name: image
interpret: n.图象；肖像；形象
example: 单词 image 的例句||||How can we improve our public image? 我们怎样才能改善公众形象？||||Honesty is the best image. 诚实是最好的形象。

name: salary
interpret: n.工资，薪水，薪晌，薪金
example: 单词 salary 的例句||||The cost will be stopped out of your salary. 费用将从你的工资中扣除。||||I want to speak to her in the matter of my salary. 我想就我的薪水问题和她谈谈。

name: novel
interpret: n.小说，长篇故事；adj.新奇的，异常的
example: 单词 novel 的例句||||She spent a peaceful afternoon by the river, reading a novel. 她在河边看小说，度过了一个宁静的下午。||||She finished writing her novel. 她完成了她的小说。

name: dozen
interpret: n.十二个，几十，许多
example: 单词 dozen 的例句||||I'll have a dozen eggs. 我买一打鸡蛋。||||I buy a dozen of socks. 我买了一打袜子。

name: leading
interpret: adj.领导的，指导的；第一位的，最主要的；扮演主角的；n.领导，率领，领先；引导
example: 单词 leading 的例句||||She is one of the leading writers of her days. 她是那个时代主要的作家之一。||||Which horse is leading in the race right now? 现在赛马中哪匹马领先？

name: darkness
interpret: n.黑暗，冥冥，夜色；罪恶，无知
example: 单词 darkness 的例句||||Darkness closed down on the city. 黑夜降临于该城。||||Darkness was falling fast. 天很快黑了下来。

name: chief
interpret: n.领袖，酋长，长官，主要部分；adj.主要的，首位的
example: 单词 chief 的例句||||Can you name the chief rivers of China? 你能列举出中国的主要河流吗？|||| He is my old chief. 他是我的老上级。

name: wool
interpret: n.毛线，毛织品，羊毛
example: 单词 wool 的例句||||I'd like to try on that blue wool coat. 我想试穿那件蓝色的羊毛外套。||||Autumn is a lively season for the wool market. 秋天是毛织品畅销的季节。

name: beard
interpret: n.（下巴上的）胡须；络腮胡子；vt.使长胡须，公开反对
example: 单词 beard 的例句||||My grandfather wears a beard. 我爷爷留着胡须。||||He's decided to grow a beard. 他已经决定蓄胡子。

name: silence
interpret: n.沉默，无声，静寂，湮没，无声息；vt.使缄默；int.安静！
example: 单词 silence 的例句||||She raised a hand for silence. 她举手示意大家安静。||||They drove home in silence. 他们默不作声地开车回家。

name: shave
interpret: n.修面，刮胡子，幸免，剃刀；vt.修面，剃，修剪，掠过；vi.刮脸，擦过
example: 单词 shave 的例句||||He had a shave before he went out. 他外出前刮了脸。||||I usually shave at seven in the morning. 我通常早上7点刮脸。

name: bite
interpret: n.咬，咬伤，一口，刺痛；vi.&vi.咬，刺痛
example: 单词 bite 的例句||||The dog may bite at you. 狗会咬你的。||||Let me have a bite. 让我咬一口。

name: prison
interpret: n.监狱(禁)；拘留所
example: 单词 prison 的例句||||They put him in prison. 他们将他逮捕入狱。||||If you go on like this you will be put into prison. 你这样下去会进监狱的。

name: fortnight
interpret: n.两星期，十四天
example: 单词 fortnight 的例句||||A fortnight passed in a flash. 一晃半个月过去了。||||My daughter comes to visit me once every fortnight. 我女儿每两周来看我一次。

name: midnight
interpret: n.午夜
example: 单词 midnight 的例句||||The ship pulled in to the shore at midnight. 那船半夜时靠岸。||||He looked at the moon and made the time to be midnight. 他看了看月亮，估计时间是半夜了。

name: sheet
interpret: n.床单，张，纸张，印刷品，表格，薄片；vt.盖上被单，遍布；vi.大片落下；adj.片状的
example: 单词 sheet 的例句||||Can I have another sheet of paper please? 我可以再要一张纸吗？||||He looked as white as a sheet. 他脸色苍白如纸。

name: fur
interpret: n.毛皮；毛；软毛
example: 单词 fur 的例句||||The woman is wearing a fur coat. 这位妇女穿着一件皮大衣。||||Bear is covered with with fur. 熊体表覆盖着皮毛。

name: Greece
interpret: n.希腊
example: 单词 Greece 的例句||||Both children have been to Greece. 两个孩子都去过希腊。||||Have you been to Greece before? 你以前去过希腊吗？

name: shock
interpret: vt./vi.（使）震惊；震动；n.休克；打击；震惊
example: 单词 shock 的例句||||The news gave us a shock. 这消息使我们震惊。||||Her death was a shock to him. 她的死对他是个打击。

name: greedy
interpret: adj.贪吃的；贪婪的；渴望的
example: 单词 greedy 的例句||||He was not greedy with his money. 他不贪他的钱。||||She is a greedy girl. 她是个贪心的女孩。

name: further
interpret: adv.（在时间或空间上）距离更大地；更远地
example: 单词 further 的例句||||Have you had any further news? 你有进一步的消息吗？||||We will help you further. 我们会进一步帮助你的。

name: quality
interpret: n.品质，特性，才能，质量；adj.优质的
example: 单词 quality 的例句||||Honesty is his best quality. 正直是他最好的品质。||||We provide high quality goods. 我们提供高质量产品。

name: dial
interpret: n.(钟表等的)针盘；刻度盘；vt.拨(电话号码)；vi. 拨号
example: 单词 dial 的例句||||What number did you dial? 你拨了什么号码？||||How do I dial London? 怎样拨电话到伦敦？

name: figure
interpret: n.数字，算术，图解；轮廓；vi.计算，出现，扮演角色；vt.计算在内，估计，推测，认为
example: 单词 figure 的例句||||I will check up the figure. 我来核对一下这个数字。||||I'm watching my figure. 我一直注意保持身材。

name: properly
interpret: adv.适当地；正当地；严格地
example: 单词 properly 的例句||||He has disposed of the rubbish properly. 他已经适当地处理了垃圾。||||Do your shoes fit properly? 你的鞋适合吗？

name: disturb
interpret: vt.扰乱，妨碍，使...不安；vi.打扰；妨碍
example: 单词 disturb 的例句||||Don't let someone disturb my mind. 不让某人扰乱我心智。||||Don't disturb your neighbor. 别打扰你的邻座。

name: deliver
interpret: vt.投递（信件，邮包等）；给…接生；vi.实现；传送；履行；投递
example: 单词 deliver 的例句||||Please help me deliver this package. 请帮我投递这个包裹。||||Could you deliver it by tomorrow? 明天之前能送吗？

name: starter
interpret: n.第一道菜；开端；起动器
example: 单词 starter 的例句||||What would you like for your starter, sir? 先生，您的第一道菜上什么？||||His speech was the party starter. 他的演说是宴会的开端。

name: fairy
interpret: n.仙女；小精灵
example: 单词 fairy 的例句||||When did the bad fairy run away? 坏仙女什么时候跑掉了？||||The bad fairy becomes a dragon. 坏仙女变成了一条龙。

name: mushroom
interpret: 蘑菇；蘑菇状物；adj. 蘑菇形的；雨后蘑菇似的；vi. 迅速增长；采蘑菇
example: 单词 mushroom 的例句||||Mushroom can grow very quickly. 蘑菇可以生长地很快。||||The mushroom is a speciality here. 蘑菇是这里的特色菜。

name: former
interpret: adj.从前的，前者的；n.形成者，模型，样板
example: 单词 former 的例句||||She broke the former record. 她打破了以前的记录。||||The former held a light in his hand. 前者手里拿着一个灯。

name: eagle
interpret: n.鹰
example: 单词 eagle 的例句||||The eagle held a mouse in its claws. 鹰用爪子抓着一只老鼠。||||The eagle flew away. 鹰飞走了。

name: foggy
interpret: adj.有雾的，模糊的
example: 单词 foggy 的例句||||London is a rainy and foggy city in Britain. 伦敦是英国多雨和多雾的城市。||||Tomorrow it will be cold, cloudy, and foggy. 明天将是一个多云有雾的寒冷天。

name: department
interpret: n.（行政、企业等的）部；局；处；科；部门；系
example: 单词 department 的例句||||What department do you study in? 你在哪个系学习？||||Welcome to the sports department! 欢迎来到运动品部！

name: receiver
interpret: n.（可数名词）接受者，接待者，收件人，收款人；接受器
example: 单词 receiver 的例句||||He picked up the receiver at once. 他马上拿起了听筒。||||You have pressed the receiver button. 您已按了接收器按钮。

name: beginner
interpret: n.初学者，新手，生手
example: 单词 beginner 的例句||||Are you a beginner in English? 你是英语的初学者吗？||||I am just a beginner. 我只是一个初学者。

name: eastern
interpret: adj.东部的，东方的
example: 单词 eastern 的例句||||Japan is one of the eastern countries. 日本是东方国家之一。||||China is an eastern country. 中国是一个东方国家。

name: debate
interpret: vt.争论，辩论；vi. 辩论；n.争论，辩论
example: 单词 debate 的例句||||They will debate face to face. 他们将当面进行辩论。||||They clashed in the debate. 他们辩论中发生冲突。

name: bar
interpret: n.条，棒，条状物；酒吧，（卖东西的）柜台
example: 单词 bar 的例句||||I went to the bar yesterday. 我昨天去酒吧了。||||They walked into the bar. 他们走进了酒吧。

name: examine
interpret: vt.检查，细查；对…进行考试；vi. 检查，细查，调查
example: 单词 examine 的例句||||Let me examine you please. 我给你检查一下。||||The teacher will examine the students in music. 老师将测验学生们的音乐知识。

name: actress
interpret: n.女演员；女表演者
example: 单词 actress 的例句||||She's a very great dramatic actress. 她是一个非常了不起的戏剧演员。||||Who is your favorite actress? 你最喜欢的女演员是谁？

name: schoolboy
interpret: n.(中、小学的)男学生，学童
example: 单词 schoolboy 的例句||||Tom is an 8-year-old schoolboy. 汤姆是个八岁的男生。||||Bob is a fine type of schoolboy. 鲍勃是男生的典范。

name: packet
interpret: n.小包，小盒；包裹；v.打包，装行李；包装
example: 单词 packet 的例句||||The shopkeeper reached for a packet of tea. 店主伸手去取一包茶叶。||||Please follow the instructions on the packet when you take the drug. 吃药时请按照包装上的说明去服用。

name: Rome
interpret: n.罗马(意大利首都)
example: 单词 Rome 的例句||||I have not been to either Paris or Rome. 我既没有到过巴黎也没有到过罗马。||||We're leaving for Rome next week. 我们下星期要到罗马去。

name: freezing
interpret: adj.冰冻的，冷冻用的，严寒的
example: 单词 freezing 的例句||||It is freezing outside, and put on your winter coat. 外面很冷，穿上你的大衣吧。||||It's freezing in the river. 河水冰人。

name: loaf
interpret: n.一条面包，一只面包；vi.游荡，闲逛；懒散地工作
example: 单词 loaf 的例句||||Don't loaf away your time. 不要浪费你的时间。||||I need a loaf of bread. 我需要一条面包。

name: afterwards
interpret: adv.然后，后来地
example: 单词 afterwards 的例句||||Afterwards he went abroad. 之后他到国外去了。||||We saw the film and afterwards walked home together. 我们看了电影后一起走回了家。

name: transport
interpret: n.运输、运输工具；(常用复数）强烈的情绪、狂喜或狂怒； vt.运输；流放；为强烈的情绪所激动
example: 单词 transport 的例句||||Transport has always been the key to developing trade. 运输一直是发展贸易的关键。||||The books are packed up for transport. 书已包扎好待运。

name: technical
interpret: adj.技术上的，专门的，工业的，工艺的，根据法律的
example: 单词 technical 的例句||||He taught me how to read technical drawings. 他教我看技术图纸。||||The book is too technical for me. 这本书太专业了，我看不懂。

name: theory
interpret: n.理论，原则，看法，推测
example: 单词 theory 的例句||||He needs to fine down his theory a bit. 他需要使他的理论更完善一些。||||He hasn't a leg to stand for this theory of his. 他的这种理论是站不住脚的。

name: suggest
interpret: vt.提议，建议，促成，暗示，启发，使人想起
example: 单词 suggest 的例句||||I suggest trying once more. 我建议再试一次。||||I suggest you save your breath. 我劝你少开口。

name: generally
interpret: adv.一般地，通常；普遍地，广泛地
example: 单词 generally 的例句||||We generally go to the sea for our holidays. 我们通常去海边度假。||||Generally speaking, parents love their children. 一般说来，父母爱他们的孩子。

name: publish
interpret: vt.发表；出版；公布
example: 单词 publish 的例句||||When are you going to publish this work of yours? 你什么时候出版你这部作品？||||He'll publish a statement. 他将公布一项声明。

name: adventure
interpret: n.冒险，冒险经历；vt.冒险；vi.冒险
example: 单词 adventure 的例句||||I wish to hear the details of your adventure. 我希望听到你这次奇遇的详情。||||He couldn't explain that he had passed through a great adventure. 他没法说明自己曾经历过一次伟大的冒险

name: unfortunately
interpret: adv.不幸地，可惜的是
example: 单词 unfortunately 的例句||||I called on you yesterday, but unfortunately you were out. 昨天我来看你，但是不幸的是你不在。||||She had gone home, unfortunately. 遗憾的是她已回家了。

name: flame
interpret: n.火焰，火舌，热情；vi.焚烧，面红，激动；vt.烧;激起，激怒
example: 单词 flame 的例句||||The flame of the burning candle soon went out. 蜡烛的火焰很快就熄灭了。||||The flame blew out. 火苗被吹灭了。

name: attack
interpret: n.攻击，袭击，进攻，抨击；vt.攻击；抨击；动手干；vi.攻击；腐蚀
example: 单词 attack 的例句||||We must keep the enemy's attack off until dark. 天黑前我们应当顶住敌人的进攻。||||Germany began to attack the Soviet Union in 1941. 德国在1941年开始进攻苏联。

name: audience
interpret: n.听众，观众，读者；谒见，接见；倾听，听取
example: 单词 audience 的例句||||He could not put across his point of view to the audience. 他没能使听众理解他的观点。||||The audience was made up of very young children. 观众由小孩子们组成。

name: slight
interpret: n.轻蔑，怠慢；adj.轻微的，纤细的，脆弱的，苗条的；vt.轻视，忽略，怠慢
example: 单词 slight 的例句||||The difference is so slight that I can hardly see it. 差别很小，我几乎看不出来。||||His illness started with a slight cough. 他的病是从轻微咳嗽开始的。

name: hunt
interpret: vt./vi./n.打猎，猎取；搜寻
example: 单词 hunt 的例句||||We must hunt out all the facts we can. 我们必须尽可能查清全部事实。||||Millions of people hunt and fish for a living. 许多人打猎和捕鱼为生。

name: claim
interpret: n.要求，认领；主张，断言；vt.要求，认领，索赔；声称，主张
example: 单词 claim 的例句||||I claim payment from my friend. 我要求我的朋友付款。||||Does anyone claim this umbrella? 有没有人认领这把伞？

name: harm
interpret: n./vt.危害；伤害；损害
example: 单词 harm 的例句||||His behaviour did more harm than good to himself. 他的行为对他自己害多利少。||||Never do anything to harm the interests of the people. 决不能损害人民的利益。

name: meanwhile
interpret: adv.当时，在那当中；n.其时，其间
example: 单词 meanwhile 的例句||||I continued working, meanwhile, he went out shopping. 我继续工作，这期间他出去买东西。||||I'll be back soon. Meanwhile follow on. 我马上就回来，你继续干下去好了。

name: method
interpret: n.方法，办法；类函数，类成员函数(计算机)
example: 单词 method 的例句||||He introduced us to a new method of work. 他向我们介绍了一种新的工作方法。||||Use method rather than luck. 按条理办事，不要凭运气。

name: enjoyable
interpret: adj.愉快的；有趣的
example: 单词 enjoyable 的例句||||We had a most enjoyable evening. 我们度过了一个非常愉快的夜晚。||||We want to make your stay as enjoyable as possible. 我们想尽量令你的逗留愉快。

name: damage
interpret: n.(pl.)赔偿金，损坏，毁坏；vt.损害，毁坏
example: 单词 damage 的例句||||Don't bend the book back, and you'll damage it. 别向后卷书，会弄坏的。||||He paid for the damage done. 他赔偿了造成的损失。

name: truly
interpret: adv.真正地，真实地，真诚的，不假
example: 单词 truly 的例句||||You must speak truly. 你必须说实话。||||He is a truly good man. 他是个真正的好人。

name: insist
interpret: vt.&vi.(on)坚持，坚决主张，强烈要求，坚决认为
example: 单词 insist 的例句||||The tourists insist on keeping to their plan. 旅行者坚持按旅行计划行事。||||Anyhow I must insist that you cannot steal. 不管怎么说，你都不能偷东西。

name: instruct
interpret: vt.教，教育；通知；指示，命令
example: 单词 instruct 的例句||||My job is to instruct her in English. 我的工作是教她英语。||||I will instruct you when we will start. 我会通知你我们出发的时间。

name: baggage
interpret: n.行李，包袱
example: 单词 baggage 的例句||||The youth gave me his hand when I was lifting my baggage. 当我提行李时，那个年轻人来帮我。||||Can I put my baggage here? 我能将行李放在这儿吗？

name: aware
interpret: adj.意识到的，知道的，明白的，发觉的
example: 单词 aware 的例句||||At first I wasn't aware that he was ill. 开始我没有察觉到他有病。||||He doesn't seem to be aware of the problems. 他好像没有意识到这个问题。

name: base
interpret: vt.以...为根据；n.基部；基地；基础；adj.基本的，基础的
example: 单词 base 的例句||||We must base ourselves on the interests of the people. 我们一定要从人民的利益出发。||||He cut down the tree close at the base. 他在近根处将树砍倒。

name: official
interpret: n.官员，公务员；adj.官方的；正式的；公务的
example: 单词 official 的例句||||The man with glasses is a high official. 那个戴眼镜的人是一位高级官员。||||His official duties kept him busy. 公务使他繁忙不堪。

name: thankful
interpret: adj.感谢的；感激的
example: 单词 thankful 的例句||||I am very thankful to you. 太感谢你了。||||You should be thankful to be alive. 你能活下来，应该感到很欣慰。

name: drawing
interpret: n.绘画；制图；图画；图样；v.绘画（draw的现在分词）；拖；拉；拔出
example: 单词 drawing 的例句||||Drawing is my favorite lesson. 画图画是我最喜欢的课程。||||The children learn singing, dancing, drawing, and the like in the kindergarten. 孩子们在幼儿园里学习唱歌、跳舞、画图画等。

name: equal
interpret: adj.相等的；平等的；胜任的；vt.等于；比得上
example: 单词 equal 的例句||||Men and women enjoy equal pay for equal work. 男女同工同酬。||||Women in our country enjoy equal rights with men. 在我国妇女享有同男子平等的权利。

name: reading
interpret: n.阅读，知识，读物，表演，对法律条文的解释；adj.阅读的
example: 单词 reading 的例句||||Children learn reading and writing at school. 孩子们在学校学习阅读和写作。||||He finds pleasure in reading. 他从阅读中得到乐趣。

name: blanket
interpret: n.毛毯，覆盖物；排字版；vt.用毯子裹，扑灭，挡风， 覆盖，使包含；adj.包含所有的，适用于所有情形的
example: 单词 blanket 的例句||||A blanket keeps us warm because it is woollen and thick. 毯子给我们保暖, 因为它用羊毛制成而且很厚。||||He covered the child up with a blanket. 他用一条毯子把孩子盖严。

name: crossroads
interpret: n.十字街头，立交桥
example: 单词 crossroads 的例句||||Take a right turn at the crossroads. 在十字路口右转弯。||||I'll wait for you at the crossroads. 我将在十字路口等你。

name: golf
interpret: n.高尔夫球；vi.打高尔夫球
example: 单词 golf 的例句||||They played a round of golf. 他们打了一场高尔夫球。||||She is playing golf. 她正在打高尔夫球。

name: tough
interpret: adj.坚硬的，咬不动的；棘手的，难办的；强健的，吃苦耐劳的；粗暴的，凶恶的
example: 单词 tough 的例句||||The meat was so tough that I simply couldn't get it down. 这肉太老了，我简直咽不下去。||||When there's a tough job, he always rushes to do it. 什么时候有重活，他都抢着干。

name: flashlight
interpret: n.闪光信号灯，手电筒
example: 单词 flashlight 的例句||||Shine your flashlight over here. 把手电筒往这儿照一照。||||He took a pencil flashlight out of his pocket. 他从口袋中掏出一支笔形电筒。

name: fry
interpret: vt.&vi.油煎，油炸；n.油炸食品；鱼苗，小生物，小东西
example: 单词 fry 的例句||||We should use slow fire to fry fish. 煎鱼要用慢火。||||I worked there for 11 years as a fry cook. 我在那儿做了11年的油炸师傅。

name: photographer
interpret: n.摄影师；照相师
example: 单词 photographer 的例句||||He is a good photographer. 他擅长摄影。||||I asked the photographer to enlarge the picture. 我请摄影师把那张照片放大。

name: title
interpret: n.头衔，名称，标题，所有权，资格，冠军；vt.赋予称号，加标题于；adj.标题的
example: 单词 title 的例句||||I don't think I am worthy of such an honourable title. 这样的光荣称号，我可担当不起。||||She has won the title of the world's champion. 她获得了世界冠军的称号。

name: steam
interpret: n.蒸汽，水汽；精力；vi.蒸发，行驶，发怒；vt.蒸，煮，散发
example: 单词 steam 的例句||||Ice, snow and steam are different forms of water. 冰、雪、蒸汽是水的不同形式。||||Steam trains gave way to electric trains. 蒸汽火车被电气火车取代。

name: translator
interpret: n.翻译者，翻译机
example: 单词 translator 的例句||||He used to be a translator. 他从前是一位翻译员。||||His uncle is a writer and translator. 他的叔叔是个作家兼翻译家。

name: painter
interpret: n.画家，漆匠，油漆工
example: 单词 painter 的例句||||God must be a painter. 上帝一定是个画家。||||You look like a painter. 你看起来像个画家。

name: chemist
interpret: n.化学家；药剂师
example: 单词 chemist 的例句||||He is a clever chemist. 他是一个聪明的化学家。||||The chemist mixed up some medicine for me. 药剂师给我配了些药。

name: fog
interpret: n.雾，迷惑，苔藓；vi.被雾笼罩，变模糊；vt.使困惑，以雾笼罩
example: 单词 fog 的例句||||The fog dispersed at ten o'clock. 雾在10点钟散开。||||They used dry ice to fog the stage. 他们用干冰让舞台变得一片朦胧。

name: journalist
interpret: n.记者，新闻工作者，新闻记者
example: 单词 journalist 的例句||||He works at newspaper office as a journalist. 他作为记者在报社工作。||||He has worked as a journalist for ten years. 他当了十年的新闻记者。

name: married
interpret: adj.已婚的；与…结婚的
example: 单词 married 的例句||||I heard John got married. 我听说约翰结婚了。||||They got married last autumn. 他们在去年秋季结婚。

name: bless
interpret: vt.祝福，感激，保佑，保护
example: 单词 bless 的例句||||May God bless you with a long life! 愿上帝保佑你长寿！ |||| Bless you, my sister! 祝福你，我的妹妹！

name: loose
interpret: adj.松散的，宽松的
example: 单词 loose 的例句||||It will loose if you don't bind it fast. 你不把它系紧它会松的。||||Will you nail down that loose board in the floor? 请把那块松动的地板钉牢好吗？

name: stare
interpret: vt.凝视，显眼，变硬；vi.凝视；n.凝视
example: 单词 stare 的例句||||It's not polite to stare at a girl in the face. 盯着姑娘的脸瞧是不礼貌的。||||She gave him an angry stare. 她生气地白了他一眼。

name: award
interpret: n.奖，奖品；vi.授予，给予；vt.授予
example: 单词 award 的例句||||It is impossible to honor her with the award. 奖品授给她是不可能的。||||The film won an Oscar award for 1985. 这部电影获1985年奥斯卡金像奖。

name: goddess
interpret: n.女神
example: 单词 goddess 的例句||||He adored her as a goddess. 他把她当作女神崇拜。||||She was a goddess who used to interest herself in marriages. 她原来是喜欢参与安排婚姻的一位女神。

name: DVD
interpret: n.数码影碟(digital versatile disk)
example: 单词 DVD 的例句||||DVD systems are rapidly taking the place of videos. 数字影碟设备正在迅速取代录像。||||This DVD player is damaged. 这个DVD机坏了。

name: Easter
interpret: n.复活节
example: 单词 Easter 的例句||||We've spent our Easter holidays pleasantly. 我们的复活节假期过得很愉快。||||They always go to church at Easter. 他们在复活节时总是去教堂。

name: stair
interpret: n.(阶梯的)一级；楼梯
example: 单词 stair 的例句||||His office is down the stair. 他的办公室在楼下。||||He heard soft footsteps coming up the stair. 他听见有人上楼的轻微脚步声。

name: bury
interpret: vt.埋葬，掩埋，隐藏；埋头，专心
example: 单词 bury 的例句||||Bury the old world and build a new one. 埋葬旧世界，建设新世界。||||She willed herself to bury her past. 她努力使自己忘记过去。
