name: boss
interpret: n.老板，上司；vt.指挥，控制；vi.当首领，发号施令
example: 单词 boss 的例句||||When the boss gets mad, leave him alone. 当老板生气时，不要理他。||||I'm my own boss. 我自己当自己的老板。

name: lightning
interpret: n.闪电&adj.闪电般的，快速的
example: 单词 lightning 的例句||||His eyes glared like lightning. 他的目光犹如一道闪电。||||Lightning flashed during the storm. 暴风雨中闪电大作。

name: princess
interpret: n.公主，王妃，公爵夫人
example: 单词 princess 的例句||||The princess grew up happily. 公主很快乐地长大了。||||She was the people's princess. 她是人民的王妃。

name: email
interpret: n.电子邮件（Electronic mail），透过电脑网路传送邮件的方式
example: 单词 email 的例句||||You can send me an email. 你可以给我发一份电子邮件。||||It's Interesting to read your email. 读你的电子邮件很有趣。

name: highway
interpret: n.公路，大路；（美）高速公路
example: 单词 highway 的例句||||A highway bridge is being built over the river. 那条河上正在修筑一座公路桥。||||The highway winds around the mountain. 这条公路盘山而上。

name: relation
interpret: n.关系，亲戚；参考，陈述，故事
example: 单词 relation 的例句||||He is a distant relation of mine. 他是我的远房亲戚。||||There's no relation between the two things. 这两件事没有联系。

name: repeat
interpret: n.重复，反复；vt.重复，复述；vi.重复；adj.重复的，反复的
example: 单词 repeat 的例句||||There will be a repeat of this talk next week. 下星期将重播这次讲话。||||History will not repeat itself. 历史不会重演。

name: require
interpret: vt.需要，要求
example: 单词 require 的例句||||Do you require any information from me? 你需要从我这里得到什么信息吗？||||What quantity do you require? 你要求多大的数量？

name: research
interpret: n.探索；调查；研究 vt./vi.调查；研究
example: 单词 research 的例句||||Research has shown that women live longer than men. 调查表明女性比男性寿命长。||||The research group is ready to start its work. 这个研究小组已准备好随时开始工作。

name: upon
interpret: prep.在……上面
example: 单词 upon 的例句||||I hope that fortune may smile upon you. 我希望幸运之神会向你微笑。||||I rely upon you to finish the work on time. 我相信你会准时完成这项工作的。

name: used
interpret: adj.用旧了的，旧的；习惯于…；过去惯/经常；v. 用；习惯（use的过去式）
example: 单词 used 的例句||||I used to work until nearly 6:00 o'clock each day. 我过去常常工作到6:00左右。||||He used to walk anywhere from two to five miles an hour. 他过去经常一小时走二至五英里。

name: website
interpret: n.（互联网的）站点；网址
example: 单词 website 的例句||||Do you have the address of our website? 你有我们的网址吗？||||A strange website turns up. 出现了一个奇怪的网站。

name: private
interpret: adj.私人的，私有的，个人的
example: 单词 private 的例句||||She never spoke about her private life. 她从未谈论她的私生活。||||He was being followed by a private detective. 他正被私家侦探跟踪。

name: plain
interpret: n.平原，草原；adj.简单的，明白的，平常的；
example: 单词 plain 的例句||||She's in plain clothes. 她的穿着很朴素。||||The book is written in plain English. 那本书是用简明英语写的。

name: risk
interpret: n.冒险；危险性，风险；vt.使遭受……的危险
example: 单词 risk 的例句||||You are taking a big risk driving so fast. 你开车这样快是在冒很大的危险。||||He saved three children alive at risk of his life. 他拼命救出了三个孩子。

name: shame
interpret: n.羞愧，遗憾的事；vt.使羞愧
example: 单词 shame 的例句||||She felt shame after she told the lie. 她撒谎后感到羞愧。||||He felt no shame and no regret. 他不感到羞愧和悔恨。

name: role
interpret: n.角色；任务
example: 单词 role 的例句||||My role has ended here. 我的任务已经在这里结束。||||Mini-computers are playing an important role in our lives. 微型电脑在我们生活中扮演着重要的角色。

name: standard
interpret: n.标准，水准，水平；规格，规范，规定；旗帜；adj.标准的，一般的
example: 单词 standard 的例句||||He wrote in standard English. 他用标准英文写作。||||Their standard of living is very low. 他们的生活水平很低。

name: supply
interpret: n.补给，供给，供应品；vt.补给，供给，提供，补充；vi.替代
example: 单词 supply 的例句||||The shop was unable to supply what she wanted. 这商店不能供应她所需要的商品。||||We can supply the goods from our main store. 这些货我们可以由总店供应。

name: treatment
interpret: n.治疗，疗法；对待，处理
example: 单词 treatment 的例句||||I don't want special treatment. 我不要特别的待遇。||||If the water is pure, it will not need further treatment. 如果水是纯的，它就不需要进一步的处理。

name: trade
interpret: n.贸易，商业，交易；行业，同行；手工艺；主顾，(复数)信风；vi.做生意，购物，交换；vt.用某物交换，做买卖；adj.商业的，专业性的，同行的
example: 单词 trade 的例句||||Transport has always been the key to developing trade. 运输一直是发展贸易的关键。||||The war brought all foreign trade to a stand. 这场战争使一切对外贸易都停止了。

name: discount
interpret: vi.折扣，打折扣，贴现，不重视，低估；vt.打折扣；将…贴现；n.折扣；贴现率
example: 单词 discount 的例句||||Would you give me a discount? 你能给我折扣吗？||||This is a discount price. 这已经是打过折的价格了。

name: birthplace
interpret: n.出生地；故乡
example: 单词 birthplace 的例句||||His birthplace is Washington, but he lives in San Francisco. 他出生于华盛顿，但住在旧金山。||||England is the birthplace of the modern novel. 英国是近代小说发源地。

name: lifestyle
interpret: n.生活方式
example: 单词 lifestyle 的例句||||She had to change her lifestyle and eating habits. 她必须改变生活方式和饮食习惯。||||She had come to enjoy Roberto's luxurious lifestyle. 她渐渐地喜欢上了罗伯托奢侈的生活方式。

name: trainer
interpret: n.训练者，驯服者，驯马师，软运动鞋
example: 单词 trainer 的例句||||The trainer is walking his dogs. 那位驯兽人正在遛他的狗。||||She's been working as a personal trainer for two years. 她做私人教练有两年了。

name: textbook
interpret: n.课本，教科书
example: 单词 textbook 的例句||||The boy forgot where he put his textbook. 那男孩忘记把课本放在什么地方了。||||This textbook contains 25 lessons. 这本教科书共有25课。

name: tag
interpret: n.标签，附属物，名称，谚语；vt.附以签条，尾随，添饰，指责，连接；vi.紧随，尾随
example: 单词 tag 的例句||||Please tag your baggage. 请在你的行李上贴上标签了。||||The clerk attached a price tag to each article. 店员给每一件商品系上标价签。

name: throat
interpret: n.咽喉，喉咙；咽喉状的部分；嗓音，嗓门
example: 单词 throat 的例句||||A fish bone sticks in his throat. 鱼刺卡在他的嗓子里。||||He has a sore throat. 他患了喉炎。

name: alarm
interpret: n.惊慌，恐慌；警报器；vt.使……恐慌
example: 单词 alarm 的例句||||The man on duty rang an alarm. 值班员发出警报。||||The alarm spread rapidly. 警报迅速传开。

name: blank
interpret: adj.空白的；n.空白(处)；vi.消失；vt.使模糊不清
example: 单词 blank 的例句||||Suddenly my mind went blank. 我脑子里突然一片空白。||||Design a new blank form. 设计一个新的空白表单。

name: stretch
interpret: n.伸展，张开，连绵；一段路，一段时间；adj.可伸缩的，弹性的；vt.伸展，张开，曲解
example: 单词 stretch 的例句||||Don't forget to warm up and stretch! 不要忘记做暖身和伸展运动！||||Please stretch out your hands. 请伸出你的双手。

name: heaven
interpret: n.天，天空，天堂，天国
example: 单词 heaven 的例句||||Women hold up half of heaven. 妇女能顶半边天。||||Taiwan is really a heaven of delicacy, everyplace has the well-known repast. 台湾真是个美食的天堂，各地都有著名的小吃。

name: inch
interpret: n.英寸，寸；身高，身材；vt.使缓慢移动；vi.缓慢地移动
example: 单词 inch 的例句||||An inch of time is an inch of gold. 一寸光阴一寸金。||||Inch is a measure of length. 寸是长度的度量单位。

name: labour
interpret: n.劳动，努力，工作；劳工，工人；分娩；vi.劳动，努力，苦干；vt.详细分析，麻烦
example: 单词 labour 的例句||||He has loved labour ever since he was a child. 他从小热爱劳动。||||Labour creates the world. 劳动创造世界。

name: lamb
interpret: n.羔羊，小羊，羔羊肉
example: 单词 lamb 的例句||||The little girl keeps a lamb as a pet. 那个小女孩养了一头羔羊作为宠物。||||A lamb has a curly coat. 羊羔满身是卷毛。

name: marriage
interpret: n.婚姻，密切结合，结婚，婚礼，合并
example: 单词 marriage 的例句||||They have a happy marriage. 他们的婚姻很美满。||||She is uninterested in marriage. 她对结婚不感兴趣。

name: level
interpret: n.水平，水准，标准；adj.同高的，平坦的，齐平的；vi.弄平，瞄准，对准；vt.使同等；对准；弄平
example: 单词 level 的例句||||Our level is very low. 我们的水平很低。||||The water level has been raised by 1.1 metres. 水位提高了1.1米。

name: pacific
interpret: adj.和解的，平静的；[P-]太平洋的；n.[the P -]太平洋
example: 单词 pacific 的例句||||China lies on the east of the Pacific. 中国位于太平洋东部。||||He is serving on a warship in the Pacific. 他在太平洋海域的一艘军舰上服役。

name: oneself
interpret: pron.[反身代词]自己；亲自，本人
example: 单词 oneself 的例句||||If one wants to learn it, one must do it oneself. 要想学会它就得亲自去做。||||It is not good to think only of oneself. 只为自己着想是不好的。

name: passport
interpret: n.护照，手段，通行证
example: 单词 passport 的例句||||In his hurry to leave, he forgot his passport. 他急急忙忙动身的时候忘了带护照。||||A passport that is out of date is invalid. 护照过期是无效的。

name: overcoat
interpret: n.大衣；外套
example: 单词 overcoat 的例句||||Do not leave off your overcoat; it is cold. 不要把你的大衣脱下，天气很冷。||||Although it was so cold, he went out without an overcoat. 天气虽然很冷，他没有穿大衣就出去了。

name: rapid
interpret: adj.迅速的，急促的；n.急流
example: 单词 rapid 的例句||||She had a strong will and power of rapid decision. 她具有坚强的意志和速决的才能。||||He has made rapid progress in his studies. 他在学业上有着迅速的进步。

name: percent
interpret: adj./adv.百分之一，(与基数词连用)百分之...；n.百分之...
example: 单词 percent 的例句||||The goal was missed by less than one percent. 差不到百分之一就完成目标了。||||Forty percent of her money is spent on books. 她把百分之四十的钱用来买书。

name: period
interpret: n.学时，课时；一段时间，时期，周期；句点
example: 单词 period 的例句||||Trade is always good over the Christmas period. 圣诞节期间生意一向很好。||||He nursed the company through a difficult period. 他帮助公司渡过了一段困难时期。

name: regret
interpret: n.遗憾，后悔，抱歉；vi.为...感到遗憾，后悔，惋惜；vt.后悔；惋惜；哀悼
example: 单词 regret 的例句||||Don't rush into marriage, you might regret it later. 不要匆匆忙忙结婚，不然你以后也许要后悔的。||||I regret that I shall not be able to come. 很遗憾，我不能来。

name: charge
interpret: n.指控；费用；冲锋；电荷；炸药；主管；被托管人；嘱咐；vt.控诉，加罪于；使充满
example: 单词 charge 的例句||||The cook is in charge of the kitchen helper. 这位厨师负责管理厨工。||||The policeman said he would take charge of the gun. 那个警察说他来看管这支枪。

name: effort
interpret: n.努力，艰难的尝试
example: 单词 effort 的例句||||I will make every effort to arrive on time. 我将尽一切努力准时到达。||||There isn't much time ahead, so we should redouble our effort. 来日无多，须加倍努力。

name: forgive
interpret: vt(forgave, forgiven)原谅；饶恕
example: 单词 forgive 的例句||||I'll never forgive you for what you said to me last night. 我绝不会宽恕你昨晚对我所说的话。||||I hope you'll forgive me. 希望你能原谅我。

name: disagree
interpret: vi.不同意；不一致，不符；不适宜，有害
example: 单词 disagree 的例句||||If you disagree you should speak out. 如果不同意, 你就该大声地说出来。||||I disagree with you about this. 对于这件事我跟你意见不同。

name: effect
interpret: n.结果；效果，作用 vt.产生，招致，完成
example: 单词 effect 的例句||||The medicine had a good effect on me. 那种药对我有良好功效。||||The drug has had an immediate effect on the patient. 此药对病人立刻产生了效果。

name: export
interpret: vt.输出，出口 n.出口，出口企业，出口品
example: 单词 export 的例句||||These cars are made for export. 这些汽车是为出口而生产的。||||Some coffee and cacao are grown for export. 种植的咖啡豆和可可豆有些是为了出口。

name: formal
interpret: adj.正式的，正规的，形式的
example: 单词 formal 的例句||||The letter is written in a formal style. 这封信是用正式文体写的。||||Today's trend is toward less formal clothing. 眼下时尚趋向于穿着随便。

name: import
interpret: vt.进口，输入；意味，表明；对…重要；vi.有关系；n.输入品，进口货；重要性（不可数）输入，进口
example: 单词 import 的例句||||What's the import of the speech? 这个演说的意义是什么？||||The import of cotton goods went up sharply. 棉织品的进口大大增加了。

name: mood
interpret: n.心情，情绪，心地，兴致
example: 单词 mood 的例句||||You must change your mood. 你一定要改变你的情绪才行。||||She was in a bad mood yesterday. 她昨天心情不好。

name: otherwise
interpret: adv.另外，用别的方法；在其他方面；要不然，否则
example: 单词 otherwise 的例句||||You'd better go now, otherwise you'll miss the train. 你最好现在就走，要不然就赶不上火车了。||||He is noisy, but otherwise a nice boy. 他爱吵闹，但在其他方面却是个好孩子。

name: physical
interpret: adj.物理的，物质的，体力的，身体的，自然的
example: 单词 physical 的例句||||Good physical conditions can never be bought with money. 健康决非金钱所能买到。||||This change of the state is a physical change. 这种状态的变化是物理变化。

name: sadness
interpret: n.悲哀；难过
example: 单词 sadness 的例句||||Smiles help you forget your sadness. 微笑让你忘却悲伤。||||The jokes were a mask to hide his sadness. 玩笑是掩盖他内心悲伤的方式。

name: strength
interpret: n.力量，力气，长处，强度
example: 单词 strength 的例句||||She distrusts her own strength. 她怀疑自己的力量。||||You must reserve your strength for the tennis final. 你必须为网球决赛保存力量。

name: stress
interpret: n.压力，紧迫，强调，重音，重点，应力&vt.加压力于，着重，重读
example: 单词 stress 的例句||||The roof couldn't bear the stress of the snow. 屋顶受不了积雪的压力。||||My parents lay great stress on honesty. 我的父母十分注重诚实。

name: suffer
interpret: vi./vt.遭受；忍受；经历
example: 单词 suffer 的例句||||She couldn't bear to see others suffer. 她不忍看见别人受苦。||||Kings go mad and the people suffer for it. 〔谚语〕国王发狂, 百姓遭殃。

name: valuable
interpret: adj.有价值的，贵重的，宝贵的，可估价的
example: 单词 valuable 的例句||||This is one of the most valuable lessons I learned. 这是我所学到的最宝贵的教训。||||He has a valuable collection of stamps. 他收藏了很有价值的邮票。

name: struggle
interpret: vi.努力；挣扎；奋斗；n.竞争；努力；奋斗
example: 单词 struggle 的例句||||They joined the struggle against him. 他们参加了反对他的斗争。||||After a long struggle, she gained control of the business. 她经过长期的努力，在业务上已能应付自如。

name: Weekly
interpret: n.周刊，周报；adj.每周的，一周一次的，周刊的；adv.每周，一周一次；
example: 单词 Weekly 的例句||||Are you paid weekly or monthly? 你拿周薪还是月薪？ ||||He writes a weekly letter to his parents. 他每周给父母写一封信。

name: battle
interpret: n.战斗，战役；斗争；vi.斗争，搏斗
example: 单词 battle 的例句||||People whose marriage has ended often battle over the children. 离婚者常为孩子而争斗。||||This battle is our last chance, we must fight to a finish. 这场战斗是我们最后的机会，我们必须战斗到底。

name: emergency
interpret: n.紧急情况，突然事件，非常时刻
example: 单词 emergency 的例句||||You had to be ready for any emergency. 你得随时预防不测。||||She has the ability to keep calm in an emergency. 她有处变不惊的本事。

name: exit
interpret: n.出口，退场，离去；[计算机]DOS命令:如果存在这个命令，则它可从辅助处理器返回到主处理器；v.退出，脱离
example: 单词 exit 的例句||||They made a rush for the exit. 他们猛然冲向出口处。||||The fire exit downstairs will be open for one minute. 楼下的防火出口将会打开一分钟。

name: within
interpret: n.内部，里头；adv.在内部，在内心里；prep.在…之内
example: 单词 within 的例句||||The work must be done within the given time. 这个工作必须在规定的时间内完成。||||Within two weeks, she gained five pounds in weight. 两周内她的体重增加了5磅。

name: likely
interpret: adj.有可能的，合适的，前途有望的；adv.或许，可能
example: 单词 likely 的例句||||Look at the sky. It's most likely going to rain. 瞧！这天多半要下雨。||||It's so cloudy and cold that it's likely to snow. 天气又阴又冷，大半要下雪。

name: frighten
interpret: vt.使惊恐，吓唬；vi. 惊恐，害怕
example: 单词 frighten 的例句||||He tried to frighten me by showing me a knife. 他用刀子吓唬我。||||You'll find that I don't frighten easily. 你会发现我不是轻易就会害怕的。

name: editor
interpret: n.编者，编辑，主笔；编辑器
example: 单词 editor 的例句||||He's the editor of the Riverdale paper. 他是Riverdale报的编辑。||||He got a job as an editor of a newspaper. 他在一家报社找到了一份编辑工作。

name: joy
interpret: n.欢喜，乐事，高兴；vt.使快乐，令人高兴；vi.欢喜
example: 单词 joy 的例句||||To my great joy, my lost watch was found. 使我极为高兴的是我丢失的手表找到了。||||It is very difficult to describe my joy in words. 我的快乐难以用语言来形容。

name: useless
interpret: adj.无用的，无效的，无益的
example: 单词 useless 的例句||||His advise is useless to our project. 他的建议对我们的计划没有什么价值。||||A car is useless without gasolene. 汽车没有汽油便无用。

name: disaster
interpret: n.灾难，灾祸
example: 单词 disaster 的例句||||God help us all at this time of national disaster. 在这国难当头之际, 愿苍天帮助我们大家。||||What a terrible disaster! 真是了不得的大祸啊!

name: crash
interpret: n.碰撞，坠落，坠毁；撞击声，爆裂声；失败，瓦解；vt.碰撞，坠落，坠毁；vi.碰撞
example: 单词 crash 的例句||||There was a serious car crash this morning. 今晨发生了一起严重的撞车事故。||||The cars hit with loud crash. 汽车相撞发出巨大的轰隆声。

name: sadly
interpret: adv.悲痛地，悲惨地，悲伤地
example: 单词 sadly 的例句||||She looked at him sadly. 她难过地看着他。||||Sadly the good times aren't returning any time soon. 遗憾的是，好时光不会很快就回来。

name: nowhere
interpret: adv.任何地方都不；无处，到处都无
example: 单词 nowhere 的例句||||There's nowhere else I really want to go to. 没有别的地方是我真正想去的。||||He had nowhere to go, so I took him in. 他无处可去，所以我收留了他。

name: scream
interpret: n.尖叫声；vi. 尖叫，大笑，尖啸，令人震惊；vt.尖叫着说，大叫大嚷着要求
example: 单词 scream 的例句||||Don't scream, I can hear what you are saying. 别喊，我听得见你说些什么。||||He was so funny, he made us scream with laughter. 他很有趣，逗得我们哈哈大笑。

name: broad
interpret: adj.宽的；辽阔的；广大的
example: 单词 broad 的例句||||He has a broad outlook on life. 他的人生观十分豁达。||||He has a broad forehead. 他长着宽阔的前额。

name: wildlife
interpret: n.野生动物；野生植物；野生生物
example: 单词 wildlife 的例句||||There are laws that protect the wildlife in this park. 这个公园内的野生动物受法律保护。||||A lot of wildlife is losing its natural habitat. 很多野生物正逐渐丧失它们的栖息地。

name: daylight
interpret: n.日光，白昼；黎明
example: 单词 daylight 的例句||||It is easier to read by daylight than by lamplight. 在日光下读书比在灯光下读书舒适。||||To get there on time we must leave before daylight. 为了准时到那里，我们必须在黎明之前离开。

name: importance
interpret: n.重要性，重大，价值
example: 单词 importance 的例句||||Never mind who told me, that's of no importance. 不用管是谁告诉我的，这无关紧要。||||Today more and more businessmen understand the importance of sports. 今天越来越多的商人认识到运动的重要性。

name: dishonest
interpret: adj.不老实，不诚实的
example: 单词 dishonest 的例句||||Never keep company with dishonest persons. 不要与不诚实的人打交道。||||The girl lost her place because she was dishonest. 这姑娘不老实，失去了职位。

name: male
interpret: n.男人，雄性动物；adj.男性的，属于雄性的，有力的
example: 单词 male 的例句||||This flower is a male. 这朵花是雄性植物。||||This is a male magazine. 这是一本男性杂志。

name: advise
interpret: vt.劝告，通知，与…商量，建议；vi. 提意见，商量
example: 单词 advise 的例句||||I strongly advise against it. 我强烈反对这样做。|||| We advise that steps be taken at once. 我们建议立即采取措施。

name: remove
interpret: n.阶级，升级，移动，搬家，距离；vt.移动，调动，除去，迁移，开除，移交；vi. 迁移
example: 单词 remove 的例句||||We are going to remove into a new house. 我们将要搬到一座新房子里去。||||They have decided to remove to a warm climate. 他们已决定搬到一个气候温暖的地方居住。

name: therefore
interpret: adv.因此，所以
example: 单词 therefore 的例句||||He was busy, therefore, he couldn't come. 他忙得很，所以没有来。||||He was very tired and therefore he fell sound asleep. 他非常疲劳，因此就睡熟了。

name: affect
interpret: vt. 影响, 感动, 假装, 模仿, 爱好, 倾向于;n. 自觉感情;
example: 单词 affect 的例句||||A bad home environment can affect a child's healthy growth. 不良的家庭环境能影响儿童的健康成长。||||This article will affect my thinking. 这篇文章将会影响我的思想。

name: aid
interpret: n. 帮助,有帮助的事物； vt. 援助,帮助；vi.帮助； abbr.=Agency for International Development 国际开发署[美]
example: 单词 aid 的例句||||He went to the aid of the hurt man. 他前去帮助那受伤的人。|||| He crossed the river by the aid of a tree. 他借助于一棵树过了河。

name: connect
interpret: vt. 连接, 联合, 联系;vi. 连接, 联合, 联系;
example: 单词 connect 的例句||||I cannot connect the two things in my mind. 在我心中, 我无法将这两件事情联系在一起。||||The wires connect under the floor. 电线是在地板下接通的。

name: conclusion
interpret: n.总结，结束，决定，结论
example: 单词 conclusion 的例句||||I found the conclusion of his book very interesting. 我觉得他这本书的结尾很有趣。||||He came to the conclusion at one jump. 他一下子就得出结论。

name: cure
interpret: n.治疗，治愈，治疗法，怪人vt.治疗，治愈，改正，腌制，加工处理
example: 单词 cure 的例句||||He says he can cure me but I still doubt him. 他说他能治好我的病，但我还是不相信他。||||The only way to cure backache is to rest. 治疗背痛的唯一办法是休息。

name: disabled
interpret: adj.肢体有残疾的，伤残的；残疾的
example: 单词 disabled 的例句||||She has disabled herself from walking by a fall. 她因跌伤不能行走。||||Old age disabled him for hard work. 年迈使他不能胜任繁重工作。

name: contact
interpret: n.联系，交际，熟人，接触；vi.接触，联系；vt.使接触
example: 单词 contact 的例句||||We agreed to contact again as soon as possible. 我们同意尽快再次联系。||||She is still in close contact with Sarah. 她仍然同萨拉人联系密切。

name: download
interpret: n./vt.下载（计算机用语）
example: 单词 download 的例句||||I need to download some lessons for class. 我需要给班上下载一些课程。||||I want to download some free software from the net. 我想从网上下载一些免费软件。

name: educate
interpret: vt.教育；训练，培养
example: 单词 educate 的例句||||It takes patience to educate children. 教育儿童须要耐心。||||I'd like you to educate me. 我想请你教我。

name: goods
interpret: n.商品，货物
example: 单词 goods 的例句||||He is loading the goods into the back of the car. 他正把货物装入车的后部。||||The boy delivered the goods to the right house. 那个男孩送货给要货的人家。

name: function
interpret: n.功能；作用
example: 单词 function 的例句||||The function of the artist is to disturb the still. 艺术家的作用是去打破平静。||||The function of the heart is to send blood round the body. 心脏的功能就是向全身输送血液。

name: process
interpret: n.程序，进行，过程；vt.加工，处理，对…处置，对…起诉；adj.经加工的，三色版的
example: 单词 process 的例句||||The bridge is in the process of being built. 大桥正在建设中。||||We will process your order at once. 我们立刻处理您的订单。

name: spirit
interpret: n.烈酒（常用复数）；精神；情绪
example: 单词 spirit 的例句||||You're feeling her spirit. 你感受着她的精神。||||His selfless spirit is worth praising. 他的无私精神值得赞扬。

name: vocabulary
interpret: n.词汇，词汇量；词汇表
example: 单词 vocabulary 的例句||||How can I widen my vocabulary? 怎样扩大自己的词汇量？||||You can find all the new words in the vocabulary of the text. 你能在课文的词汇表中找到所有的生词。

name: modest
interpret: adj.谦虚的；适度的；端庄的
example: 单词 modest 的例句||||Don't you be so modest. 你别老跟那谦虚。||||He's a very modest man. 他是个很谦逊的人。

name: announce
interpret: vt.宣布，声称，显示，预告；vi.当报幕员，宣布参加竞选
example: 单词 announce 的例句||||They will announce the result of the vote tonight. 今晚他们将宣布投票结果。||||The children listened for the clock to announce the New Year. 孩子们等着听时钟报新年。

name: beyond
interpret: prep.在(或向)…的那边，远于；迟于；超出
example: 单词 beyond 的例句||||For many years he had lived beyond the seas. 他在海外生活多年。||||I know nothing beyond this. 除此以外我一无所知。

name: career
interpret: n.事业；生涯
example: 单词 career 的例句||||He made a successful career in business. 他的商务生涯十分成功。||||You're succeed in your career. 你的事业很成功。

name: expression
interpret: n.表达，表示，表现，表情，措辞，词句
example: 单词 expression 的例句||||He looked at me without expression. 他毫无表情地看着我。||||Her face was without expression. 她的脸上没有表情。

name: favour
interpret: n.亲切；宠爱；书信；容貌；偏袒；vt. 赞成；喜爱；有助于
example: 单词 favour 的例句||||Chances favour the minds that are prepared. 机会只青睐有所准备的人。||||Will you please do me a favour? 劳你帮个忙。

name: eventually
interpret: adv.终于，最后
example: 单词 eventually 的例句||||Eventually he won the match. 他终于赢得了这场比赛。||||Their marriage eventually broke up. 他们的婚姻终告破裂。

name: exact
interpret: adj.确切的，正确的；准确的，精确的；vt.强要，强求；急需，需要
example: 单词 exact 的例句||||I need to know the exact size. 我需要知道确切的尺寸。||||Do you know the exact date? 你知道确切日期吗？

name: force
interpret: n.力量，武力，影响力；vt.强迫，强夺，加压力；[计算机]强制
example: 单词 force 的例句||||I don't hold with the use of force. 我不赞成使用武力。||||We had to use force to get into the house. 我们不得不强行进屋。

name: fortune
interpret: n.财富，运气，兴隆，大量财产，好运，命运
example: 单词 fortune 的例句||||Fortune has always smiled at him. 他的命运一向很好。||||To live in a city is a great fortune itself. 住进城市是伟大的财富。

name: jewel
interpret: n.宝石，珠宝，珠宝饰物，贵重的人[物]；vt.用宝石装饰
example: 单词 jewel 的例句||||He spent important money on a small jewel for his wife. 他花大笔钱购买小小的宝石给太太。||||This painting is the jewel of my collection. 这是我藏画中最珍贵的一幅。

name: intend
interpret: vt.想要，打算；打算使…为；意指，意思是
example: 单词 intend 的例句||||How long do you intend to stay with the firm? 你准备在公司干多久？||||He did not intend paying the bill. 他不打算付账。

name: nation
interpret: n.民族；国家；国民
example: 单词 nation 的例句||||The President gave an address to the nation over the radio. 总统向全国发表广播演说。||||The country needs a leader who will hold the nation together. 这个国家需要有一个能把全民族团结起来的领袖。

name: percentage
interpret: n.百分比，比率，部份
example: 单词 percentage 的例句||||Television attracts a large percentage of people. 电视吸引了大部分观众。||||A large percentage of school-books now have pictures. 现在大部分教科书有插图。

name: rainfall
interpret: n.一场雨；降雨量
example: 单词 rainfall 的例句||||Rainfall is plentiful in the area. 这个地区雨量充足。||||There was another rainfall early this morning. 今天清晨又下了一场雨。

name: permission
interpret: n.许可；同意；许可证
example: 单词 permission 的例句||||You were wrong to take the car without permission. 你未经许可就把车开走是不应该的。||||With your permission I'll leave now. 有你的允许，我这就离开。

name: republic
interpret: n.共和国，共和政体，团体，界
example: 单词 republic 的例句||||The People's Republic of China was founded in 1949. 中华人民共和国成立于一九四九年。||||The PRC stands for the People's Republic of China. PRC代表中华人民共和国。

name: rugby
interpret: n.橄榄球，橄榄球赛
example: 单词 rugby 的例句||||At school I boxed and played rugby. 在学校时我既打拳击又玩橄榄球。||||We won the rugby game by 12 points to 3. 我们以十二比三赢得了那场橄榄球赛。

name: upper
interpret: adj.上面的，较高的；上级的，上院的；穿在外面的；北部的，地表的；后期的；n.鞋帮
example: 单词 upper 的例句||||She was introduced into upper society. 她经人介绍进入上流社会。||||Can you reach those books on the upper shelf? 你能够到书架上面那一格上的书吗？

name: starve
interpret: vi.饿死；挨饿；极需，渴望；vt.使挨饿
example: 单词 starve 的例句||||They decided to starve the enemy out. 他们决定使敌人受饿而出来。||||Don't starve the kitten. 别饿着小猫。

name: steel
interpret: n.钢，钢制品，坚强；adj.钢的，如钢铁般的，非常坚强的；vt.包钢，使坚硬，使下定决心
example: 单词 steel 的例句||||Is that box made of tin or steel? 这个盒子是锡做的还是钢做的？||||Steel is made from iron. 钢是由铁炼成的。

name: custom
interpret: n.习惯，习俗，风俗习惯
example: 单词 custom 的例句||||This custom has been carried down from the 18 th century. 这一习俗从18世纪一直传到现在。||||They kept to the custom to hold their wedding. 他们按当地风俗举行婚礼。

name: addition
interpret: n.加法；附加，附加物，增加部分，加
example: 单词 addition 的例句||||That is a simple addition. 那是简单的加法。||||They've just had an addition to the family. 他们家里刚刚添了一口人。

name: affair
interpret: n.事情，事务；恋爱事件，外遇
example: 单词 affair 的例句||||If you will undertake the affair, I shall be very grateful. 要是你愿意承办这件事，我将不胜感激。||||He helped me in the recent affair. 他在近期的事务中帮助过我。

name: arrangement
interpret: n.安排，准备；整理，排列，布置
example: 单词 arrangement 的例句||||There's nothing to keep me to such an arrangement. 什么也不能使我遵从这样的安排。||||The arrangement is all right with me. 这样安排我没意见。

name: chemical
interpret: adj.化学的；n.化学制品
example: 单词 chemical 的例句||||The same water was reused after chemical treatment. 原来的水经过化学处理之后再度使用。||||There was a terrible explosion at the chemical plant. 那家化工厂发生了一起可怕的爆炸事故。

name: decrease
interpret: vi.减少，减小；vt.减少，减小；n.减少，减小
example: 单词 decrease 的例句||||The decrease in sales was almost 20 percent. 销售量差不多减少了20%。||||The birthrate is on the decrease. 人口出生率正在下降。

name: dairy
interpret: n.牛奶场，乳品店；adj.乳制品的
example: 单词 dairy 的例句||||The yogurt sold by this dairy is delicious. 这家乳品店出售的酸奶非常好喝。||||He kept a few dairy cows. 他养了几头奶牛。

name: destination
interpret: n.目的地，目标，目的
example: 单词 destination 的例句||||I eventually arrived at my destination. 我终于到达了目的地。||||They were flown to the destination. 他们被空运到目的地。

name: correction
interpret: n.订正，改正，改正的地方
example: 单词 correction 的例句||||Science is a process of self-correction. 科学是自我校正的过程。||||Would it be good enough if I did not make the correction? 如果不做修改，是不是也挺好呢？

name: disability
interpret: n.无力，无能，残疾
example: 单词 disability 的例句||||His disability caused this thing to fail. 他的无能导致了这件事失败。||||As a matter of fact, many people have a disability. 事实上，许多人身体都有某种缺陷。

name: excitement
interpret: n.刺激；兴奋；激动
example: 单词 excitement 的例句||||His voice rose in excitement. 他激动得声音提高了。||||He opened the door and ran out in great excitement. 他打开门，非常激动地跑了出去。

name: crop
interpret: vt.剪切，收割，修剪，种植；n.农作物，产量，平头 vi.收获
example: 单词 crop 的例句||||This year's crop is better than any other year's. 今年的收成比以往哪一年都好。||||This plant doesn't crop very heavily. 这种作物收成不很大。

name: explanation
interpret: n.解释，解说，说明
example: 单词 explanation 的例句||||I had better say a few words by way of explanation. 我最好以解释的方式说几句话。||||She did not continue with her explanation. 她没有继续解释下去。

name: flow
interpret: n.流，水流，流量；vi.流，流动；vt.淹没
example: 单词 flow 的例句||||The average flow of the river is 200 cubic metres per second. 这条河平均流量为每秒二百立方米。||||I love the still flow of the river. 我喜欢那条河静静的流淌。

name: foolish
interpret: adj.愚蠢的，傻的；荒谬的，可笑的
example: 单词 foolish 的例句||||The foolish boy was laughed at wherever he went. 这个愚蠢的男孩不论走到哪里都受到讥笑。||||Don't worry me with such foolish questions. 不要用这些愚蠢的问题来烦我。

name: freeze
interpret: vi.冻结，冷冻，僵硬，楞住；vt.使结冰，使冻住，使呆住；n.结冰，凝固
example: 单词 freeze 的例句||||I'll buy extra meat and just freeze it. 我要多买些肉冷藏起来。||||Temperature must be fifteen degrees. We won't freeze. 温度一定能有十五度。我们不会冻死了。

name: nuclear
interpret: adj.原子核的，原子能的；核动力的
example: 单词 nuclear 的例句||||China will never be the first to use nuclear weapons. 中国绝不首先使用核武器。||||He's very interested in nuclear physics. 他对核物理学非常感兴趣。

name: liquid
interpret: n.液体，流体，流音；adj.液体的，透明的，明亮的，流动的，易变的
example: 单词 liquid 的例句||||Thick liquid pours much more slowly than thin liquid. 稠的液体倒出来比稀的慢。||||I'd like to have some liquid food. 我想吃点液体的。

name: literature
interpret: n.文学，文学作品；文献，图书资料
example: 单词 literature 的例句||||He gave up medicine and took to literature. 他放弃医学，开始从事文学。||||That was the high summer of English literature. 那是英国文学的黄金时代。

name: mineral
interpret: n.矿物，无机物，苏打水；adj.矿物的，似矿物的
example: 单词 mineral 的例句||||She bent down and picked up a mineral. 她弯下身子捡起一块矿石。||||The sea bed is rich in mineral. 海底有丰富的矿物质。

name: movement
interpret: n.运动；动作；运转
example: 单词 movement 的例句||||The police are keeping a watch on his movement. 警方密切注视着他的动向。||||We are friends of labour movement. 我们是工人运动的支持者。

name: reception
interpret: n.接待，招待会，接收
example: 单词 reception 的例句||||Thank you for your warm reception. 谢谢你们的热情接待。||||What time does the reception begin? 招待会什么时候开始？

name: personally
interpret: adv.亲自，直接，个人，就我个人来说
example: 单词 personally 的例句||||I handed the book to him personally. 书是我亲自交给他的。||||Personally, I prefer fall weather. 我个人比较喜欢秋天的天气。

name: reject
interpret: n.被拒之人，被弃之物，不合格品，次品，不及格者，落选者；vt.拒绝，抵制，否决
example: 单词 reject 的例句||||Choose the good apples and reject the bad ones. 把好的苹果挑出来，把坏的剔出去。||||This is the reject. 这是次品。

name: entry
interpret: n.登录，条目，进入
example: 单词 entry 的例句||||I will wait for you at the entry. 我在入口处等你。||||I wish you success with the ACE entry test. 衷心地祝愿你们成功地通过ACE入学考试！

name: equipment
interpret: n.装备，设备
example: 单词 equipment 的例句||||In the new factory all the equipment was up to date. 这个新工厂里的所有设备都是现代化的。||||The oil company will ship out the heavy equipment. 石油公司将用船运送重型设备。

name: drown
interpret: vt.淹没，淹死；使沉湎，使迷恋
example: 单词 drown 的例句||||The loud cheers drown out his shouts. 欢呼声盖过了他的喊叫声。||||Don't play by the river in case you fall in and drown! 不要在河边玩耍，以免你掉到河里淹死。

name: injure
interpret: vt.伤害，损害，使受冤屈
example: 单词 injure 的例句||||If you go on at that rate, you will injure your health. 你如果照这样子继续下去，你会损害健康的。||||You will injure your health by smoking too much. 你吸烟太多，有伤身体。

name: intelligent
interpret: adj.聪明的，伶俐的，有才智的
example: 单词 intelligent 的例句||||All human beings are much more intelligent than animal. 整个人类都比动物聪明得多。||||She was intelligent enough to turn off the gas. 她关掉了煤气, 够机灵的。

name: fuel
interpret: n.燃料，木炭；vt.加燃料，供以燃料；vi.得到燃料
example: 单词 fuel 的例句||||They ran out of fuel. 他们耗光了燃料。||||I think we have enough fuel to see the winter out. 我看我们的燃料足够这个冬天用了。

name: junior
interpret: adj.年少的，较年幼的；资历较浅的；三年级的；n.年少者；等级较低者；三年级学生
example: 单词 junior 的例句||||Mary, a junior, will graduate next year. 玛丽，一名三年级的中学生, 明年将毕业。||||We could give the job to somebody junior. 我们可以把这份工作交给职位较低的人。

name: nowadays
interpret: n.现在，现时，当今；adv.时下，现今
example: 单词 nowadays 的例句||||Nowadays it is very easy to earn a living. 现今谋生很容易。||||Nowadays petrol costs too much. 如今的汽油太贵了。

name: poet
interpret: n.诗人；空想家
example: 单词 poet 的例句||||Sometimes he is funny; sometimes he seems like a poet. 有时他很滑稽，有时他又像个诗人。||||The poet lived a happy life . 这位诗人过着幸福的生活。

name: sex
interpret: n.性别，男性或女性，性欲；vt.区别…的性别，引起…的性欲
example: 单词 sex 的例句||||What sex is this fish? 这条鱼是什么性别的？||||She does not enjoy the company of the opposite sex. 她不喜欢由异性奉陪。

name: target
interpret: n.目标，靶子；vt.为…订指标，订定
example: 单词 target 的例句||||The factory met its production target ahead of time. 工厂提前完成了生产指标。||||He fired his gun at the target. 他朝着目标开了枪。

name: previous
interpret: adj.早先的，前面的，过急的；adv.早先，前面；
example: 单词 previous 的例句||||The teacher examined the students on the previous lesson. 这位老师检查了学生们课前学习的情况。||||The year's harvest is better than any previous year's. 今年的收成比以往哪年都好。

name: cruel
interpret: adj.残酷的，残忍的；痛苦的，引起痛苦的
example: 单词 cruel 的例句||||Tigers are cruel by nature. 老虎生性残忍。||||The cruel man abandoned his wife and child. 那个狠心的男人舍弃了妻小。

name: summary
interpret: n.摘要，概要；adj.摘要的，简略的
example: 单词 summary 的例句||||There is a summary at the end of each chapter. 每一章节后均附有小结。||||I'm giving you a summary of facts. 我将概述一下事实。

name: mainly
interpret: adv.主要地，大抵，大概
example: 单词 mainly 的例句||||The sea water is mainly composed of water and salt. 海水主要由水和盐组成。||||It is mainly because of my fault. 这主要是由于我的过错。

name: carpet
interpret: n.毯子，地毯，地毯般覆盖物；vt.铺盖.覆盖
example: 单词 carpet 的例句||||The carpet is on the floor. 地毯铺在地板上。||||We rolled up the carpet. 我们把地毯卷了起来。

name: flash
interpret: n.闪光，闪现，一瞬间；vi.闪光，闪现，反射；vt.使闪光，反射
example: 单词 flash 的例句||||Flash your light about and see if anyone is hiding here. 用手电筒四周照照, 看看是否有人藏在这里。||||There was a flash of light in the distance. 远处灯光一闪。

name: container
interpret: n.容器；集装箱
example: 单词 container 的例句||||Is that container large enough to hold all the books? 那个箱子装所有的书够大吗？||||Pour some more water into the container. 再往容器里加点水。

name: content
interpret: n.内容，满足，意义；adj.满足的，满意的，意义的；vt.使...满足，使...安心；
example: 单词 content 的例句||||You will have to content yourself with what you have. 你应该满足于你所拥有的一切。||||He lives in peace and content. 他过着安宁而满足的生活。

name: forever
interpret: adv.(=for ever)永远；总是
example: 单词 forever 的例句||||Teacher is powerful in a child's eyes forever. 老师在孩子们的心中永远是强者。||||You can't depend on your parents forever. 你不能永远依赖你父母。

name: religion
interpret: n.宗教，信仰；信念，关心的事
example: 单词 religion 的例句||||What religion do you have? 你有什么宗教信仰？||||Yoga is not a religion. 瑜伽不是一种宗教。

name: replace
interpret: vt.替换；取代；把…放回原处；归还，赔还
example: 单词 replace 的例句||||Please replace after reading. 阅毕请放回原处。||||The sound of cars will replace the sound of birds. 轿车的声音会代替鸟鸣的声音

name: typewriter
interpret: n.打字机
example: 单词 typewriter 的例句||||He is practicing on the typewriter. 他在练习打字。||||Please cover the typewriter after use. 用完后请把打字机罩好。

name: admit
interpret: vt.承认，供认；准许…进入，准许...加入
example: 单词 admit 的例句||||He will never admit to me that he is lazy. 他不会向我承认他懒惰。|||| If you're wrong, you should admit it. 错了就要认账。

name: African
interpret: adj.非洲的 n.非洲人，非洲居民
example: 单词 African 的例句||||He was a tall, well-dressed African. 他是一个高个子、穿着很好的非洲人。||||Egypt is an African country. 埃及是一个非洲国家。

name: cheat
interpret: n.骗子，欺骗行为；vi.欺骗，作弊；vt.欺骗；骗取
example: 单词 cheat 的例句||||You mustn't cheat in the exam. 你不准在考试中作弊。||||You can not cheat me in any case. 无论如何你是骗不了我的。

name: anger
interpret: n.生气，怒，愤怒；vt.使发怒；vi. 发怒
example: 单词 anger 的例句||||I won't see him until his anger has cooled down. 等他怒气消了，我再去看他。||||His eyes flash with anger. 他眼中冒出怒火。

name: cheek
interpret: n.面颊，脸，厚脸皮；vt.厚着脸皮做
example: 单词 cheek 的例句||||The light wind gently brushed her cheek. 微风轻拂着她的脸颊。||||She has a black cheek. 她有一张黑脸蛋。

name: apology
interpret: n.道歉；勉强的替代物
example: 单词 apology 的例句||||I must make an apology to her. 我必须向她道歉。||||Please accept my sincere apology. 请接受我诚挚的歉意。

name: appeal
interpret: n.请求，呼吁，上诉，吸引力，要求；vi.求助，诉请，要求；vt.控诉
example: 单词 appeal 的例句||||The court rejected her appeal. 法院驳回了她的上诉。||||The people came to appeal for some help from the government. 人们向政府请求某些支助。

name: citizen
interpret: n.公民；市民；平民
example: 单词 citizen 的例句||||My son is an American citizen. 我的儿子是美国公民。||||Every citizen has the duty to construct his country. 每个公民都有建设祖国的责任。

name: being
interpret: n.存在；生存；生命存在，生命，人， 本质；art.在，有，是
example: 单词 being 的例句||||Can you explain to me the purpose of being? 你能对我解释一下存在的目的吗？||||What is the purpose of our being? 我们生存的目的是什么？

name: differ
interpret: vi.不同，不同意，与…不一致
example: 单词 differ 的例句||||We differ from each other in many ways. 我们在许多方面不同。||||Modern cars differ from the early ones. 现代汽车不同于早期汽车。

name: drag
interpret: n.拖，拖累；vt.拖累，拖拉，慢条斯理地走；vi.拖曳；缓慢而吃力地行进
example: 单词 drag 的例句||||It will take two elephants to drag all the wood away. 需要两头大象才能把所有的木材拖走。||||He walked with a drag. 他拖着脚走路。

name: god
interpret: n.上帝，神；被极度崇拜的人或物
example: 单词 god 的例句||||God knows how the cat got up on the roof. 只有天知道那只猫是怎样爬上房顶的。||||God wills that man should be happy. 上帝愿人类幸福。

name: forehead
interpret: n.额，前额，前部
example:
单词 forehead 的例句||||Mother kissed my forehead. 妈妈吻了我的前额。
||||There are a lot of lines on his forehead. 他额头上都是皱纹。

name: fortunate
interpret: adj.幸运的；带来幸运的
example: 单词 fortunate 的例句||||I feel fortunate to have met them. 我觉得很幸运能见到他们。||||I think you have been fortunate. 我认为你很幸运。

name: imagination
interpret: n.想象力；空想，妄想；想象出来的事物
example: 单词 imagination 的例句||||He has plenty of imagination. 他有丰富的想像力。||||You have a strong imagination. 你的想象力很丰富。

name: judge
interpret: n.裁判员；法官，审判官；推事；vt.判断，判决，裁定，审理，鉴定；vi.下判断，作评价
example: 单词 judge 的例句||||He is a fair judge. 他是一位公正的审判员。||||Teachers always judge their students on the final examination. 老师常根据期末考试来评价他们的学生。

name: insurance
interpret: n.安全保障；保险，保险业
example: 单词 insurance 的例句||||The insurance is very necessary. 保险是很必要的。||||The insurance business is built on trust. 保险业建立在信任的基础上。

name: pole
interpret: n.极点，磁极，电极，杆，竿，相反的极端；vt.用竿支撑，用棒推；vi.撑篙
example: 单词 pole 的例句||||The earth's poles are called the North Pole and the South Pole. 地球的极点称作北极和南极。||||The horse broke away from my horse pole and ran wild. 这匹烈马挣断了我的套马杆狂奔起来。

name: purchase
interpret: n.购买，购买品，价值，紧握，起重装置；vt.购买，赢得，努力取得，举起
example: 单词 purchase 的例句||||What type of insurance should I purchase? 我应该买什么保险？||||Where did you purchase it? 你在哪买的？

name: seize
interpret: vt.抓住，逮住；夺取
example: 单词 seize 的例句||||I can't quite seize your meaning. 我不太理解你的意思。||||He failed to seize the opportunity. 他没有把握住那个机会。

name: sideways
interpret: adv.向旁边，斜地里，向侧面地；adj.旁边的，向侧面的
example: 单词 sideways 的例句||||The boy gave the girl a sideways look. 这男孩斜视了那姑娘一眼。||||He looked sideways at me in the meeting. 他在会议上斜着眼看我。

name: thus
interpret: adv.如此，这样；因而，从而；例如
example: 单词 thus 的例句||||She studied hard, thus she got high marks. 她用功读书，因此获得高分。||||The matter stands thus. 事情就是这样。

name: budget
interpret: n.预算；vi.编预算；vt.编入预算，安排；adj.廉价的
example: 单词 budget 的例句||||Are you doing everything possible to reduce your budget? 你在尽一切可能降低预算吗？||||There is a budget department on the first floor. 一楼有廉价商品部。

name: civil
interpret: adj.公民的，市民的；国内的，民间的；文职的；有礼貌的，文明的
example: 单词 civil 的例句||||It was a civil case. 这是一起民事案件。||||He made a very civil bow to me. 他对我彬彬有礼地鞠了一躬。

name: airline
interpret: adj.(飞机)航线的；n.(飞机的)航线，航空公司
example: 单词 airline 的例句||||He spent seventeen years as an airline pilot. 他当了17年的航空公司飞行员。||||My brother flies for an airline. 我哥哥在一家航空公司当飞行员。

name: connection
interpret: n.联接，连结，联系；亲戚关系
example: 单词 connection 的例句||||How long will the connection of the telephone take? 接通电话需要多长时间呢？||||She is a connection of mine. 她是我的一个亲戚。

name: atmosphere
interpret: n.大气，空气，气氛，大气层，大气圈
example: 单词 atmosphere 的例句||||We live in an atmosphere of freedom. 我们生活在自由的环境中。||||We try and provide a very homely atmosphere. 我们试图营造一种非常舒适放松的气氛。

name: desire
interpret: vt.愿望，期望，希望；要求，请求；n.愿望，心愿；请求，要求
example: 单词 desire 的例句||||The people desire peace, security and happiness. 人民向往和平、安全与幸福。||||He has a strong desire to meet you. 他极想见你。

name: available
interpret: adj.可用到的，可利用的，有用的，有空的，接受探访的
example: 单词 available 的例句||||My bicycle is not available, and it is being repaired. 我的自行车现在不能用，因为正在修理。||||This book is not easily available. 这本书可不好买。

name: contribution
interpret: n.捐献；捐款，捐资
example: 单词 contribution 的例句||||We made a contribution to the disaster area. 我们捐助灾区。||||We should make a contribution to keeping our school clean and tidy. 我们应当为保护校园整洁、卫生做贡献。

name: dip
interpret: vt.浸，蘸，沾；vi. 浸；下降，下沉；倾斜；舀，掏
example: 单词 dip 的例句||||The sun seems to dip into the sea each evening. 每晚太阳都好像沉到海里去了。||||Dip your fingers in to see how hot the water is. 把手指伸进水里看有多热。

name: fame
interpret: n.名声，名望，著名，闻名
example: 单词 fame 的例句||||Many people hunt after fame in their lives but never find it. 很多人一生追逐名利，但是总不能成功。||||She is a woman of ill fame. 她是个名声不好的女人。

name: financial
interpret: adj.财政的，经济的，财务的，金融的
example: 单词 financial 的例句||||He was freed from financial dependence on his parents. 他在经济上摆脱了对父母的依赖。||||In running a company, strict financial management means everything. 经营一家，公司严格的财务管理是至关重要的。

name: servant
interpret: n.仆人，有用物，公务员，雇员
example: 单词 servant 的例句||||Why doesn't the servant come when I call? 当我叫的时候，为何仆人没来？||||Tell the servant to knock me up at five o'clock. 告诉仆人五点敲门叫醒我。

name: fortunately
interpret: adv.有幸地；幸运地
example: 单词 fortunately 的例句||||Fortunately for him, he can swim. 对他来说幸运的是，他会游泳。||||Fortunately the rain stopped before we started. 幸亏在我们动身前雨停了。

name: ignore
interpret: vt. 不理睬, 忽视, 驳回, 忽略;
example: 单词 ignore 的例句||||Do not ignore others dream for ever. 永远不要忽视别人的梦想。||||We chose to ignore her rudeness. 我们决定忽视她的粗暴无理。

name: independent
interpret: adj.独立自主的；不须依赖的，不受约束的
example: 单词 independent 的例句||||He is very far from being independent. 他现在还远不能自立。||||China is a fully independent state. 中国是个完全独立的国家

name: painful
interpret: adj.(引起)疼痛的；困难的，令人不快的
example: 单词 painful 的例句||||He did not want to mention the painful past. 他不愿意提起过去的伤心事。||||The memory came back with a painful rush. 回忆起往事心里一阵难受。

name: apart
interpret: adv.除去，撇开；分开；相隔，相距
example: 单词 apart 的例句||||I helped her pull the two fighting boys apart. 我帮她把两个打架的男孩拉开。||||I like to keep my work apart from my family. 我喜欢吧工作和家庭分开。

name: impression
interpret: n.印象，感想；印记，压痕
example: 单词 impression 的例句||||The impression is so deep that it can hardly ever blow over. 印象太深了，忘也忘不了。||||She made a good impression on his mother. 她给他母亲留下了很好的印象。

name: headline
interpret: n.（报刊的）大字标题，新闻摘要；vt.为…做标题，写标题
example: 单词 headline 的例句||||Did you read the headline news today? 你读了今天的头条新闻没？||||Please give this article a headline. 请给这篇文章一个大标题。

name: unite
interpret: vt.(使)联合，(使)团结，(使)统一；(使)接合，(使)混合；vi.团结；联合；混合
example: 单词 unite 的例句||||We must unite the people of the world. 我们必须团结世界各族人民。||||They should be able to unite students. 他们应能团结同学。

name: kingdom
interpret: n.王国，天国，领域，界
example: 单词 kingdom 的例句||||China is called the kingdom of bicycles. 中国被称为自行车王国。||||Your kingdom is small and weak. 你的王国很弱小。

name: workshop
interpret: n.车间，工场，修理厂；研讨会，讲习班
example: 单词 workshop 的例句||||There are many machines in the workshop. 车间里有许多机器。||||Go and see our new workshop. 去看看我们的新车间。

name: motto
interpret: n.座右铭；格言；题词
example: 单词 motto 的例句||||"Think before you speak " is a good motto. “三思而后言”是句良好的座右铭。||||Serving the people is my motto. 为人民服务是我的格言。

name: downtown
interpret: n.市中心区，市中心；adj.市中心的；adv.往闹区
example: 单词 downtown 的例句||||You have to be downtown in a hurry. 你得赶快去市中心。||||How often does the bus to downtown run? 到市中心的公共汽车多久来一班？

name: hire
interpret: vt.雇佣，租用；vi. 受雇；n.租金，租用，雇用
example: 单词 hire 的例句||||The day's hire for the car is ten dollars. 汽车每日的租金是十美元。||||We'd better hire a car for the weekend. 我们最好租一辆汽车在周末用。

name: select
interpret: vt.&vi.选择，选举，选拔，挑选；adj.当选的，挑选的，挑剔的，特别的
example: 单词 select 的例句||||Come and help me select a good place for our camp. 过来帮我选个露营的地方。||||He taught us how to select seeds. 他教我们怎样选种。

name: accent
interpret: n.口音；腔调；重音
example: 单词 accent 的例句||||His accent is quite special. 他的口音非常特别。||||He has a strong American accent. 他有很重的美国口音。

name: ruin
interpret: vt.（使）毁坏；（使）毁灭；n.(复)废墟；遗迹
example: 单词 ruin 的例句||||How can you stand by and watch the country go to ruin? 你怎么可以看着国家将亡而无动于衷呢？||||The old empty house soon went to rack and ruin. 这所旧的空房子很快就毁坏了。

name: tradition
interpret: n.传说，传统，惯例，引渡，交付
example: 单词 tradition 的例句||||This tradition has lasted until our own time. 这一传统一直保持到我们这个时代。||||They still follow the tradition of their fathers. 他们仍然继承着他们祖先的传统。

name: appointment
interpret: n.约会，指定
example: 单词 appointment 的例句||||I have an appointment with him at four o'clock. 我和他四点钟有个约会。||||They made an appointment for the second day of May. 他们在五月二号有个约会。

name: totally
interpret: adv.完全地；整个地
example: 单词 totally 的例句||||I totally agree with you. 我完全同意你的看法。||||You are totally wrong this time. 你这次完全错了。

name: AIDS
interpret: (Acquired Immune Deficiency Syndrome) 艾滋病 （获得性免疫缺陷综合）
example: 单词 AIDS 的例句||||We must prevent AIDS from spreading. 我们必须防止艾滋病的漫延。||||AIDS is a communicable disease. 艾滋病是一种传染性疾病。

name: overweight
interpret: n.超过重量，过重，优势；adj.超过重量的，超重的；vt.使超重，重于
example: 单词 overweight 的例句||||Many women worry that they are overweight. 许多女人担心她们过重。||||Why are so many teenagers overweight? 为什么这么多青少年超重？

name: greeting
interpret: n.问候，致敬，欢迎辞
example: 单词 greeting 的例句||||He gave me a cheerful greeting. 他亲切地问候我。||||Mrs. Green was greeting her guests at the door. 格林太太站在门口招呼她的客人。

name: freely
interpret: adv.自由地，随便地，无拘无束地
example: 单词 freely 的例句||||She was unable to keep back her tears,and wept freely. 她抑制不住泪水，痛痛快快地哭了起来。||||A liquid flows freely and has no fixed shape. 液体能自由流动，无固定形态。

name: protein
interpret: n.蛋白质；adj.蛋白质的
example: 单词 protein 的例句||||Soybeans are very rich in protein. 大豆含有丰富的蛋白质。||||Rice contains protein and fat. 大米含蛋白质和脂肪。

name: grain
interpret: n.谷物，粮食；颗，粒；些微，一点儿；纹理；脾气，特性
example: 单词 grain 的例句||||Grain output reached a new high in the three years. 谷物产量达到三年中最高水平。||||We ship grain to Africa. 我们把谷物运往非洲。

name: forbid
interpret: (forbade, forbidden)vt.禁止，不许
example: 单词 forbid 的例句||||They forbid any ships to enter the water. 他们禁止任何船舶进入这片水域。||||It was useless to forbid children to play in the park. 禁止孩子们在公园里玩是没有用的。

name: yearly
interpret: adj.每年的，一年一度的；adv.一年一次地
example: 单词 yearly 的例句||||The flower show is a yearly event in our town. 我们镇上的花展一年举行一次。||||The yearly rental of her house is 2400 yuan. 她这房子年租金是2400元。

name: request
interpret: n.要求，请求；vt.请求，要求
example: 单词 request 的例句||||He turned a deaf ear to my request for help. 他对于我的求助置若罔闻。||||If you grant my request, you will earn my thanks. 如果你答应我的要求，就会得到我的感谢。

name: royal
interpret: adj.王室的，皇家的；堂皇的，盛大的；极大的，第一流的
example: 单词 royal 的例句||||Most European royal families are connected with each other. 欧洲大部分王室都有姻亲关系。||||His grandfather was a royal duke. 他的祖父是王室公爵。

name: original
interpret: adj.最初的，原始的；有独创性的
example: 单词 original 的例句||||This is a translation. The original is in French. 这是译文。原文是法文。||||The plan of the work is original with the author. 这篇作品的构思是作者个人的独创。

name: response
interpret: n.反应，回答，响应
example: 单词 response 的例句||||There has been very little response to our call for help. 我们求助的号召没有多少响应。||||They gave a cold response to his suggestions. 他们对他的建议反应冷淡。

name: comment
interpret: n./vi.评论；注释；意见
example: 单词 comment 的例句||||I am afraid I can not comment on the issue. 恐怕我不能对此问题加以评论。||||The king refuses to comment on the election results. 国王拒绝评论选举结果。

name: task
interpret: n.任务，工作，作业
example: 单词 task 的例句||||Our task is to supply vegetables all the year round. 我们的任务是全年供应蔬菜。||||I repeat that we cannot undertake the task. 我再说一遍，我们不能承担这项任务。

name: command
interpret: n.命令，指挥，控制；[计算机]DOS命令:引用辅助命令处理器vi.命令，指挥，支配vt. 命令，指挥；控制；远望
example: 单词 command 的例句||||The army is now under the direct command of General Barton. 陆军现在由巴顿将军直接指挥。||||The army is under the king's direct command. 军队由国王直接统帅。

name: graduation
interpret: n.毕业，毕业典礼
example: 单词 graduation 的例句||||Graduation from university is an event in life. 大学毕业是人生中的大事。||||He had just attended his daughter's graduation. 他刚参加了女儿的毕业典礼。

name: genius
interpret: n.天才，天赋；天才人物；精灵，神灵，守护神
example: 单词 genius 的例句||||What genius he has! 他真有才华！||||He is a man of genius. 他是一个有天赋的人。

name: native
interpret: adj.本国的，本地的；n.本地人，本国人
example: 单词 native 的例句||||No government shall take away the rights of the native people. 任何政府也不能剥夺土著人的权利。||||This is my native land and I'll defend it with my life! 这是我的祖国，我将用生命保卫她！

name: compete
interpret: vi.竞争；比赛
example: 单词 compete 的例句||||They knew they could not compete against business from the U. S. 他们知道他们无法与美国在商业上进行竞争。||||I compete with you for that position. 我和你竞争那个职位。

name: mental
interpret: adj.精神的，思想的，内心的；智力的，脑力的；精神病的
example: 单词 mental 的例句||||A mental hospital has just been set up here. 这里刚刚建成一座精神病医院。||||He has some mental problems. 他有心理上的问题。

name: site
interpret: n.位置，场所，地点；vt.定位；（指INTERNET上的某台主机）
example: 单词 site 的例句||||Where have they decided to site the new factory? 他们决定新厂址设在什么地方？||||It is safe to site a company here. 在这里建造工厂安全。

name: guarantee
interpret: n.担保，抵押品，保证书；vt.保证，担保
example: 单词 guarantee 的例句||||Can you guarantee me a job when I get there? 你可以确保我到那儿就可以找到一份工作吗？||||I guarantee that if you take this medicine, you'll soon get well. 我管保你吃了这药就好。

name: theme
interpret: n.主题，论题，话题，题目，作文题
example: 单词 theme 的例句||||This poem marries theme and style well. 这首诗的主题和风格结合得很好。||||What is the theme of the opera?这个歌剧的主题是什么？

name: confuse
interpret: vt.使混淆，使混乱，使迷惑
example: 单词 confuse 的例句||||He didn't want to confuse her. 他并不想使她迷惑。||||Don't let this confuse you. 不要让这迷惑你。

name: happiness
interpret: n.幸福感；快乐；幸运
example: 单词 happiness 的例句||||I wish you the life of happiness and prosperity. 我祝你生活幸福、万事如意。||||We all desire happiness and health. 我们都想得到幸福和健康。

name: link
interpret: n.链环，连结物，火把，链接；vt.连结，联合，挽；vi.连接起来
example: 单词 link 的例句||||The new bridge will link the island to the mainland. 新的桥梁将把该岛与大陆连接在一起。||||Where do the two railroads link up? 两条铁路在何处连接？

name: powder
interpret: n.粉，粉末，火药，尘土；vt.搽粉于，搽粉，撒粉，使成粉末；vi.搽粉，变成粉末
example: 单词 powder 的例句||||How much washing powder does he have? 他有多少洗衣粉？||||She is putting on powder, ready to perform on the stage. 她在搽粉，准备登台演出。

name: preparation
interpret: n.准备，预备；制剂，制备品；筹备
example: 单词 preparation 的例句||||Plans for selling the new product are now in preparation. 销售新产品的计划现在正在准备之中。||||He didn't do enough preparation for his exam, and failed. 他考试前没有充分准备，结果不及格。

name: solar
interpret: adj.太阳的，日光的；利用太阳能的；根据太阳决定或测定的 n.日光浴室
example: 单词 solar 的例句||||The solar system was formed 4. 5 billion years ago. 太阳系是四十五亿年前形成的。||||The time when a solar eclipse will occur can be calculated. 日食发生的时间可以推算出来。

name: spot
interpret: n.班点，污点，地点，场所，现场；vt.沾污，弄脏，侦察；认出，发现；vi. 沾上污渍；满是斑点
example: 单词 spot 的例句||||He's in a spot of trouble. 他遇到一点麻烦。||||He did not mention having been on the spot. 他没说他当时在场。

name: facility
interpret: n.容易，便利，设施，设备；熟练，灵巧
example: 单词 facility 的例句||||The college has excellent sporting facility. 这个学院有非常好的体育设施。||||He has great facility in learning languages. 他很有学习语言的才能。

name: gain
interpret: vt.获得；增加；表等走快；vi. 增加；获利 n.增进，增加；收益
example: 单词 gain 的例句||||He continued to gain on the rest of the runners. 他继续跑在其他运动员前面。||||It takes years to gain a mastery of Japanese. 掌握日语要花几年时间。

name: valley
interpret: adj.流域，山谷，峡谷；n.山谷，溪谷
example: 单词 valley 的例句||||I watched the climbers come down into the valley. 我注视着爬山者下到山谷里去了。||||The house lies in a little valley behind the trees. 那所房子坐落在树林后的一个山谷里。

name: adopt
interpret: vt.采纳，采用；正式通过；领养；vi.采取；过继
example: 单词 adopt 的例句||||We will adopt their suggestions. 我们将采纳他们的意见。||||Many childless couples adopt children. 许多无子女的夫妇收养孩子。

name: brain
interpret: n.头脑，电脑，智慧
example: 单词 brain 的例句||||The brain needs a continuous supply of blood. 大脑需要不断供给血液。||||Her brain has no room for math. 她没有数学头脑。

name: helpless
interpret: adj.无助的，无依无靠的；不能自力的
example: 单词 helpless 的例句||||The other team was helpless and we had a real field day. 对方队很弱，我们轻易取胜。||||They felt helpless to do anything about it. 他们对这事感到无能为力。

name: chain
interpret: n.链，连锁，束缚；vt.用铁练锁住，束缚，囚禁
example: 单词 chain 的例句||||He now owns a chain of 970 food stores. 他现在拥有970家连锁食品店。||||He joined the ends of the chain. 他把链子的两端接起来了。

name: chapter
interpret: n.章，篇，重要章节
example: 单词 chapter 的例句||||I will skip the next chapter. 我将略过下一章。||||Go and open a wonderful new chapter. 去开启美好的新篇章。

name: approach
interpret: n.接近，逼近，走进，方法，步骤，途径，通路；vt.接近，动手处理；vi.靠近
example: 单词 approach 的例句||||They are very scientific in their approach. 他们的方法很科学。||||Our approach drove away the wild animals. 我们一走近野兽全都跑开了。

name: childhood
interpret: n.孩童时；童年时代
example: 单词 childhood 的例句||||She looks as if she got back to her childhood again. 她似乎又回到了她的童年时代。||||The photo calls up the story of my childhood. 这张照片使我想起童年时代。

name: dawn
interpret: n.黎明，拂晓；开始，发端；vi. 破晓；开始，初现；渐被理解或感知
example: 单词 dawn 的例句||||The enemy opened fire on our lines at early dawn. 拂晓时敌人向我阵线开了火。||||At dawn they started off to work in the fields. 天一亮他们就下地干活去了。

name: defeat
interpret: vt.击败，战胜；n.失败；败北
example: 单词 defeat 的例句||||They soon went down in defeat. 他们很快就失败了。||||They tasted defeat for the first time. 他们第一次体验到失败的滋味。

name: seller
interpret: n.售货者，畅销品
example: 单词 seller 的例句||||I hope for this book to become a best seller. 我希望这本书会成为一本畅销书。||||She drove a hard bargain with the seller. 她狠杀卖主的价。

name: consist
interpret: vi.由…组成，由…构成；存在于，在于
example: 单词 consist 的例句||||Theory should consist with practice. 理论应与实践相一致。||||A week consists of seven days. 一星期由七天组成。

name: particular
interpret: adj.个别的，各个的；独有的，特殊的，特别的
example: 单词 particular 的例句||||We each have our own particular tastes, haven't we?我们各有所好，不是吗？||||She likes fruit and apples in particular. 她喜欢水果尤其是苹果。

name: villager
interpret: n.村民，乡下人
example: 单词 villager 的例句||||We helped the villager to sink a well. 我们帮助村民挖了一口井。||||The villager led the way into the forest. 村民在森林里开路。

name: pray
interpret: vt.祈祷，祈求；请求，恳求；vi.祈祷；请；恳求
example: 单词 pray 的例句||||We pray to God to deliver us from evil. 我们祈求上帝把我们从罪恶中拯救出来。||||We pray you to set the child free. 我们恳求你放了这个孩子。

name: wealth
interpret: n.财富，资源，财产，丰富，富裕，大量
example: 单词 wealth 的例句||||Loss of health is more serious than loss of wealth. 健康的丧失比财富的损失更为重要。||||It goes without saying that health is above wealth. 健康胜于财富这是不言而喻的。

name: gesture
interpret: n.手势，姿态；vi.作手势，作姿态；vt.用动作表示
example: 单词 gesture 的例句||||The man spoke by gesture. 这男子用手势表达。||||I admire his gentle gesture very much. 我羡慕他的优雅的姿势。

name: minority
interpret: n.少数，少数民族；adj.少数的，属于少数派的
example: 单词 minority 的例句||||Such persons are certainly in the minority. 这种人当然占少数。||||Boys are in the minority at the dancing class. 舞蹈班里男生占少数。

name: idiom
interpret: n.成语，惯用语法，方言
example: 单词 idiom 的例句||||This story gave rise to the idiom "Calling A Stag A Horse". 成语“指鹿为马”就是根据这个故事得来的。||||I like the idiom of modern popular music. 我喜欢现代流行音乐的风格。

name: radiation
interpret: n.放射；发射；辐射；放射物
example: 单词 radiation 的例句||||The sun, a lamp, or an electric heater all warm us by radiation. 太阳、灯或电热器都可以通过辐射来温暖我们。||||Sunlight consists of different wavelengths of radiation. 阳光由几种不同波长的射线组成。

name: uncertain
interpret: adj.(of)不定的，不确知的；不可靠的，易变的
example: 单词 uncertain 的例句||||The date of the ship's arrival is uncertain. 船到的日期不确定。||||It's uncertain whether the game will be held. 比赛是否举行还不确定。

name: agreement
interpret: n.协定；协议；契约；达成协议；同意，一致
example: 单词 agreement 的例句||||Finally we reached an agreement. 我们最终达成了协议。||||The two countries signed a cultural agreement. 两国签订了文化协定。

name: cancel
interpret: n.取消，撤消；vt.取消，删去，约分；vi.抵消
example: 单词 cancel 的例句||||He agree to cancel the meeting. 他同意取消这个会议。||||Can you cancel your appointment? 你可以把约会取消吗？

name: drug
interpret: n.药，毒品；vt.下药，使...服麻醉药；vi.吸毒
example: 单词 drug 的例句||||Heroin is a dangerous drug. 海洛因是一种危险的毒品。||||She works for a drug company. 她在一家药品公司工作。

name: cookbook
interpret: n.食谱；烹调书
example: 单词 cookbook 的例句||||The woman bought a cookbook to learn how to cook. 那个妇女买了一本烹调书来学烹调。||||Can you find the cookbook to make French bread? 你能找到做法国烤面包的食谱吗？

name: hearing
interpret: n.听，听见，听到，听说，听取；听力，听证会，诉讼，审讯v. 听见（hear的ing形式）
example: 单词 hearing 的例句||||I look forward to hearing from you in the near future. 我盼望着不久收到你的信。||||The old man's hearing is poor. 那位老人听力差。

name: greatly
interpret: adv.大大地，非常地；伟大地，崇高地
example: 单词 greatly 的例句||||Many old clothes were sold off at greatly reduced prices. 许多旧衣服大幅度地降价出售。||||I was greatly touched by what you told me. 你对我讲的话使我大受感动。

name: limit
interpret: vt.限制；限定；n.界限；限度
example: 单词 limit 的例句||||We must limit our spending. 我们必须限制我们的开支。||||The speed limit is 120 kilometers per hour. 速度限定是120公里每小时。

name: oxygen
interpret: n.氧；氧气
example: 单词 oxygen 的例句||||Oxygen is present in the air. 氧存在于空气中。||||We need oxygen to support life. 我们需要氧气维持生命。

name: ray
interpret: n.光线，放射线；闪烁，光辉；微量；vi.射出光线，浮现，放射光线；vt.放射，显出
example: 单词 ray 的例句||||You should probably have an X-ray taken. 你大概应该去照X光。||||The red ray represents life force and change. 红色光象征着生命力量和变化。

name: rewrite
interpret: n.重写，改写；vt.改写，重写
example: 单词 rewrite 的例句||||I think it better to rewrite the report. 我认为最好重写这个报告。||||I'll rewrite my life. 我要重写我的人生。

name: various
interpret: adj.各种各样的，不同的；多方面的，多种的
example: 单词 various 的例句||||The audience come from various parts of the country. 观众来自这个国家的各个地方。||||There are various ways to express your gratitude. 表达谢意的方式多种多样。

name: Atlantic
interpret: adj.大西洋的；n.大西洋
example: 单词 Atlantic 的例句||||Who was the first person to fly the Atlantic? 谁是飞越大西洋的第一人？||||The ship sailed across the Atlantic. 这艘船曾横渡大西洋。

name: carve
interpret: vt.刻；雕刻
example: 单词 carve 的例句||||We will look for a pumpkin, to carve into a jack-o-lantern. 我们将要找一颗南瓜来雕刻成南瓜灯。||||They carve a face on the pumpkin. 他们在南瓜上刻一张脸谱。

name: educator
interpret: n.教育家，教育工作者，教育行政官员
example: 单词 educator 的例句||||The educator have visited our school. 那位教育家参观了我们学校。||||Who was the greatest educator in history? 谁是历史上最伟大的教育家？

name: roommate
interpret: n.室友
example: 单词 roommate 的例句||||My roommate is from New York. 我的室友来自纽约。||||What is your roommate like? 你的室友长得像什么样子呢？

name: possibility
interpret: n.机会，契机；可能，可能性
example: 单词 possibility 的例句||||We have little possibility to win. 我们取胜的可能性很小。||||That possibility can't be ruled out. 不能排除有这种可能性。

name: principle
interpret: n.法则，原则，原理
example: 单词 principle 的例句||||You should hold your principle. 你应该坚守自己原则。||||The same principle applies to your schoolwork. 同样的道理适用于你的学业。

name: surround
interpret: vt.包围，环绕，围绕；n.围绕物
example: 单词 surround 的例句||||The police fanned out to surround the house. 警察散开包围了这座房子。||||Surround yourself with nature and your thoughts. 让你的思想和大自然包围你。

name: stomachache
interpret: n.胃痛；腹痛；肚子痛
example: 单词 stomachache 的例句||||I think she has a stomachache. 我想她肚子痛。|||| My husband has a stomachache. 我丈夫胃痛。

name: unique
interpret: adj.独一无二的，独特的；罕见的
example: 单词 unique 的例句||||The path must be unique. 路径必须是唯一的。||||This stamp is unique, there are no others like it. 这张邮票是独一无二的，再也没有象这样的了。

name: advanced
interpret: adj.高等的，在前的，老的；
example: 单词 advanced 的例句||||We should learn from advanced workers. 我们要向先进工作者学习。||||She wants to buy some advanced readers. 她想买一些高级读本。

name: worldwide
interpret: adj.全世界的，全世界范围的；adv.在全世界，遍及全世界
example: 单词 worldwide 的例句||||His fame is worldwide. 他的名声享誉全世界。||||They produce news which is sent by satellite worldwide. 他们播送的新闻通过卫星发送到世界各地。

name: anxious
interpret: adj.忧虑的，焦急的；渴望的，急要的
example: 单词 anxious 的例句||||She is anxious about her job. 她为工作而焦急。||||I'm sure Jordan will be anxious to see you. 我确定乔丹急着要见您。

name: dreamer
interpret: n.做梦的人；空想家，梦想家
example: 单词 dreamer 的例句||||The young dreamer refused to accept the actuality. 年轻的梦想家不愿接受这个事实。||||You are nothing more than a dreamer. 你不过是个梦想家而已。

name: everyday
interpret: adj.每天的，日常的，平常的
example: 单词 everyday 的例句||||Sweeping the floor is his everyday work. 扫地是他的日常工作。||||He practices speaking English everyday. 他每天练习说英语。

name: motherland
interpret: n.祖国
example: 单词 motherland 的例句||||We have the duty to defend our motherland. 我们有责任保卫祖国。||||We love our great motherland. 我们热爱我们伟大的祖国。

name: anyhow
interpret: adv.不管怎样，无论如何；不论用何种方法
example: 单词 anyhow 的例句||||Anyhow, I'd like to change our room. 不管怎样，我要换房间。||||Anyhow I listened to her request. 无论如何，我还是听从了她的要求。

name: BC
interpret: (=before Christ)公元前
example: 单词 BC 的例句||||By 1800 BC, the climate is known to have changed. 在公元前1800年，据说气候已经改变。||||In 221 BC, there was a poor scholar in Shanxi Province. 公元前221年，山西有一位穷书生。

name: defend
interpret: vt.防守，保卫；为…辩护，为…答辩
example: 单词 defend 的例句||||We have the duty to defend our motherland. 我们有责任保卫祖国。||||They have no weapons to defend themselves. 他们没有武器来保护自己。

name: ought
interpret: v.aux.应该，大概；n.责任
example: 单词 ought 的例句||||Ought I to hand in the homework today? 我应当在今天交上作业吗？||||They ought to be here by now. 他们这个时候该到了。

name: honour
interpret: n.(BrE)荣誉，头衔；信用，尊敬，名誉；阁下；勋章；vt.尊敬，授予荣誉；承兑，实践
example: 单词 honour 的例句||||Children should be taught to show honour to their elders. 应该教育孩子尊敬长者。||||She stands first on the honour list. 她在光荣榜上名列第一。

name: behaviour
interpret: n.(=behavior)行为；举止；习性
example: 单词 behaviour 的例句||||His behaviour did more harm than good to himself. 他的行为对他自己害多利少。||||The teacher speaks very highly of the boy's behaviour. 老师高度称赞这个男孩的表现。

name: latter
interpret: adj.较后的；后半的；（两者中）后者的
example: 单词 latter 的例句||||He'll go to school in the latter part of the year. 后半年他将上学了。||||This latter point is of great importance. 这后一个论点是非常重要的。

name: civilization
interpret: n.文明，文化，文明社会，文明，一个著名游戏的名称
example: 单词 civilization 的例句||||It is said that civilization is always on the move. 有人说文明总是在进步。||||The Chinese civilization is one of the oldest in the world. 中国文化是世界上最古老的文化之一。

name: injury
interpret: n.受伤处，损害，伤害
example: 单词 injury 的例句||||You have a bad injury. 你受了很重的伤。||||He made his mind that he wouldn't do her an injury. 他决心不让她受到一点伤害。

name: sickness
interpret: n.疾病，不健康，呕吐
example: 单词 sickness 的例句||||Sickness often results from eating too much. 呕吐常因饮食过量所致。||||Don't hide your sickness for fear of treatment. 绝不要讳疾忌医。

name: thinking
interpret: n.思考，思想；adj.思考的，有理性的；vbl.想，思考
example: 单词 thinking 的例句||||All thinking men will protest against it. 凡是有思想的人都会抗议这件事。||||Thinking is mainly performed with words and other symbols. 思想主要是用言语和其他符号来表达的。

name: traveler
interpret: n.旅行者
example: 单词 traveler 的例句||||He is a great traveler and has moved about all over the world. 他是个伟大的旅行家，足迹踏遍了全世界。||||I'm a time traveler. 我是个时间旅行者。

name: ban
interpret: n.禁令；vt.禁止，取缔
example: 单词 ban 的例句||||He is banned from attend the meeting. 他被禁止参加会议。||||There is a ban on smoking in petrol stations. 加油站禁止吸烟。

name: beast
interpret: n.野兽，牲畜，兽性；凶残的人，举止粗鲁的人
example: 单词 beast 的例句||||He is a beast. 他是个恶棍。||||When he's drunk, he's a beast. 他喝醉时很野蛮。

name: failure
interpret: n.失败，失败者；缺乏，失灵；故障，破产，疏忽；（美）不及格
example: 单词 failure 的例句||||He thought of a reason to explain away his failure. 他想出一个理由为他的失败辩解。||||The cake we made was somewhat of a failure. 我们做的蛋糕不大成功。

name: generation
interpret: n.产生，发生，一代，一代人
example: 单词 generation 的例句||||This book was handed down from generation to generation. 这本书世代相传。||||People of my generation all think the same way about this. 关于这件事，我们这代人都有同感。

name: effective
interpret: adj.有效的，有力的，实际的；n.有生力量
example: 单词 effective 的例句||||This medicine is effective if used within three years. 这种药3年以内有效。||||These are effective measures. 这些都是有效的措施。

name: oral
interpret: n.口试；adj.口头的，口述的，口部的
example: 单词 oral 的例句||||It is oral medicine. 那是口服药。||||He passed his French oral examination. 他通过了法语口试。

name: understanding
interpret: adj.能谅解的；通情达理的；n.理解
example: 单词 understanding 的例句||||We must have a clear understanding of the problem. 我们对这一问题必须有一个清醒的认识。||||Because she is understanding, people around her confide in her. 因为她通情达理，周围的人都相信她。

name: unknown
interpret: adj.未知的，陌生的；n.未知的东西，未知数
example: 单词 unknown 的例句||||People usually infer an unknown fact from a known fact. 人们通常从已知的事实中推断未知的事实。||||The scientist was faced with many unknown factors. 那个科学家面临许多未知数。

name: technique
interpret: n.技术，技巧，方法，表演法，手法
example: 单词 technique 的例句||||His technique is almost perfect. 他的技巧近乎完美。||||It is said that it is hard to master the technique. 有人说技术难掌握。

name: agriculture
interpret: n.农学；农业
example: 单词 agriculture 的例句||||Problems also exist in agriculture. 农业也存在着一些问题。||||Computers have also begun serving agriculture. 计算机也开始为农业服务了。

name: explode
interpret: vt.使爆炸，使爆发；破除，驳倒；vi.爆炸，爆发，突发
example: 单词 explode 的例句||||I am so mad that I could explode. 我气得几乎要爆炸了。||||That old boy is going to explode soon. 老家伙马上就要气炸了。

name: observe
interpret: vt.观察，遵守，注意到，纪念；vi.注意，评论
example: 单词 observe 的例句||||Didn't you observe the difference? 难道你没有看出差别？||||Everyone should observe the law. 谁都应该守法。

name: shade
interpret: n.荫，阴暗，荫凉处，遮光物，灯罩，帘，浓淡，些微；vi. 渐变；vt.使阴暗，使渐变
example: 单词 shade 的例句||||Don't cut down the tree that gives you shade. 不要忘恩负义。||||These trees afford a pleasant shade. 这些树下有一片宜人的树阴。

name: inform
interpret: vt.告诉，通知；使充满；vi. 告发，告密
example: 单词 inform 的例句||||Can you inform me when to begin our final examination? 你能告诉我们什么时候期终考试吗？||||It would be better to inform his parents. 最好告诉他家长。

name: lecture
interpret: n.讲座，讲课；演讲
example: 单词 lecture 的例句||||I take it as a pleasure to attend your lecture. 我很愿意听你讲课。||||The professor began his lecture by telling a joke. 教授在讲课前先讲一个笑话。

name: management
interpret: n.管理，处理，经营；资方，管理部门
example: 单词 management 的例句||||He has stepped up into the management of the firm. 他已升入公司的管理部门。||||In running a company, strict financial management means everything. 经营一家公司，严格的财务管理是至关重要的。

name: maximum
interpret: n.极点，最大量，极大；adj.最高的，最大极限的；
example: 单词 maximum 的例句||||This hall holds a maximum of seventy people. 这厅最多能容纳七十人。||||What's your maximum distance ever walked? 你最多走过多远?

name: Spanish
interpret: adj.西班牙人的，西班牙的，西班牙语的；n.西班牙语
example: 单词 Spanish 的例句||||She grew up in Spain, so her first language is Spanish. 她在西班牙长大，第一语言是西班牙语。||||I can read Spanish but can't translate into it. 我能阅读西班牙语，但不能翻译成西班牙语。

name: stranger
interpret: n.陌生人；外地人，异乡人
example: 单词 stranger 的例句||||A stranger walked up to me and asked me the time. 一个陌生人走到我跟前，问我时间。||||It's hard for a stranger to make friends in this town. 外地人在这个城里很难交朋友。

name: pile
interpret: n.堆，大堆，大量，电池，桥桩，软毛，痔疮；vi.堆起，堆积，积累，挤；vt.堆于，累积
example: 单词 pile 的例句||||Collect the books and put them in a pile on my desk. 把书收起来堆放在我的桌子上。||||Pile the leaves in the corner of the yard. 把树叶堆到院子里。

name: chairman
interpret: n.主席，会长，议长；董事长
example: 单词 chairman 的例句||||The chairman asked us to vote on the plan. 主席要我们对计划进行表决。||||He acted as chairman of the meeting. 他担任大会主席。

name: delighted
interpret: adj.非常高兴的；愉快的；欣慰
example: 单词 delighted 的例句||||Everybody was delighted to see her. 大家见到她都很高兴。||||I was delighted to hear the news of your success. 听到你成功了的消息时我非常高兴。

name: pattern
interpret: n.图案，模范，榜样；型，式样；样品；图样；vt.摹制，仿造；以图案装饰
example: 单词 pattern 的例句||||This box is made after a new pattern. 这箱子是仿照新样式制作的。||||Why should all writers follow a pattern? 为什么作家都遵循一个模式写作呢？

name: highly
interpret: adv.高度地，极，非常；非常赞许地
example: 单词 highly 的例句||||It is highly important to provide for the future. 预先做好准备非常重要。||||The teacher speaks very highly of the boy's behaviour. 老师高度称赞这个男孩的表现。

name: eager
interpret: adj.热切的，渴望的，热心的，热情洋溢的
example: 单词 eager 的例句||||He was eager to match his knowledge against mine. 他很想和我比比，看谁的知识更丰富。||||Now she was back, eager to see her friends. 现在她回来了，急切地想见朋友们。

name: respect
interpret: vt.尊敬，尊重；考虑，重视；n.（不可数）尊敬，尊重；敬意，问候；考虑，重视
example: 单词 respect 的例句||||The new teacher soon won the respect of his students. 这位新来的老师很快就赢得了学生们的尊重。||||He did it quite without respect to the result. 他做这事一点也不考虑后果。

name: northeast
interpret: n.东北；adj.东北的，向东北的，来自东北的；adv.向东北，来自东北
example: 单词 northeast 的例句||||I was born in the northeast. 我出生于东北部。||||A northeast wind is blowing strongly. 东北风刮得呼呼响。

name: league
interpret: n.同盟，联盟，社团，联合会
example: 单词 league 的例句||||I'll never forget the day when I joined the Youth League. 我永远不会忘记我入团的那一天。||||Half of the students in our class are League members. 我们班有一半学生是团员。

name: dictation
interpret: n.听写，口述，命令
example: 单词 dictation 的例句||||We have a dictation every English class. 每次上英语课我们都进行听写测验。||||We will have a dictation now. 我们现在要进行听写训练了。

name: smog
interpret: n.烟雾 (由smoke+fog合成的词)
example: 单词 smog 的例句||||Smog blankets the city. 烟雾笼罩着这个城市。||||The sky over the city was overspread with a heavy smog. 城市上空罩上了一层烟雾。

name: Sweden
interpret: n.瑞典(欧洲)
example: 单词 Sweden 的例句||||He was born in Sweden, but he doesn't have Swedish citizenship. 他在瑞典出生，但没有瑞典公民身分。||||We crossed over the river into Sweden. 我们渡河到了瑞典。

name: rail
interpret: n.栏杆，铁轨，扶手；铁路；vt.以横木围栏，铺铁轨；vi. 抱怨；责骂
example: 单词 rail 的例句||||They will soon ship the goods by rail. 他们很快就把货物用火车运去。||||She gripped the hand rail in the lift. 她紧紧抓着电梯里的扶手。

name: document
interpret: n.文件，公文；vt.记载，用文件等证明；[计算机]文档
example: 单词 document 的例句||||He asked me to make ten copies of the document. 他叫我把这份文件复印十份。||||Please try and find time to read the document before the meeting. 开会前请抽时间把文件看一下。

name: dam
interpret: n.水坝，水闸；堰堤；vt.在…上筑坝，堵住
example: 单词 dam 的例句||||The villagers went at building a dam with a will. 村民们劲头十足地着手修一座水坝。||||The Aswan Dam helps to control the River Nile in Egypt. 阿斯旺水坝有助于控制埃及的尼罗河。

name: weapon
interpret: n.武器，兵器；vt.武装
example: 单词 weapon 的例句||||The team's secret weapon was their new young defender. 这个队的秘密武器就是刚来的年轻防守队员。||||This weapon can kill at a range of 200 yards. 这种兵器在200码内有杀伤力。

name: identify
interpret: vt.识别，认明，鉴定，使等同于；vi.一致，变成一致
example: 单词 identify 的例句||||Would you be able to identify the man who robbed you? 你能够认出那个抢你东西的人吗？||||We cannot identify happiness with wealth. 我们不能把幸福与财富混为一谈。

name: poetry
interpret: n.诗歌，诗集；诗意
example: 单词 poetry 的例句||||We are always finding new beauties in Shakespeare's poetry. 我们不断地在莎士比亚的诗歌中发现美妙之处。||||Mr. Smith was a lover of poetry. 史密斯先生是一名诗歌爱好者。

name: merchant
interpret: n.商人，店主；adj.商业的，商人的
example: 单词 merchant 的例句||||My father is a merchant. 我的父亲是一位商人。||||He is a wine merchant. 他是一名酒商。

name: suffering
interpret: n.(肉体或内心的)痛苦；(常pl.)苦恼，折磨
example: 单词 suffering 的例句||||He's experienced a lot of suffering. 他承受了许多煎熬。||||I hoped that this might end my suffering. 我希望这会结束我的苦痛。

name: academic
interpret: adj.专科院校的，研究院的，学会的；学术的，理论的
example: 单词 academic 的例句||||What is your academic background? 你的学术背景是什么？||||He is inexperienced in the academic world. 他对学术界不熟。

name: access
interpret: n.接近；达到；进入；入口，通路；微软（Microsoft）数据库处理软件
example: 单词 access 的例句||||There is no access to the street through that door. 那个门不通向大街。||||The only access to the town is across the bridge. 到镇上唯一的通路是经过一座桥。

name: accompany
interpret: vt.伴随，陪伴，陪同，伴奏，为…伴奏
example: 单词 accompany 的例句||||May we accompany you on your walk? 我们陪你一起散步好吗？||||I'll accompany you home. 我陪你回家。

name: adapt
interpret: vt.使适应；改编
example: 单词 adapt 的例句||||She knew how to adapt herself. 她懂得如何适应环境。||||She lacked the ability to adapt easily. 她缺少适应能力。

name: aside
interpret: adv.在旁边，撇开不谈；n.独白，旁白
example: 单词 aside 的例句||||I stepped aside so that she might come in. 我往旁边走一步，以便她能进来。||||Some young people push their parents aside after their marriage. 有些年轻人结婚之后就不管父母了。

name: paperwork
interpret: n.日常文书工作
example: 单词 paperwork 的例句||||She is the best girl for the paperwork. 她是最适合做这项文书工作的女孩。||||Burn them. We will spare ourselves the paperwork. 烧了它，可以节省我们一些文书工作。

name: satisfaction
interpret: n.满意；满足；乐事，使人满意的原因
example: 单词 satisfaction 的例句||||I noticed with great satisfaction that you made great progress. 我很满意地看到你取得了很大的进步。||||Looking at a beautiful painting always gives one satisfaction. 观看一幅美丽的图画常使人心满意足。

name: bedding
interpret: n.被褥，寝具，基础，床上用品
example: 单词 bedding 的例句||||I put some fresh bedding on the bed. 我在床上铺上一些干净的被褥。||||He threw his bedding over and it landed soundlessly on the snow. 把铺盖扔过去，落在雪上，没有什么声响。

name: companion
interpret: n.朋友，陪伴，指南手册，升降口；vt.陪伴
example: 单词 companion 的例句||||The little girl will be a companion for my small daughter. 那小女孩将作我小女儿的同伴。||||She is a dependable companion. 她是一位可靠的伴侣。

name: economic
interpret: adj.经济上的，实用的，节省的
example: 单词 economic 的例句||||Europe is divided into economic zones. 欧洲分成多个经济区。||||Our economic construction is vivid with life. 我们的经济建设生气勃勃。

name: conduct
interpret: n.行为，品行，举动；vt.引导，带领；处理，管理；指挥；传导；vi. 指挥
example: 单词 conduct 的例句||||I will not suffer such conduct. 我不能容忍这种行为。||||Your conduct has been in question for several months. 你的举止几个月来一直很成问题。

name: empire
interpret: n.帝国，帝权
example: 单词 empire 的例句||||The Thirty Year's War nearly caused the breakup of the empire. 30年的战争几乎导致帝国的解体。||||The British Empire flourished in the 19th century. 英帝国在19世纪曾昌盛一时。

name: encouragement
interpret: n.鼓励，奖励；鼓励物，奖励物
example: 单词 encouragement 的例句||||Thank you for your help and encouragement! 谢谢你的帮助和鼓励！||||He gave us great encouragement to carry out the plan. 他激励我们去实行该计划。

name: govern
interpret: vt.统治，管理；支配，决定；控制，抑制
example: 单词 govern 的例句||||They are fighting for the right to govern their own lives. 他们为拥有支配自己生活的权利而斗争。||||Build the party for the public, a nd govern for the people. 立党为公、执政为民。

name: donkey
interpret: n.驴子；蠢人；顽固的人
example: 单词 donkey 的例句||||This donkey can carry two sacks of grain. 这头驴能驮两袋粮食。||||"I'll buy your donkey,"said the two. “我想要买你的驴子”两人异口同声说。

name: occupy
interpret: vt.占，占用；占领，占据；使忙碌，使从事
example: 单词 occupy 的例句||||His books occupy a lot of space. 他的书占了很多地方。||||Will it occupy much of your time? 会不会占用你很多时间？

name: berry
interpret: n.浆果(如草莓等)
example: 单词 berry 的例句||||This kind of jam is made of berry. 这种果酱是由浆果做的。||||Every berry and cherry carried in the ferry is very merry. 渡船里载运的每一颗草莓和樱桃都很快乐。

name: overboard
interpret: adv.向船外，从船上落入水中
example: 单词 overboard 的例句||||A sailor fell overboard and was rescued. 一个船员从船上落入水中，被救了上来了。||||Don't throw that box overboard. 别把那只箱子抛入水中。

name: reflect
interpret: vt.反射，反映；招致，归咎；思考，想到；vi.反射，映出；思考，考虑；指责，怀疑
example: 单词 reflect 的例句||||I often reflect on my schooldays. 我经常回忆起我上学的日子。||||Does this letter reflect how you really think? 这封信反映你的真实想法吗？

name: remote
interpret: adj.遥远的，僻远的；细微的，稀少的，漠然的
example: 单词 remote 的例句||||I'm afraid your chances of success are rather remote. 我担心你成功的机会极小。||||The thing happened in the remote past. 这件事发生在遥远的过去。

name: profit
interpret: n.利润，赢利，利益；vi.有益，获利，赚钱；vt.有益于
example: 单词 profit 的例句||||Never do anything to your profit at another's expense. 切不可作任何损人利己的事。||||The company realized a large profit on the deal. 在这笔交易中公司赚了一大笔利润。

name: pure
interpret: adj.纯的，纯粹的，纯净的，无垢的，纯洁的，完美的，抽象的
example: 单词 pure 的例句||||The evening dress is made out of pure silk. 这件睡衣是用真丝做的。||||Gold must be pure and man must be perfect. 金要足赤，人要完人。

name: shore
interpret: n.海岸，海滨，斜撑柱；vt.支撑，支持
example: 单词 shore 的例句||||It was a mile by water, four miles round the shore. 由水路去只有一英里，沿岸绕行要四英里。||||The ship's cinema was empty because everyone was on shore. 船上电影院空无一人，因为大家都上岸去了。

name: absolutely
interpret: adv.绝对地；完全地
example: 单词 absolutely 的例句||||The plane absolutely refused to start. 这架飞机完全发动不起来。||||All the car parks are absolutely full. 所有的停车场都停满了车。

name: actual
interpret: adj.真实的；实在的；实际的
example: 单词 actual 的例句||||We learned by actual experience that practice makes perfect. 我们从实际经验中认识到熟能生巧。||||It calls for actual deeds and not flowery language. 需要的是实际行动，而不是漂亮的辞藻。

name: faith
interpret: n.信任，信念，宗教信仰，忠实，保证，诺言，约定
example: 单词 faith 的例句||||Once again he has broken his faith with them. 他又一次对他们不守信义。||||He looked so honest that I accepted his story on faith. 他看上去很诚实，我就不加怀疑地相信了他的话。

name: judgement
interpret: n.审判，判决；判断力，识别力；意见，判断
example: 单词 judgement 的例句||||Has judgement been pronounced yet? 判决宣布了吗？||||You must trust in your own judgement. 你必须相信自己的判断。

name: bathe
interpret: vt.洗澡，沐浴；弄湿，浸湿
example: 单词 bathe 的例句||||The doctor advised him to bathe in the sun's rays. 医生劝他多晒太阳。||||Don't bathe too soon after eating. 刚吃完饭不要马上去洗澡。

name: data
interpret: n.数据，论据，资料
example: 单词 data 的例句||||If you lose these data, I'll never forgive you. 你要是把这些资料弄丢了，我可不依你。||||The computer is useful in processing data. 电子计算机在处理资料方面很有用。

name: breathless
interpret: adj.喘不过气来的，屏气的，气喘吁吁的，无风的，死的
example: 单词 breathless 的例句||||John was breathless after running for half a mile. 约翰跑了半英里后就气喘吁吁。||||The climb left him breathless. 向上爬使他气喘吁吁。

name: cigar
interpret: n.雪茄烟，叶卷烟
example: 单词 cigar 的例句||||I like to smoke a big cigar every now and then. 我喜欢不时地抽一支大雪茄。||||Have you ever smoked a cigar? 你抽过雪茄烟吗？

name: endless
interpret: adj.不停的，无穷尽的，无尽的
example: 单词 endless 的例句||||He has an endless supply of jokes. 他有说不完的笑话。||||They turned into an endless street. 他们转入一条看不到尽头的街道。

name: faithfully
interpret: adv.忠诚地，如实地，切实遵守地
example: 单词 faithfully 的例句||||He has served the farm faithfully for 20 years. 他为这个农场忠心耿耿地操劳了20年。||||They attended faithfully to their duties. 他们忠于职守。

name: pan
interpret: n.平底锅；vt.淘金；在浅锅中烹调（食物）严厉批评；vi.淘金；在淘洗中收获金子
example: 单词 pan 的例句||||The water had all boiled away and the pan was burned. 水煮干了，锅也烧坏了。||||The eggs were frying in the pan. 鸡蛋正在锅里煎。

name: lung
interpret: n.肺，肺脏，空地
example: 单词 lung 的例句||||Smoking has a great deal to do with lung cancer. 吸烟和肺癌有很大关系。||||Is there a connection between smoking and lung cancer? 吸烟跟肺癌是否有关？

name: cyclist
interpret: n.骑自行车（脚踏车）的人
example: 单词 cyclist 的例句||||The cyclist rang his bell loudly. 骑自行车的人使劲地按着车铃。||||There are many cyclist hurrying on the way in the morning. 早上有很多赶路骑自行车的人。

name: kindness
interpret: n.亲切，仁慈，好意；仁慈(好心)的行为
example: 单词 kindness 的例句||||Will you have the kindness to hand me that book? 请把那本书递给我好吗？||||Many thanks for your kindness in seeing me off. 多谢您好意相送。

name: opening
interpret: n.开始，口，穴，揭幕；adj.开始的
example: 单词 opening 的例句||||Instead of opening the gate, we climbed over it. 我们没有开门，而是从门顶上爬过去的。||||There was an opening in the wall. 墙上有个洞。

name: expense
interpret: n.（不可数）花费，消费，消耗；（可数）开支，经费；费钱之物
example: 单词 expense 的例句||||Never mind the expense! 不用担心费用！||||She cannot afford the expense. 她花不起这笔钱。

name: altogether
interpret: adv.完全，全部地；总共；总起来说，总而言之
example: 单词 altogether 的例句||||He has been here four or five times altogether. 他总共来过四五次。||||How many of you boys are there altogether in your family? 你们家里兄弟共几个？

name: reduce
interpret: vt.减小；缩减；简化
example: 单词 reduce 的例句||||The new law will reduce pollution of the rivers. 这条新法律将会减轻河流污染。||||He won't reduce the rent of our house. 他不肯减少我们住房的租金。

name: individual
interpret: adj.个人的，个体的，单独的；独特的；n.个人，个体；人
example: 单词 individual 的例句||||She has her own individual style of doing things. 她有自己独特的行事风格。||||Each individual house has its own yard. 每栋房子都有各自的庭院。

name: absence
interpret: adj.不在，缺席；n.缺乏，缺少，缺席
example: 单词 absence 的例句||||He excused his absence by saying that he was ill. 他说他生病了，为他缺席开脱。||||She called in your absence. 你不在时她来过。

name: carriage
interpret: n.马车，客车，举止，运输
example: 单词 carriage 的例句||||She has a graceful carriage. 她举止优雅。||||In another moment she had rushed into the carriage. 转眼工夫，她就走进马车里去了。

name: rebuild
interpret: vt.（rebuilt,rebuilt）重建；复原；改造
example: 单词 rebuild 的例句||||The company is making every effort to rebuild its business. 这家公司正在尽一切努力来重建自己的企业。||||They went ahead to rebuild their school after the earthquake. 地震以后他们开始重建学校。

name: settler
interpret: n.移民者，居留者，赠予者
example: 单词 settler 的例句||||This restaurant is owned by an Italian settler. 这家餐馆由一位意大利移民所有。||||One of his forefathers was an early settler in America. 他的祖先之一是美洲的早期移民。

name: fetch
interpret: n.取得；vt.取来，带来，航行到达；vi.取回，兜圈子
example: 单词 fetch 的例句||||Fetch me the tape from my drawer, please. 请把我抽屉里的磁带取来。||||Shall I fetch your coat for you? 我去把上衣给你取来好吗？

name: jazz
interpret: n.爵士音乐，爵士舞曲
example: 单词 jazz 的例句||||It was my younger brother who introduced me to jazz. 是我弟弟使我了解了爵士乐。||||I want to buy some jazz dance pants. 我想买爵士舞裤。

name: false
interpret: adj.不真实的，错误的，人造的，假的，虚伪的
example: 单词 false 的例句||||I don't like false people. 我不喜欢虚伪的人。||||You gave a false colour to the words he said. 你歪曲了他讲话的真实意图。

name: application
interpret: n.申请，请求，申请书；应用，实施，实用性
example: 单词 application 的例句||||They rejected his application for membership. 他们拒绝了他的会员资格申请。||||Her application was turned down. 她的申请被驳回了。

name: tense
interpret: adj.紧张的，拉紧的；vt.（使）紧张，（使）拉紧；vi.拉紧，变得紧张；n.[语法]时态
example: 单词 tense 的例句||||Is the rope tense? 绳子拉紧了吗？||||The situation is getting tense. 风声很紧。

name: outstanding
interpret: adj.突出的，显著的，未支付的
example: 单词 outstanding 的例句||||The girl who won the scholarship was quite outstanding. 得奖学金的女孩是相当杰出的。||||She is an outstanding scientist. 她是位杰出的科学家。

name: pianist
interpret: n.钢琴家，钢琴演奏家
example: 单词 pianist 的例句||||She is by way of becoming a fine pianist. 她正在逐步成长为一个优秀钢琴家。||||The pianist gave a fine performance. 钢琴家演奏得很出色。

name: retire
interpret: vi.引退，退役，退休，退隐，退去，撤退，退却，离开；vt.撤退，辞退；n.隐居，撤退号
example: 单词 retire 的例句||||Next year his father will retire and take things easy. 明年他父亲就要退休而过闲适的生活了。||||When I retire, I shall make my home in the country. 退休后我将在乡间安家。

name: cottage
interpret: n.村舍，小屋；别墅
example: 单词 cottage 的例句||||We rented a cottage at the seaside for Christmas. 我们在海边租了一栋别墅度圣诞节。||||I have lived in a farm labourer's cottage. 我曾在农舍居住过。

name: existence
interpret: n.存在，生存，生活，生活方式
example: 单词 existence 的例句||||He does not believe in the existence of ghosts. 他不相信有鬼存在。||||This house has been in existence for many years. 这房子可有年头了。

name: glance
interpret: n.一瞥，闪光，掠过，辉矿类；vi.扫视，闪光，掠过，提到，略说；vt.扫视，反射，使掠过
example: 单词 glance 的例句||||His glance gave me to understand that he agreed with me. 他这一瞥，使我懂得他同意了我的意思。||||She flashed him a despairing glance. 她绝望地瞥了他一眼。

name: load
interpret: n.负荷，重担，装载量；vi.装载，装填，担负；vt.使担负；装填
example: 单词 load 的例句||||Bring the car up to the door, it'll be easier to load. 把汽车开到门旁边，装货就方便了。||||The ship is now lying off, ready to load up. 现在这艘船在附近停泊，等待装货。

name: quit
interpret: n.退出；vi. 离开，辞职，停止；vt.离开，放弃，解除，表现，停止
example: 单词 quit 的例句||||If I don't get a pay rise, I'll quit. 若不给加薪，我就不干了。||||I got my present job when I quit the army. 我退伍后得到了现在这份工作。

name: range
interpret: n.山脉，行列，范围，射程；vt.排列，归类于，使并列，放牧；vi.平行，延伸，漫游
example: 单词 range 的例句||||The two countries are separated by a range of mountains. 这两个国家被一条山脉隔开。||||This weapon can kill at a range of 200 yards. 这种兵器在200码内有杀伤力。

name: potential
interpret: n.潜在性，可能性，潜力，潜能，势，位；adj.有潜力的，可能的，潜在的
example: 单词 potential 的例句||||What is the country's grain production potential? 这个国家的粮食生产潜力有多大？||||The product has even more potential in export markets. 这种产品在出口市场上甚至会有更大的销售潜力。

name: tend
interpret: vt.照管，照料；vi. 服侍，招待；注意，留心；走向，趋向；倾向；有助于
example: 单词 tend 的例句||||We should tend on customers warmly. 我们应该热情招待顾客。||||I tend to prefer to have a holiday at seaside. 我往往更喜欢在海滨度假。

name: transform
interpret: vt.转换，改变，改造，使…变形；vi. 改变，转化，变换
example: 单词 transform 的例句||||A little paint will soon transform this old car. 只要喷上一点油漆就会马上使这部旧车变个模样。||||Water can transform a desert into a garden. 水能把一片不毛之地变成一座花园。

name: translation
interpret: n.翻译，译；译文，译本
example: 单词 translation 的例句||||The translation is well done except for a few small mistakes. 除却几处小错，翻译练习做得就是很好的了。||||It's just a very rough translation. 这只是一篇非常粗糙的译稿。

name: stressful
interpret: adj.紧张的，压力重的
example: 单词 stressful 的例句||||My job isn't stressful, and I enjoy the work. 我的工作没有压力，我很喜欢这份工作。||||It usually just makes situations more stressful. 它通常会使情况更加紧迫。

name: absorb
interpret: vt.吸收，吸引，接受，并入，使专心
example: 单词 absorb 的例句||||Animals absorb foods into their bodies. 动物把食物吸收到身体里。||||Plants absorb energy from the sun. 植物吸收太阳的能量。

name: adjustment
interpret: n.调整，调节，校正
example: 单词 adjustment 的例句||||They should make adjustment to the new environment. 他们应进行调整以适应新环境。||||The arrangement of light industry in the province needs adjustment. 那个省的轻工业布局需要调整。

name: approve
interpret: vt.批准，通过；赞成，称许；vi. 赞成，称许
example: 单词 approve 的例句||||Her father will never approve of her marrying such a lazy fellow. 她父亲永远不会赞成她嫁给这样的懒人。||||I quite approve of the idea of your plan. 我赞同你计划中的想法。

name: aspect
interpret: n.样子，外表，面貌，（问题等的）方面
