example: 单词 aspect 的例句||||The training program covers every aspect of the job. 训练计划的范围包括了这种工作的各个方面。||||His aspect was frightening. 他那副样子很可怕。

name: handle
interpret: n.把手，手柄，拉手；vt.触，摸；操纵；处理
example: 单词 handle 的例句||||He felt about in the dark for the door handle. 他在黑暗中摸索着找门把手。||||Can you show me how I can handle this camera? 你能教我如何使用这个照相机吗？

name: nationwide
interpret: adj./adv.遍及全国的(地)；全国性的(地)
example: 单词 nationwide 的例句||||The price of gasoline continues to drop nationwide. 全国范围内汽油价格持续下跌。||||A nationwide good harvest soon brought down the price of rice. 全国性的大丰收很快使米价回跌了。

name: deadline
interpret: n.最后期限，截止日期
example: 单词 deadline 的例句||||Next week is the deadline for sending in your application. 呈递申请书的截止日期是下星期。||||I want the report ready for the three o'clock deadline. 我希望报告最迟在三点之前准备好。

name: deadly
interpret: adj.致命的，致死的；adv.非常地，如死一般地
example: 单词 deadly 的例句||||The shock was deadly to him. 这次打击对他是致命的。||||It is deadly still. 寂静无声。

name: bravery
interpret: n.勇敢
example: 单词 bravery 的例句||||He received a medal in reward for his bravery. 他因勇敢获得一枚奖章。||||The story tells of the bravery of a little girl. 这个故事讲的是一个小女孩的勇敢。

name: youth
interpret: n.青年，青年时期，初期，少年，青年们
example: 单词 youth 的例句||||Leifeng set a good example to the youth. 雷锋为青年人树立了好榜样。||||Youth is the season of hope. 青春是希望的季节。

name: attempt
interpret: n.企图，试图；vt.尝试，试图
example: 单词 attempt 的例句||||This is a useless attempt. 这是个无用的尝试。||||Our last attempt proved successful. 我们最后的尝试成功了。

name: feature
interpret: n.特征，特色
example: 单词 feature 的例句||||What is the most important feature about this city? 这个城市最重要的特色是什么？||||Noise is a feature of city life. 噪音是城市生活的一个特点。

name: hunger
interpret: n.饿，饥饿，渴望，饥馑；vt.使饥饿；vi.挨饿，渴望
example: 单词 hunger 的例句||||I hunger for a new house. 我渴望得到一座新房子。||||I have experienced real hunger. 我体验过真正饥饿。

name: establish
interpret: vt.建立，设立；安置，使定居；确立，使确认
example: 单词 establish 的例句||||Let's establish the ground rules. 让我们定一下基本规则。||||They want to establish trade relations with us. 他们想和我国建立贸易关系。

name: brilliant
interpret: adj.光辉的，灿烂的；卓越的，才华横溢的
example: 单词 brilliant 的例句||||You should picture to yourself the brilliant future ahead of us. 你该想象一下我们光明灿烂的前途。||||It was such a brilliant piece of writing. 这真是一篇才华横溢的文章。

name: wherever
interpret: adv.（究竟）在哪里；conj.无论什么地方，各处，处处
example: 单词 wherever 的例句||||She used to follow after him wherever he went. 以前，他走到哪里，她总是跟到哪里。||||The foolish boy was laughed at wherever he went. 这个愚蠢的男孩不论走到哪里都受到讥笑。

name: disadvantage
interpret: n.不利条件，不便之处；缺点，劣势
example: 单词 disadvantage 的例句||||His bad health is a great disadvantage to him. 他身体不好是他的不利之处。||||We were put at a serious disadvantage. 我们被置于非常不利的地位。

name: hostess
interpret: n.女主人，女房东，女老板
example: 单词 hostess 的例句||||The hostess set a lamp on the table. 女主人把一盏灯放在桌子上。||||The hostess pressed fish on her guests. 女主人催促客人吃鱼。

name: sacrifice
interpret: n.牺牲，供俸，祭品；vt.牺牲，祭祀，贱卖；vi.献祭
example: 单词 sacrifice 的例句||||A mother will sacrifice her life for her children. 为了孩子，一个母亲可以献出她自己的生命。||||He decided to sacrifice a trip for a new house. 为了购买新房子，他决定放弃旅行。

name: homeland
interpret: n.本国，故国
example: 单词 homeland 的例句||||I carry memories of my homeland around with me. 对家乡的回忆终日萦绕在我的脑际。||||I had a longing for a homeland for my soul. 我渴望着我心灵上的归宿。

name: status
interpret: n.状态，情形，地位；
example: 单词 status 的例句||||We all are interested in the status of world affairs. 我们都关心世界形势。||||We need to upgrade the status of teachers. 我们需要提升老师的地位。

name: indicate
interpret: vt.显示，象征，指示，指出
example: 单词 indicate 的例句||||The black clouds indicate that it will rain. 那些黑云表明天要下雨天。||||Please indicate the position you are applying for in your mail. 请在邮件中注明您所申请的职位。

name: essay
interpret: n.随笔，短文，评论，企图；vt.试图
example: 单词 essay 的例句||||There is much food for thought in this essay. 这篇杂文中有不少发人深思的东西。||||This is a thoughtful essay. 这是一篇具有思想性的随笔。

name: attitude
interpret: n.态度，看法；姿态，姿势
example: 单词 attitude 的例句||||What's his attitude toward this business? 他对这事是什么态度？||||His attitude was shocking to her. 他的态度令她感到震惊。

name: combine
interpret: vt./vi.（使）结合；（使）联合
example: 单词 combine 的例句||||China needs to find some way to combine the two systems. 中国应该寻求一种方式，将这两种制度结合在一起。||||We should combine work with rest. 我们应劳逸结合。

name: emotion
interpret: n.情绪，情感，感情
example: 单词 emotion 的例句||||He spoke in a voice touched with emotion. 他以激动的声音说话。||||Choose the right time and the right place to express your emotion. 选择合适的时机和地方发泄自己的情绪。

name: opportunity
interpret: n.机会；时机
example: 单词 opportunity 的例句||||It's a pity that Mike passed up such a good opportunity. 迈克错过了这么好的一个机会，真是可惜。||||I love the country, but I have less opportunity of seeing it. 我热爱乡村，但我几乎没有机会见到它。

name: memorize
interpret: vt.记忆；背诵
example: 单词 memorize 的例句||||He can memorize all the words of the movie. 他能熟记所有的电影台词。||||The boy can memorize the data easily. 这男孩能轻松地记住这些数据。

name: rank
interpret: n.军衔，社会阶层；排；vt.分级，分类；排列；vi.列为；列队
example: 单词 rank 的例句||||He was reduced in rank. 他被降级了。||||He is a physicist of the first rank. 他是一流的物理学家。

name: settlement
interpret: n.殖民，定居，殖民地；解决，决定，调停；结算，偿付
example: 单词 settlement 的例句||||He took up his settlement in a new house. 他在新屋居住下来。||||The problem is ripe for settlement. 解决这个问题的时机已经成熟。

name: temporary
interpret: adj.暂时的，临时的，临时性；n.临时工，临时雇员
example: 单词 temporary 的例句||||They just reached a temporary agreement. 他们只是达成一个临时协议。||||The arrangement is only temporary. 这种安排只是暂时的。

name: union
interpret: n.联合，合并，结合，联盟，协会
example: 单词 union 的例句||||The President gave his speech on the state of the Union. 总统发表了国情咨文演讲。||||Even the union leaders hoped that the strike would die quietly. 甚至连工会领袖们都希望罢工会无声无息地结束。

name: update
interpret: vt.更新，使现代化，补充最新资料；n.更新
example: 单词 update 的例句||||They decided to update the computer systems. 他们决定更新计算机系统。||||You can update or delete files at any time. 你可以在任何时间更新或者删除你的文件。

name: advance
interpret: n.前进，预付 vi.前进，进展 vt.促进，推进
example: 单词 advance 的例句||||The booking office sells tickets 3 days in advance. 售票处预售3天的票。||||She walked 2 yards in advance of her husband. 她走在她丈夫前面两码远的地方。

name: industrial
interpret: adj.工业的，产业的，实业的；从事工业的；工业高度发达的
example: 单词 industrial 的例句||||Shanghai is the most important industrial base of China. 上海是中国最重要的工业基地。||||Shenyang is among the largest industrial cities in China. 沈阳是中国最大工业城市之一。

name: deed
interpret: n.行为，实行，契约；vt.立契转让
example: 单词 deed 的例句||||You are not going to fool me into such a deed. 你不要哄骗我去干那种事。||||A friend in need is a friend in deed. 患难见真情。

name: underground
interpret: n.地下，地铁，地道；秘密活动；adj.地下的，秘密的；adv.在地下，秘密地
example: 单词 underground 的例句||||His father is a member of the underground. 他父亲是一名地下组织的成员。||||There is an underground park here. 这里有一个地下停车场。

name: entertaining
interpret: adj.有趣的，使人娱乐的
example: 单词 entertaining 的例句||||Entertaining people is the most natural thing in the world for her. 招待客人对她来说是世界上最自然不过的事情。||||The traveller was an entertaining story teller. 这位旅客是一位有趣的说故事者。

name: expand
interpret: vt.使膨胀，详述，扩张；vi.张开，发展
example: 单词 expand 的例句||||The merchant wants to expand his business. 那个商人想扩大他的经营。||||We have to expand the size of the image. 我们不得不放大图像的尺寸。

name: fist
interpret: n.拳头，手，抓住，抓牢；vt.拳打，握成拳，紧握
example: 单词 fist 的例句||||He struck me with his fist. 他用拳头打我。||||He suddenly shot out his fist. 他突然打出一拳。

name: inspire
interpret: vt.使感动，激发，启示，吸入，鼓舞，产生，使生灵感；vi.吸入，赋予灵感
example: 单词 inspire 的例句||||If I do, it might inspire other Iranian women. 如果我成功了，这也许会激励其它伊朗妇女。||||A good novel serves to educate and inspire people. 一本好的小说足以教育人民和鼓舞人民。

name: freeway
interpret: n.高速公路，高速干道
example: 单词 freeway 的例句||||We're driving on the freeway. 我们正行驶在快车道上。||||A truck driver was driving along on the freeway. 一位司机正驾驶卡车沿着高速公路行使。

name: institute
interpret: n.学会，协会；讲习会，讲座；vt.建立，设立；开始
example: 单词 institute 的例句||||He thought of trying for a position in a research institute. 他想方设法在一个研究机关找个工作。||||He gave a talk to the Women's Institute on his travels in Asia. 他就他的亚洲之旅为妇女协会做了非正式演讲。

name: misunderstand
interpret: vt.误解，误会
example: 单词 misunderstand 的例句||||Don't misunderstand what I'm trying to say. 别误解我要说的话。||||His remarks show that he misunderstand my position on the question. 他的话说明他误解了我在这一问题上的立场。

name: misunderstanding
interpret: n.误会；误解
example: 单词 misunderstanding 的例句||||We had a slight misunderstandingover the plan. 我们对此计划有一些轻微的误解。||||There must be some misunderstanding—I thought I ordered the smaller model. 一定是搞错了—我以为我订的是更小型号的。

name: overcome
interpret: vt.战胜，克服，胜过；vi.得胜
example: 单词 overcome 的例句||||We need a confident leader to overcome these difficulties. 我们需要一个有信心的领导者来克服这些困难。||||However great the difficulties may be, we can overcome them. 哪怕是再大的困难我们也能克服。

name: rate
interpret: n.比率，率，速度，价格，费用，等级；vt.估价，认为，鉴定等级，责骂；vi.被评价
example: 单词 rate 的例句||||England will increase the rate from 5 to 6 per cent. 英国将提高利息从5%到6%。||||How do you rate our team's chances of winning? 你认为我们队获胜的概率是多少？

name: pest
interpret: n.瘟疫，鼠疫；害虫，害人虫；
example: 单词 pest 的例句||||Each year ten percent of the crop is lost to a pest called corn rootworm. 一种叫玉米根虫的害虫每年会让粮食减产10%。||||That guy is a regular pest. 那家伙是个十足的讨厌鬼。

name: tourism
interpret: n.旅游，观光；旅游业，观光业
example: 单词 tourism 的例句||||The city is finally realizing its tourism potential. 该市终于让旅游潜力得到发挥。||||The country's economy is dependent on tourism. 该国经济依赖于旅游业。

name: demand
interpret: vt.要求，请求；要求知道，查问；需要；n.（可数）要求，请求；（不可数）需要，需求
example: 单词 demand 的例句||||It is our demand that she should go there. 她到那里去是我们的要求。||||This job makes a lot of demand on my time. 这项工作要我付出很多时间。

name: demanding
interpret: adj.要求多的，吃力的
example: 单词 demanding 的例句||||These women are demanding fairness and equality in their pay. 这些妇女要求在薪酬方面的公正和平等。||||It is a demanding role and she needs to work hard at it. 那是一个要求很高的角色，她必须要加倍努力。

name: edition
interpret: n.版次，版本；（报纸、杂志的）一份；（广播、电视节目的）一期；（书、报、杂志等的）一版印刷总数
example: 单词 edition 的例句||||The last edition of this newspaper goes to press at 6 pm. 该报的最后一版下午六点钟付印。||||The second edition was published only in America. 第二版只在美国出版。

name: efficient
interpret: adj.有效的，效率高的；有能力的，能胜任的
example: 单词 efficient 的例句||||She is an efficient manageress. 她是个有能力的经理。||||Your problem lies in lacking efficient methods. 你的问题在于缺少有效的方法。

name: firmly
interpret: adv.坚固，坚定，断然
example: 单词 firmly 的例句||||You must keep this firmly in mind. 这一点你必须牢牢记住。||||This is what we are firmly against. 这是我们坚决反对的。

name: user
interpret: n.用户，使用者
example: 单词 user 的例句||||The company is the biggest user of oil. 该公司是最大的石油用户。||||The umbrella keeps the rains off the user. 雨伞使撑伞人免受雨淋。

name: error
interpret: n.错误，谬误，差错
example: 单词 error 的例句||||The error was due to carelessness pure and simple. 这个差错完全是由于粗心造成的。||||Even the wise are not always free from error. 智者千虑，必有一失。

name: foresee
interpret: v.(foresaw,foreseen)预见；预知
example: 单词 foresee 的例句||||No one can foresee what will happen in the future. 谁也无法预见到将来会发生什么事。||||He did not foresee any problems. 他没有预见到任何问题。

name: construction
interpret: n.建筑，建筑物，解释，造句
example: 单词 construction 的例句||||Please do not put a wrong construction on her action. 请不要误解她的行为。||||London Bridge is an important construction in Britain. 伦敦桥是英国的一处重要建筑。

name: expose
interpret: vt.使暴露，使面临；使感光，使曝光；揭露
example: 单词 expose 的例句||||Don't expose it to the sun. 谨防日晒。||||We have exposed, and will continue to expose them. 我们揭露了他们而且还将继续揭露。

name: newly
interpret: adv.新近，最近；重新，再度；以新的方式
example: 单词 newly 的例句||||Have you reviewed for this newly published novel? 你给这本新出版的小说写书评了吗？||||It is a newly planted tree and it has not established yet. 这是一颗新栽的树，还没有扎下根来。

name: gifted
interpret: adj.有天赋的；有才华的
example: 单词 gifted 的例句||||She's very gifted in some areas. 她有些方面很有天赋。||||She is a gifted chemist. 她是一位很有天分的化学家。

name: infect
interpret: vt.传染，侵染；使受影响
example: 单词 infect 的例句||||After that, they may start to infect other people. 之后，它们会开始传染给其他人。||||One bad boy may infect the whole class. 一个坏男孩会影响整个班。

name: institution
interpret: n.(慈善、宗教等性质的)公共机构；学校
example: 单词 institution 的例句||||Bank is a financial institution. 银行是一种金融机构。||||This is a newly established institution. 这是一个新设立的机构。

name: lack
interpret: n.缺乏，不足；vi.缺乏，短少，没有缺乏，短少，没有；需要
example: 单词 lack 的例句||||He is unable to do the job for lack of experience. 他缺少经验不能胜任这项工作。||||I think a lack of confidence underlies his manner. 我认为他表现出的态度是因为他缺乏信心。

name: involve
interpret: vt.包缠；使卷入，使陷入；使专注；必须包括；包围
example: 单词 involve 的例句||||Don't involve yourself with those people. 不要和那些人混在一起。||||Don't involve me in your quarrel. 不要把我卷进你们的争吵中。

name: motivation
interpret: n.动机，刺激，推动
example: 单词 motivation 的例句||||Motivation to learn must come from the child. 学习的动力必须源于孩子自身。||||Actually, they are a kind of motivation for me. 实际上，对于我来说，那是一种动力。

name: organ
interpret: n.器官，喉舌；机构，机关；风琴，口琴
example: 单词 organ 的例句||||He played a beautiful tune on the organ. 他用风琴演奏出一支动听的曲子。||||The largest organ in the body is the liver. 人体最大的器官是肝脏。

name: porridge
interpret: n.粥，麦片粥
example: 单词 porridge 的例句||||She was feeding the baby with porridge. 她正在给小孩子喂粥。||||She often has porridge for breakfast. 她经常早餐吃稀饭。

name: profession
interpret: n.职业，表白，声明，公开宣布
example: 单词 profession 的例句||||First of all, you should know what profession suits you. 首先，你该知道什么职业适合你。||||He made a profession of friendship to his classmate Mary. 他向他的同学玛丽表白了他的友情。

name: whichever
interpret: pron.无论哪个，无论哪些；adj.（究竟）哪个，哪些
example: 单词 whichever 的例句||||Whichever day you come, we will be pleased to see you. 无论你哪一天来，我们都很高兴。||||Choose whichever of them you like best. 选一个你最喜欢的吧。

name: worthwhile
interpret: adj.值得花时间的，值得做的，相宜的
example: 单词 worthwhile 的例句||||It isn't worthwhile spending so much time on minor problems. 在枝节问题上犯不着花这么多时间。||||It is worthwhile doing it. 做这件事划算。

name: unbelievable
interpret: adj.不可相信的；难以置信的
example: 单词 unbelievable 的例句||||They work with an unbelievable speed. 他们以令人难以置信的速度工作。||||That story is unbelievable. 那故事不可信。

name: belief
interpret: n.相信，确信，信任，信念，认为
example: 单词 belief 的例句||||Their society was built around a belief in God. 他们的社会建立在信仰上帝的基础上。||||Nothing can shake the basis for my belief. 什么也动摇不了我信念的基础。

name: stomach
interpret: n.胃；v.忍受，容忍；vt.承受，忍受
example: 单词 stomach 的例句||||I often feel a pain in my stomach. 我经常胃疼。||||You have to have a strong stomach to eat this food. 要想吃这种食物，得不恶心才行。

name: limited
interpret: adj.有限制的，有限的，少的；n.高级快车
example: 单词 limited 的例句||||They had plans to turn the club into a limited company. 他们计划将这个俱乐部变为一家股份有限公司。||||Since time is limited, I'll have to stop here. 由于时间关系，就谈到这里吧。

name: mass
interpret: n.块，大多数，质量，大量，群众，弥撒；adj.群众的，大规模的，集中的；vt.使集合
example: 单词 mass 的例句||||She had a mass of auburn hair. 她有一头浓密的棕发。||||There is a mass of stones in the yard. 院子里堆放着一大堆石头。

name: minister
interpret: n.部长，牧师，公使；vi.服侍，救助，主持圣事
example: 单词 minister 的例句||||He met with the Prime Minister of Japan for an hour. 他和日本首相会见了一个小时。||||I got the minister on the ear with a potato. 我用土豆打中了部长的耳朵。

name: origin
interpret: n.起源，由来，起因，出身，血统，[数]原点
example: 单词 origin 的例句||||I'm a Chinese by origin. 我是中国血统。||||What's the origin of your anxiety? 你焦虑的根源是什么？

name: patience
interpret: n.耐心，忍耐，耐性，忍耐力，坚韧
example: 单词 patience 的例句||||We haven't the patience to hear such an empty talk. 我们可没耐心去听这种空谈。||||I must warn you that my patience is almost at an end. 我必须警告你我已经快没有耐心了。

name: reaction
interpret: n.反应，反作用，反馈，反动，影响
example: 单词 reaction 的例句||||Their reaction to the joke is to laugh. 他们对这个笑话的反应是笑。||||For every action there's an equal and opposite reaction. 每一个作用力都会引起相等的和相反的反作用力。

name: weakness
interpret: n.虚弱，软弱，疲软，薄弱；缺点，弱点
example: 单词 weakness 的例句||||It is my great weakness now. 这是我现在极大的弱点。||||You should know your weakness. 你应清楚自己的弱点。

name: wealthy
interpret: adj.富有的，丰裕的，充分的
example: 单词 wealthy 的例句||||He grew up in a wealthy family. 他在一个富有的家庭里长大。||||That young man was the son of a wealthy planter. 那年轻人是一位富有的农场主的儿子。

name: arise
interpret: vi.出现，发生，产生，兴起，升起
example: 单词 arise 的例句||||The country's present difficulties arise from the reduced value of its money. 该国目前的困难起因于其货币的贬值。||||Accidents often arise from carelessness. 事故常起因于粗心。

name: zone
interpret: n.地域，地带，地区；vt.环绕，使分成地带；vi.分成区
example: 单词 zone 的例句||||Do not enter the danger zone! 切勿进入危险区！||||How is the economic development zone going on? 现在经济开发区怎样了？

name: basis
interpret: n.基础，主要成分
example: 单词 basis 的例句||||We can't accept that as a basis for a decision. 我们不能同意以此为基础来做出决定。||||What is the basis of your opinion? 你这样看的根据是什么？

name: brief
interpret: n.摘要，简报，公事包；adj.简短的，简洁的；v.对...作简报，摘要
example: 单词 brief 的例句||||She made a brief note on the telephone pad. 她在电话通讯簿上记下简短的话。||||The book ends with a brief summary. 这本书以一个简要的归纳结束。

name: devotion
interpret: n.奉献，献身，忠诚，专心；祈祷
example: 单词 devotion 的例句||||Their devotion to their children is plain to see. 他们对子女的挚爱显而易见。||||His devotion to science is well known. 他对科学的献身精神为人熟知。

name: distant
interpret: adj.远的，久远的，远隔的
example: 单词 distant 的例句||||He has visited many distant lands. 他访问过许多遥远的国家。||||You finally reached that distant place. 你终于达到了那么远的地方。

name: cultural
interpret: adj.文化的；教养的，修养的，教化的
example: 单词 cultural 的例句||||Our new cultural centre will be located here. 我们新的文化中心将设在这里。||||The two countries signed a cultural agreement. 两国签订了文化协定。

name: justice
interpret: n.正义，公平，公正，正确；司法，审判
example: 单词 justice 的例句||||He stood for the cause of liberty and justice. 他为自由和正义的事业而奋斗。||||We try to strike a balance between justice and mercy. 我们设法做到宽严并济，恩威兼施。

name: self-confidence
interpret: n.自信
example: 单词 self-confidence 的例句||||Your energy level and your self-confidence are high now. 你的能量和自信心现在相当高涨。||||We love our nation, which is the source of our self-confidence. 我们爱我们的民族，这是我们自信心的源泉。

name: soul
interpret: n.灵魂，心灵，精神，精髓，精华；人，化身，典型；鬼魂；adj.黑人的；（尤指在黑人文化中）激发情感的
example: 单词 soul 的例句||||A dancer must throw herself heart and soul into every performance. 舞蹈演员对每一场演出都必须尽心尽力。||||He was heart and soul against the new rules. 他完全反对新规定。

name: punishment
interpret: n.处罚，刑罚，惩罚
example: 单词 punishment 的例句||||Punishment had very little effect on him. 惩罚对他没有什么效果。||||He thinks to escape punishment. 他企图逃脱惩罚。

name: troublesome
interpret: adj.伤脑筋的，麻烦的
example: 单词 troublesome 的例句||||Teaching seems troublesome to him. 教书对于他来说好像是烦扰的事。||||This work is very troublesome. 这工作很讨厌。

name: caring
interpret: adj.关心的，关怀的，照料的
example: 单词 caring 的例句||||One shouldn't act without caring for public opinion. 一个人的行为不能不顾及舆论。||||You're very lucky to have a caring family. 你很幸运有一个温馨的家庭。

name: despite
interpret: n.轻视，憎恨；prep.虽然，尽管
example: 单词 despite 的例句||||Despite the difficulties he threw himself into the research. 尽管困难重重，他还是全心投入了调查研究。||||All the people on the ship were in safety despite the storm. 虽然遇到风暴，船上所有的人都安然无恙。

name: ensure
interpret: vt.保证，担保；保护，使安全
example: 单词 ensure 的例句||||I will ensure that the car arrives by six o'clock. 我保证汽车六点钟以前到。||||This medicine will ensure you a good night's sleep. 这药能保证你睡一夜好觉。

name: inland
interpret: adj.内地的；内陆的 adv.在内地；向内地
example: 单词 inland 的例句||||We headed further inland. 我们更深入地朝内陆行进。||||The car turned away from the coast and headed inland. 汽车离开了海岸驶向内陆。

name: mistaken
interpret: adj.犯错的，错误的
example: 单词 mistaken 的例句||||I hold that the government's economic policies are mistaken. 我认为政府的经济政策是错误的。||||The idea that modern art can only be seen in museum is mistaken. 那种认为只有在博物馆里才能看到现代艺术的想法是错误的。

name: obvious
interpret: adj.明显的，明白的，显然的
example: 单词 obvious 的例句||||It was obvious that a big storm was brewing up. 很显然，一场暴风雨正在酝酿中。||||It's obvious that a man isn't strong enough to lift an elephant. 很明显，一个人是不能举起大象的。

name: relate
interpret: vt.讲，叙述，使联系，有关系；vi.涉及；认同；符合；与…有某种联系
example: 单词 relate 的例句||||It is difficult to relate these results with any known cause. 很难把结果与任何已知原因联系起来。||||The professor told his students to relate theory with practice. 教授要学生们理论联系实际。

name: unprotected
interpret: adj.无保护的；无防卫的；无掩护的
example: 单词 unprotected 的例句||||Iron or steel parts will rust, if they are unprotected. 铁件或钢件是会生锈的，如果不加保护的话。||||At the same time, you'd better not leave your transports unprotected. 同时，你最好不要把运输艇独自扔在海域里。

name: truthfully
interpret: adv.说真话低；诚实地
example: 单词 truthfully 的例句||||He answered frankly and truthfully all my questions. 他坦率而真诚地回答了我的所有问题。||||She looked her father straight in the eye and answered his question truthfully. 她直视着父亲的眼睛，诚实地回答了他的问题。

name: willingness
interpret: n.愿意；心甘情愿
example: 单词 willingness 的例句||||They tried to assure him of their willingness to work. 他们尽力使他相信他们乐意工作。||||A willingness to give and take is important for success in marriage. 乐于互相迁就对婚姻的成功很重要。

name: celebrate
interpret: vt.庆祝；颂扬，赞美；vi.庆祝，过节
example: 单词 celebrate 的例句||||On October lst we celebrate our National Day. 十月一日我们庆祝国庆。||||We want to celebrate his birthday. 我们要庆祝他的生日。

name: majority
interpret: n.大多数；过半数
example: 单词 majority 的例句||||He is elected by a majority of 40 votes against 10. 他以40票对10票的大多数票当选。||||He believes that his supporters are in the majority. 他相信支持他的人占多数。

name: lately
interpret: adv.最近，不久前
example: 单词 lately 的例句||||I don't like reading novels lately. 近来我不喜欢读小说。||||She's only lately begun working here. 最近她才开始在这儿工作。

name: regards
interpret: n.问候；致意
example: 单词 regards 的例句||||David sends his warmest regards to your parents. 戴维向你的父母致以最热烈的问候。||||Please give my regards to him. 请代我向他致意。

name: boyfriend
interpret: n.男朋友
example: 单词 boyfriend 的例句||||The girl was so angry that she hung up on her boyfriend. 那姑娘一气之下挂断了男朋友的电话。||||My boyfriend gathered some beautiful flowers for me. 我的男朋友为我采来一些美丽的花。

name: hopeless
interpret: adj.无希望的，绝望的，毫无办法的
example: 单词 hopeless 的例句||||Jim's plan seemed hopeless, but he brought it off. 吉姆的计划看起来没希望实现，但是他成功了。||||I'm hopeless at Maths. 我的数学很糟糕。

name: income
interpret: n.收入，收益，所得
example: 单词 income 的例句||||Her income is in the order of 9000 yuan a year. 她的年收入大约为9000元。||||You have to suit your spending to your income. 你必须让你的收支相符。

name: reality
interpret: n.真实，事实，本体，逼真，实在
example: 单词 reality 的例句||||I read love stories as an escape from reality. 我阅读爱情小说以逃避现实。||||We thought he was serious but in reality he was joking. 我们以为他是认真的, 但实际上他是在开玩笑。

name: prince
interpret: n.王子，太子，诸侯
example: 单词 prince 的例句||||Prince Charles has again fallen from his horse. 查尔斯王子又一次从马上摔了下来。||||The prince and the princess lived happily ever after. 从此以后王子和公主就一直过着幸福的日子。

name: threaten
interpret: vt.威胁，恐吓，恫吓；预示…的凶兆&vi. 威胁，恐吓，恫吓；似将发生，可能来临
example: 单词 threaten 的例句||||They threaten them with violence. 他们对其进行暴力威胁。||||The lowering clouds threaten rain. 这阴霾的云层预示即将下雨。

name: mankind
interpret: n.人类；男子，男性
example: 单词 mankind 的例句||||The history of mankind is the history of ideas. 人类的历史就是思想的历史。||||Asia is one of the places where mankind originated. 亚洲是人类的发源地之一。

name: pace
interpret: n.速度，步调，步法；vi.踱步，缓慢的走，引导；vt.步于；用步测
example: 单词 pace 的例句||||She works so fast I cannot keep pace. 她干得很快，跟不上。||||He walked the horse at a slow pace. 他缓步牵着马遛着。

name: warm-hearted
interpret: adj.热情的；富于同情心的
example: 单词 warm-hearted 的例句||||She is very kind and warm-hearted. 她很和蔼，也很热情。||||He is a warm-hearted man, so we all like him. 他是一个热心的人，所以我们都很喜欢他。

name: determine
interpret: vt.决定，决心；确定；vi.决定，决心
example: 单词 determine 的例句||||Shall we determine what we are going to do next? 我们来确定一下下一步该做什么吧？||||I determine him to be a fool. 我确定他是一个傻子。

name: dirt
interpret: n.泥土；污物；污垢
example: 单词 dirt 的例句||||The children were outside playing happily in the dirt. 小孩在外面的泥土里玩得很开心。||||She swept the dirt out. 她扫除了灰尘。

name: entire
interpret: adj.全部的，完整的，同性质的，纯正的，全面的
example: 单词 entire 的例句||||The entire world consists of matter. 整个世界都是由物质组成的。||||I've wasted an entire day on this. 在这上面我已经浪费了一整天的时间。

name: loneliness
interpret: n.孤单，寂寞，孤独，凄凉
example: 单词 loneliness 的例句||||I'm used to loneliness. 我已习惯于孤独。||||How foolish we were to be afraid of loneliness. 我们居然会害怕孑然寡处，多么愚蠢啊！

name: shortcoming
interpret: n.缺点，不足
example: 单词 shortcoming 的例句||||Rudeness is his chief shortcoming. 粗鲁是他主要的缺点。||||You may point out our shortcoming, no matter when. 你不管什么时候都可以指出我们的缺点。

name: advertiser
interpret: n.广告商；广告人员
example: 单词 advertiser 的例句||||That big advertiser liked the show and wanted in. 那个大广告商喜欢这节目并想参与。||||As an advertiser today, you weigh new factors into your media mix. 作为一个当今的广告主，你须衡量媒体混合的新因素。

name: annoying
interpret: adj.使人恼怒；令人生气的
example: 单词 annoying 的例句||||These flies are annoying me. 这些苍蝇真使我心烦。||||The boy broke the teapot. How annoying! 这男孩把茶壶打破了。真可气！

name: wage
interpret: n.薪水，工资，报应，报偿，代价；vt.开展，进行；vi.在进行中
example: 单词 wage 的例句||||The wage due to him will be paid tomorrow. 他应得的工资明天付给他。||||He gets a daily wage. 他拿日薪。

name: expectation
interpret: n.期待，期望，指望，预料
example: 单词 expectation 的例句||||He came short of our expectation. 他使我们失望。||||He has little expectation of passing the exam. 他对考试及格不抱希望。

name: leadership
interpret: n.领导能力，领导阶层
example: 单词 leadership 的例句||||The leadership instructed us to remain where we were. 领导指示我们留在原地不动。||||He undertook the leadership of the team. 他担任了这个团队的领导。

name: newcomer
interpret: n.新来的人；新近到达的移民；新手
example: 单词 newcomer 的例句||||The newcomer is not used to the heavy traffic in big cities. 新来者对大都市拥挤的交通不习惯。||||The newcomer is very strange in his manner. 这新来的人举动上很古怪。

name: unfortunate
interpret: adj.不幸的，不合宜的，不吉利的
example: 单词 unfortunate 的例句||||It is indeed unfortunate! 那的确是不幸啊！||||She was always good with the unfortunate. 她对不幸的人总是很友好。
